Description: Flawless7 is a Plastic Surgery and Wellness Center, introducing a new luxury concept in Lebanon, Where science meets beauty and care meets excellence. We offer premium expertise in advanced Plastic surgery and aesthetics , wellness , and personalized transformations. We are looking for a Receptionist to join our front-desk team; someone who represents professionalism, warmth, and efficiency while ensuring a smooth and welcoming experience for every client. Key Responsibilities Greet and welcome patients in a professional and friendly manner. Manage appointment scheduling, confirmations, and follow-ups. Coordinate effectively with the medical and nursing teams to ensure smooth clinic operations. Handle patient inquiries in person, by phone, or through digital communication. Maintain confidentiality and uphold the clinic’s high standards of service. Support administrative duties such as data entry, billing coordination, and filing. Position Details Working hours: 9:00 AM – 8:00 PM 2 days off weekly (days are flexible and scheduled based on clinic needs) Friendly, professional work environment with room for growth Salary, benefits and incentives are available. Tanbish Lebanon is an online classified platform looking for remote Telesales Executive Role Description: This is a full-time remote role for a Telesales Specialist. The Telesales Specialist will be responsible for making outbound calls to potential customers, answering inbound calls from customers, and following up on leads. Additionally, the role involves providing exceptional customer service, addressing customer inquiries, resolving issues, and maintaining accurate records of customer interactions. The Telesales Specialist will also be expected to meet and exceed sales targets and collaborate with the team to develop effective sales strategies. Qualifications: Sales experience at least 2 years Customer Service and Customer Support skills Strong Communication skills Ability to provide Training Excellent interpersonal and negotiation skills Ability to work independently and remotely Experience in telesales or related field is a plus High school diploma or equivalent; college degree preferred "The job location is in Lebanon." About the Role PT Boutique is a premium personal training and Lagree studio — the first of its kind in Lebanon. We pride ourselves on offering a private, high-end fitness experience that combines discipline, care, and visible results. We are looking for a certified male Personal Trainer who is driven, professional, and ready to represent PT Boutique’s values on the floor. You will be joining a motivated and dynamic team that prioritizes excellence, client satisfaction, and teamwork. This opportunity is ideal for a trainer who wants to build a strong, long-term career in a structured environment, surrounded by passionate professionals, with access to elite clientele and continuous support from management. What Makes This Role Unique Work in a private, boutique gym environment with limited clients and personalized sessions. Be part of a growing premium fitness brand recognized for its results and professionalism. Receive ongoing mentorship, structured systems, and clear growth potential. Enjoy a supportive atmosphere built around respect, teamwork, and accountability. Daily Responsibilities As a PT Boutique Trainer, you will: Conduct one-on-one personal training sessions following PTB’s structured training systems. Provide clients with proper guidance, motivation, and consistent follow-ups to ensure visible progress. Maintain professional appearance, hygiene, and punctuality at all times. Manage client appointments and attendance through the PTB portal and CRM system. Collaborate with physiotherapists, nutritionists, and management to deliver a 360° wellness experience. Help clients understand the importance of stretching, recovery, and body assessments as part of their journey. Ensure the training floor is always clean, organized, and ready for the next session. Respect PTB’s internal policies and maintain a positive, proactive, and disciplined attitude. Be available and ready to work 6–10 hours daily , depending on client demand and schedule. Participate in team meetings and continuous education sessions to align with PTB’s standards. About TGI Group TGI Group is a diversified organization with a strong footprint in the automotive sector. We are driven by innovation, creativity, and growth, and we are looking for a talented Senior Graphic Designer to join our creative team in Lebanon. Role Overview The Senior Graphic Designer will be responsible for developing high-quality visual assets across all TGI Group brands. This includes digital and print design, branding, packaging, POS materials, and video editing. The ideal candidate is a hands-on designer who can transform creative concepts into impactful visuals that communicate the group’s identity and values. Key Responsibilities Design and produce creative assets for multiple brands under TGI Group, ensuring consistency and brand alignment. Develop digital and print materials such as social media content, brochures, presentations, and corporate communications. Create product packaging, labeling, and point-of-sale (POS) designs that reflect brand identity and market trends. Contribute to brand development, including visual identity systems, logos, and brand guidelines. Produce professional product mockups and visual concepts for marketing campaigns and product launches. Edit and produce videos for marketing, digital campaigns, and internal communications. Collaborate with marketing, product, and sales teams to bring ideas to life through creative design. Stay up to date with design trends, techniques, and industry standards to ensure innovation and quality. *** THIS IS A REMOTE OPPORTUNITY *** Located in Montreal, QC, Cigo Tracker is a technology company in rapid growth, working in a booming industry; last-mile logistics. Our main product offering targets the needs of SMEs, SMBs, and large Enterprise businesses fulfilling deliveries from their distribution centers to end consumers and/or other businesses. Our goal is to empower businesses with a simple but powerful set of tools that enable them to significantly increase their operational efficiency, give visibility within their logistics operations, and make their customers happier with real-time delivery notifications and tracking. You’ll work with a diverse team of engineers who believe in code quality and in continuous improvement. We provide access to online learning resources to fuel your learning and growth. Responsibilities: Contribute to overall product and company goals, both in terms of new developments of features and projects, as well as maintenance items (bug fixes, performance enhancements, security vulnerability remediations, etc.) Develop new microservices and work on improving existing projects with high scalability requirements Important: Your work continuously needs to have scale, performance and reliability in mind Be involved in the horizontal and vertical engineering of new features, and the revision of existing feature sets Use innovative/cutting-edge technologies as well as proven methods to solve complex problems related to SaaS and high availability systems Work schedule is 9 am to 5 pm EST, Montreal, Canada timezone. Job Title: HR Assistant Location: Beirut, Lebanon Company: Forearms Security Reports To: HR Manager / Operations Manager Job Summary: Forearms Security is seeking a proactive and detail-oriented HR Assistant to support the Human Resources department in attracting qualified security personnel, maintaining accurate employee records, and assisting in recruitment and administrative processes. The ideal candidate is social media-savvy, organized, and capable of handling confidential information professionally. Key Responsibilities: 1. Recruitment and Social Media Management Develop and manage recruitment campaigns through social media platforms (Facebook, TikTok, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc.) to attract qualified security guards and staff. Create engaging job posts, videos, and stories that reflect the company’s professionalism and attract potential candidates. Respond to candidate inquiries and maintain active communication throughout the recruitment process. 2. Client and Candidate Database Management Build and maintain a structured database of potential clients and candidates. Categorize and organize contacts by geographical location and service type. Keep all data up to date and ensure it’s easily accessible for future hiring or marketing needs. 3. HR Administrative Support Assist in the full employee lifecycle: hiring, onboarding, and termination processes. Ensure all employee files, contracts, and related documents are complete, updated, and properly archived. Support the HR department in preparing reports, correspondence, and compliance documentation. Coordinate with operations and payroll teams regarding staff status and updates. Qualifications & Skills: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field (preferred). 1–3 years of experience in HR or administrative support (experience in the security industry is a plus). Strong knowledge of social media platforms and online recruitment strategies. Excellent organizational and communication skills. Attention to detail and ability to handle confidential information responsibly. Proficient in Microsoft Office and comfortable with digital tools and databases. Job Summary: We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Sales Consultant to support and advise client companies on improving and restructuring their sales departments. This role involves evaluating current sales processes, identifying performance gaps, analyzing market trends, and recommending practical solutions to optimize the overall sales function. Key Responsibilities: 1. Sales Process Analysis & Optimization Conduct a full workflow survey of the sales process , from lead generation to order fulfillment, including: Who handles client communication When and how the accountant receives information Delivery responsibilities and timelines Identify bottlenecks or inefficiencies in the sales cycle and propose improvements or redesigns. Evaluate how orders are processed, documented, and reported. 2. Sales Department Structure & Team Assessment Analyze the organizational structure of the sales department. Assess reporting lines , team roles, inventory management skills, and internal communication. Identify gaps, weaknesses, or overlaps in responsibilities. Recommend structural adjustments or new processes to enhance performance and productivity. 3. Market & Product Analysis Analyze the client’s: Target market and customer profiles Geographical market coverage Pricing strategy (cost-based, value-based, or other) Competitive positioning Sales performance data over past years Product profitability and sales trends Evaluate inventory stock levels , overstocking risks, and warehouse capacity. Provide insights and visuals on sales data using tools like Excel or dashboards. 4. Strategic Sales Planning Set realistic and data-driven sales targets . Design a commission structure and sales objectives aligned with business goals. Coordinate with the finance department to align on credit sales processes. Develop and recommend CRM system usage if not already in place. 5. Team Development & Training Conduct training sessions to educate sales teams on techniques, tools, and product knowledge. Improve the team’s communication and client-handling skills . Instill best practices in sales processes, forecasting, and customer relationship management. We are looking for a detail-oriented and motivated Junior Accountant to join our team in Lebanon- Saifi Area. This entry-level position is ideal for individuals eager to start their accounting career and gain practical experience in a dynamic work environment. As a Junior Accountant, you will support the accounting department by assisting with various financial tasks, ensuring accuracy in financial records, and contributing to the overall financial operations of the company. Responsibilities: Assist in the preparation of financial statements, including balance sheets and income statements, under the guidance of senior accountants. Perform daily bookkeeping tasks, including data entry of financial transactions into accounting software, ensuring accuracy and completeness. Help with accounts payable and receivable processes, including invoice processing, payment tracking, and reconciliations. Support monthly and annual closing processes by preparing necessary documentation and assisting in account reconciliations. Participate in the preparation of budgets and forecasts, providing input based on financial data analysis. Maintain organized financial records and files, ensuring compliance with company policies and regulatory requirements. Assist in preparing for audits by gathering required documentation and responding to auditor inquiries. Collaborate with team members to identify process improvements and enhance efficiency in accounting operations. Stay updated on accounting principles and practices, actively seeking opportunities for professional development. Provide general administrative support to the accounting department as needed. Preferred Candidate: Possess a Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field, with a strong academic record. Demonstrate a foundational understanding of accounting principles and practices, with some experience in internships or coursework preferred. Exhibit strong attention to detail and accuracy in financial data entry and reporting. Show proficiency in Microsoft Excel and familiarity with accounting software, such as QuickBooks or similar tools. Possess good communication skills, both verbal and written, to effectively collaborate with team members and stakeholders. Display a strong willingness to learn and adapt to new challenges in a fast-paced environment. Be organized and able to manage multiple tasks efficiently, meeting deadlines consistently. Demonstrate integrity and professionalism, with a commitment to maintaining confidentiality of financial information. Exhibit strong problem-solving skills and a proactive approach to identifying and addressing issues. Have a positive attitude and a team-oriented mindset, contributing to a collaborative work atmosphere. The Malcolm H. Kerr Carnegie Middle East Center (MKCMEC), the Beirut center of the Carnegie Endowment for International Peace, encourages graduate and post-graduate students to apply to be Research Interns in Beirut. Research interns are selected for period of three to six months on a full-time basis. The research interns will assist the Center's scholars in their research on political, economic, security and education reforms topics related to the MENA region. Interns can expect to benefit directly from working at an international think-tank, with exposure to its inner mechanisms and the opportunity to contribute to our scholars' work. Job description The Receptionist position in Beirut, Lebanon , is an essential role that serves as the first point of contact for clients and visitors. This role requires a friendly and professional demeanor, as well as strong organizational skills to manage various administrative tasks. The Receptionist will be responsible for ensuring a smooth and efficient front desk operation, contributing to the overall positive experience of clients and staff alike. This position is ideal for individuals who thrive in a dynamic environment and possess excellent communication skills, particularly in a quieter setting. Responsibilities: Greet and welcome visitors in a friendly and professional manner. Manage incoming calls and direct them to the appropriate personnel, ensuring prompt responses. Maintain the reception area, ensuring it is tidy and presentable. Handle scheduling and appointment management for staff and clients. Assist with administrative tasks such as filing, data entry, and document preparation. Coordinate with various departments to ensure seamless communication. Process incoming and outgoing mail and packages, including urgent deliveries. Monitor office supplies and place orders as necessary. Provide information about the organization and its services to clients. .Assist in organizing company events and meetings that may occur. Preferred Candidate: Ability to handle confidential information with discretion. Previous experience in a receptionist or administrative role. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment. Ability to multitask and prioritize effectively. Flexibility to adapt to changing situations and demands. Description: Bayt.com | Remote Work Looking to start or grow your sales career — Remotely? Join Bayt.com, the Middle East's #1 job site, where we're helping millions of people find better jobs and build better lives. If you're passionate, driven, and looking for a remote opportunity with purpose, this might be the perfect fit. Why Bayt.com? At Bayt.com, we're more than a tech platform — we're a mission-driven team that's reshaping the future of recruitment in the region. As an Inside Sales Executive working remotely, you'll have the flexibility of working from home while being fully supported by a collaborative and fast-paced team. Whether you're just starting out or already have experience in B2B or software sales, we're looking for energetic individuals who thrive on challenge, impact, and growth. Role Description This is a full-time, on-site role for the Head of Architecture located in Antelias. The Head of Architecture will be responsible for overseeing and guiding the architecture team. It is a senior leadership role responsible for defining and driving the overall technology architecture strategy of the organization. This role ensures that business goals are supported by scalable, secure, and future-proof technology solutions. The Head of Architecture will lead a team of solution and enterprise architects, collaborate with executives and stakeholders, and provide governance over architectural standards, frameworks, and best practices. Establish and enforce architecture standards, policies, and best practices across the organization. Lead architecture review boards to evaluate and approve major technology initiatives. Ensure regulatory, security, and compliance requirements are embedded into solutions. Oversee the design of scalable, secure, and interoperable systems across applications, data, infrastructure, and cloud. Ensure architectural decisions support long-term flexibility, resilience, and cost-effectiveness. Guide the integration of legacy systems with modern platforms. Lead, mentor, and grow a high-performing team of architects and technical specialists. Foster a culture of collaboration between architecture, engineering, product, and business teams. Promote continuous learning and knowledge sharing within the architecture function. Communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical audiences clearly. Manage vendor relationships and evaluate third-party solutions. Role Description Role Description This is a full-time, on-site role for the Head of Architecture located in Antelias. Quest Restaurant Management is an operator, developer, and investor of unique, exciting, and high-quality brands within the food delivery and fast casual segments of the F&B industry. Our focus is strictly on quality and consistency of product, and reliability and speed of service. Established in 2013, QRM has successfully developed various renowned brands, including: Pizza Di Rocco - Multi-award winning authentic Italian pizzeria focused on delivery. Gino's Deli - Famous for its authentic panuozzo, homemade ingredients & premium Italian flavors. Pasta Della Nonna - Premium pasta with authentic flavors & homemade quality. The Mac Kitchen - Specializing in creamy, cheesy Mac specialties. La Patrona - An authentic Mexican taqueria inspired by inherited recipes. Chicano - Tex-Mex creations with a loaded and varied menu. Pinsa Romana - Handcrafted authentic pinsa with unique combinations. Brassa - Bringing premium cuts of Latin American steaks to the UAE. We believe that food is a universal experience, founded on quality ingredients, attention to detail, and consistency while ensuring convenience for our customers. Position Overview We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Restaurant Manager to join our team in managing our exciting restaurant brands. The ideal candidate will lead restaurant operations, ensuring exceptional customer experiences and maintaining high standards of food quality and service. Key Responsibilities Oversee daily restaurant operations, ensuring compliance with standards for quality, service, and health and safety. Manage staff recruitment, training, and performance evaluation to ensure an engaging team environment. Develop and implement effective operational strategies to enhance profitability and performance. Monitor inventory levels and supplier relationships to ensure high-quality products are available at all times. Work closely with the marketing team to promote and support new menu items and seasonal promotions. Handle customer feedback and resolve complaints to maintain a high level of guest satisfaction. Prepare and analyze reports related to sales, customer feedback, and operational efficiency. Coordinate with the head office for budget preparation, cost control, and overall financial management. About the Role We are looking for a skilled Technical Support / NOC Agent with hands-on experience in Mikrotik, Linux systems, and networking. The role involves monitoring, troubleshooting, and maintaining our ISP infrastructure to ensure seamless service delivery to corporate customers. Key Responsibilities Provide technical support for ISP customers (L2/L3 troubleshooting). Configure and manage Mikrotik routers, firewalls, and VPNs. Monitor and maintain network performance, uptime, and security. Troubleshoot connectivity issues (routing, switching, firewall policies, QoS, DNS, etc.). Administer Linux-based servers (web, DNS, email, monitoring tools). Perform proactive monitoring using tools such as PRTG, Zabbix, or similar. Escalate unresolved issues to senior engineers and coordinate incident resolution. Document procedures, incidents, and solutions in the knowledge base. A Multinational insurance company for over 150 years, has been helping individuals, families, and businesses around the world create a more confident future by providing financial protection and peace of mind through a wide range of insurance products and services. As an Insurance Sales Consultant, you will play a pivotal role in empowering individuals and families to secure their financial future. You will be responsible for building and nurturing client relationships, assessing their unique needs, and delivering tailored insurance solutions that provide comprehensive protection. This is an excellent opportunity for a highly motivated and goal-oriented individual to embark on a fulfilling journey with significant earning potential and accelerated career growth within a globally recognized company. Key Responsibilities: Client Acquisition and Relationship Management: Proactively identify and develop new business opportunities through networking, referrals, lead generation activities, and community engagement. Establish, build, and maintain strong, lasting relationships with potential and existing clients, fostering trust and loyalty. Conduct thorough needs assessments to understand clients' financial situations, goals, and existing insurance coverage. Provide exceptional customer service and support, addressing inquiries, concerns, and assisting with policy renewals and claims. Consultative Sales and Solution Delivery: Educate clients on diverse portfolio of insurance products, including life, health, accident, & group benefits. Customize insurance programs and present tailored solutions that align with individual or business client needs and financial objectives. Clearly explain policy features, benefits, terms, and conditions to ensure client understanding and confidence. Prepare and present compelling insurance proposals. Sales Performance and Compliance: Achieve and exceed assigned sales targets and contribute to the overall team success. Maintain accurate records of client interactions, sales activities, and policy information using CRM systems. Stay updated on industry trends, market changes, competitive products, and evolving product offerings. Ensure strict compliance with all industry regulations, company policies, and ethical standards in all sales activities. Professional Development: Actively participate in training and development programs to enhance product knowledge, sales skills, and industry expertise. Collaborate with colleagues and cross-functional teams to ensure seamless service delivery. Essential Business Experience and Technical Skills: Required: Minimum of two years of experience sales or a similar client-facing sales role with a proven track record of success. Strong desire to work independently and with a "hunter" mentality for new business development. Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and influence. Highly motivated, results-driven, and goal-oriented. Proficiency in basic computer skills (Microsoft Office Suite - Word, Excel, Outlook). Ability to learn and effectively use CRM systems for client management and sales tracking. Twenty- Five and above. Lebanese Baccalaureate. Car is a must Preferred: Bachelor’s degree in business, Finance, Marketing, or a related field Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to assess client risks and tailor solutions. Adaptability and resilience in a dynamic sales environment. What do we offer: Progressive income potential with competitive commission structures and bonus opportunities. Comprehensive benefits package, including medical insurance and pension plan. Opportunities for career growth and advancement within a global organization. Work-life balance with a supportive environment. Access to extensive training and development programs. Recognition and awards at various international forums for top performers (e.g., MDRT qualification). A purpose-driven culture dedicated to helping customers achieve a confident future. A Real Estate Agent in Beirut, Lebanon, plays a crucial role in the vibrant property market of the region. This position involves assisting clients in buying, selling, and renting properties while providing expert guidance throughout the real estate process. The agent must possess a deep understanding of the local market trends, property values, and legal regulations to effectively serve clients. Building strong relationships with clients and maintaining a robust network of contacts is essential for success in this role. Additionally, the agent must be adept at marketing properties, negotiating deals, and ensuring a smooth transaction process. Responsibilities: Assist clients in buying, selling, and renting residential and commercial properties. Conduct market research to stay updated on property trends and pricing. Prepare and present property listings, including photographs and descriptions. Negotiate offers and counteroffers on behalf of clients. Guide clients through the legal and financial aspects of real estate transactions. Develop and maintain a network of contacts in the real estate industry. Organize and conduct property viewings for potential buyers or renters. Provide clients with expert advice on property investments and market conditions. Utilize social media and online platforms for property marketing. Maintain accurate records of transactions and client interactions. Preferred Candidate: Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Proven sales experience, preferably in real estate. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Excellent negotiation skills. Detail-oriented with strong organizational abilities. Familiarity with real estate software and tools. Knowledge of local property laws and regulations. Proactive and self-motivated. Ability to build and maintain client relationships. Fluency in Arabic and English is preferred. We are seeking a highly motivated and customer-oriented Restaurant Call Center Agent to join our dynamic team in Beirut, Lebanon. In this role, you will be the voice of our restaurant, providing exceptional service to our customers over the phone. You will handle customer inquiries, take orders, and ensure that each interaction reflects our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. This position requires strong communication skills, a friendly demeanor, and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment. As a key member of our call center team, you will play a crucial role in enhancing the customer experience and driving sales through effective communication. Responsibilities: Answer incoming calls promptly and professionally, providing accurate information about menu items, specials, and promotions. Take customer orders efficiently while ensuring accuracy and attention to detail. Handle customer inquiries and resolve any issues or complaints with a positive attitude. Maintain an up-to-date knowledge of menu offerings and restaurant policies to provide informed responses. Process orders through the phone system and ensure timely delivery to customers. Collaborate with kitchen staff and delivery personnel to ensure seamless service. Document customer interactions and feedback to improve service quality. Assist in training new team members and share best practices. Participate in team meetings and contribute to the continuous improvement of call center operations. Adhere to company policies and procedures while maintaining a high level of professionalism. Preferred Candidate: Excellent verbal communication skills with a friendly and approachable demeanor. Strong problem-solving abilities and the capacity to remain calm under pressure. Prior experience in a customer service or call center environment is highly desirable. Ability to multitask and manage time effectively in a fast-paced setting. Proficient in using call center software and Microsoft Office applications. Strong attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality service. Team player with a positive attitude and a willingness to learn. Flexibility to work varied shifts, including evenings and weekends. Familiarity with the local food and beverage industry is a plus. High school diploma or equivalent; further education in hospitality or related fields is an advantage. The Physiotherapy Specialist plays a crucial role in the rehabilitation and recovery of patients suffering from physical impairments or disabilities. This position requires a deep understanding of human anatomy, physiology, and the various therapeutic techniques that can aid in recovery. The Physiotherapy Specialist will work closely with clients to develop personalized treatment plans that address their specific needs and goals. This role not only involves direct patient care but also requires collaboration with other healthcare professionals to ensure comprehensive care. Responsibilities: Conduct thorough assessments of patients' physical conditions to determine their rehabilitation needs. Develop and implement individualized treatment plans based on patient assessments. Utilize various physiotherapy techniques, including manual therapy, exercise prescription, and modalities. Monitor patient progress and adjust treatment plans as necessary to optimize recovery. Educate patients and their families on injury prevention and self-management strategies. Maintain accurate and detailed patient records and documentation. Collaborate with other healthcare professionals, such as physicians and occupational therapists, to ensure a multidisciplinary approach to patient care. Stay updated on the latest physiotherapy practices and advancements in the field. Participate in community outreach programs to promote health and wellness. .Provide mentorship and training to junior physiotherapy staff and interns. Preferred Candidate: Strong communication and interpersonal skills to effectively interact with patients and colleagues. Detail-oriented with excellent organizational abilities. Ability to work independently as well as part of a team. Compassionate and empathetic approach to patient care. Proactive in seeking professional development opportunities. Strong problem-solving skills to address patient challenges. Adaptability to work in a fast-paced environment. Commitment to maintaining patient confidentiality and ethical standards. Ability to educate and motivate patients towards their recovery goals. .Proficient in using physiotherapy equipment and technology. The Senior Accountant position at our General Engineering Consultancy in Beirut, Lebanon, is a pivotal role that requires a detail-oriented and analytical professional. This role is designed for individuals who possess a strong foundation in accounting principles and are eager to contribute to the financial health of our organization. The Senior Accountant will be responsible for managing financial records, ensuring compliance with regulations, and providing insightful financial analysis to support decision-making processes. Responsibilities: Prepare and maintain accurate financial statements and reports in accordance with accounting standards. Oversee the accounts payable and receivable processes to ensure timely and accurate processing of transactions. Conduct monthly reconciliations of bank statements and general ledger accounts. Assist in the preparation of budgets and forecasts, providing variance analysis as needed. Ensure compliance with local tax regulations and assist in tax preparation and filing. Collaborate with internal teams to streamline financial processes and improve operational efficiency. Support the annual audit process by preparing necessary documentation and liaising with auditors. Monitor financial transactions for accuracy and compliance with company policies. Provide training and mentorship to junior accounting staff. Stay updated on industry trends and changes in accounting regulations to ensure best practices are followed. Preferred Candidate: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Proficient in accounting software and Microsoft Excel. Effective communication skills, both written and verbal. Adaptability to changing priorities and deadlines. Commitment to continuous professional development. The Senior Accountant position at our General Engineering Consultancy in Beirut, Lebanon, is a pivotal role that requires a detail-oriented and analytical professional. This role is designed for individuals who possess a strong foundation in accounting principles and are eager to contribute to the financial health of our organization. The Senior Accountant will be responsible for managing financial records, ensuring compliance with regulations, and providing insightful financial analysis to support decision-making processes. Responsibilities: Responsibilities: Prepare and maintain accurate financial statements and reports in accordance with accounting standards. Oversee the accounts payable and receivable processes to ensure timely and accurate processing of transactions. Conduct monthly reconciliations of bank statements and general ledger accounts. Collaborate with internal teams to streamline financial processes and improve operational efficiency. Support the annual audit process by preparing necessary documentation and liaising with auditors. Monitor financial transactions for accuracy and compliance with company policies. Provide training and mentorship to junior accounting staff. The Finance Manager plays a crucial role in the hospitality and accommodation sector, ensuring the financial health and sustainability of the organization. This position involves overseeing financial operations, developing financial strategies, and providing insights to support decision-making processes. The Finance Manager will work closely with various departments to ensure that financial practices align with the company's goals and objectives. This role requires a blend of analytical skills, strategic thinking, and a deep understanding of financial regulations and standards. Responsibilities: Develop and implement financial strategies to support the company's growth and profitability. Prepare and analyze financial reports, budgets, and forecasts to provide insights to the management team. Monitor cash flow and ensure that the company maintains adequate liquidity to meet its obligations. Ensure compliance with financial regulations and standards, including tax laws and reporting requirements. Collaborate with department heads to develop budgets and track performance against financial targets. Identify areas for cost reduction and efficiency improvements within the organization. Oversee the preparation of financial statements and ensure accuracy and timeliness. Manage relationships with external auditors and financial institutions. Provide training and support to staff on financial best practices and tools. Stay updated on industry trends and changes in financial regulations that may impact the organization. Preferred Candidate: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities. Proven experience in financial management within the hospitality industry. Detail-oriented with a high level of accuracy in financial reporting. Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines. Strong leadership skills and the ability to manage a team effectively. Proficient in financial software and Microsoft Excel. Adaptable to changing business environments and priorities. Strong ethical standards and integrity in financial practices. Ability to think strategically and contribute to long-term planning. Position Summary Seeking a skilled CNC Machine Operator responsible for setup, operation, inspection, maintenance, stock control, and reporting. Ensures all parts meet specifications, tolerances, and quality standards with zero downtime. Responsibilities Machine Operation & Quality Control ● Set up CNC milling (Hartford LG-1000) & CNC lathe (STL8). ● Load programs, verify offsets, test safely before full run. ● Perform inspections; check GD&T;, tolerances, finishes. ● Document inspection results with setup sheets. Maintenance & Machine Care ● Start shift: spindle warm-up. ● End shift: check coolant, lubrication, evacuate chips, clean area. ● Record actions in Maintenance Log. Stock Control & Inventory ● Manage tooling, holders, consumables (sharpening/replacements). ● Maintain lubrication stock (way-lube, hydraulic oil, coolant). ● Monitor inventory & ensure material/tool availability. Planning & Reporting ● Maintain 2-week production plan. ● Weekly Excel reports (status, tools, quality, utilization). ● Suggest improvements to cycle times, finishes, tool life. ● Record daily setups, runs, tool usage, inspections. Accountability & Responsibility ● Maintain measuring tools (calipers, micrometers, gauges). ● Ensure all finished parts meet requirements before stock. ● Defective parts: no penalty if reported immediately; operator responsible if discovered later. ● Work & Overtime Policy: no pay for inefficiency; paid only if management authorizes overtime. Compensation & Benefits ● Salary: From $1,000 USD/month (based on experience). ● Transportation: $200 USD/month. ● Working Hours: 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM (delays deducted). The Mid-level Associate Lawyer position with Cortbaoui & Kanaan Law Firm in Beirut, Lebanon offers a unique opportunity for legal professionals looking to advance their careers in a dynamic and challenging environment. This role is ideal for individuals who possess a strong foundation in corporate and commercial law and are eager to contribute to a collaborative team. The successful candidate will contribute to drafting agreements, conducting due diligence exercises, and undertaking legal research under both Lebanese and GCC laws. The successful candidate will also actively support senior lawyers in transactional matters. The firm values professionalism, integrity, and a commitment to excellence, making it a great place for career growth. Responsibilities Review and draft corporate and commercial agreements. Assist in legal due diligence exercises. Support senior lawyers in reviewing transaction documents and advising clients on corporate and commercial matters. Conduct legal and regulatory research under both Lebanese and GCC laws. Communicate and engage with clients, including participation in meetings and preparing updates. The Social Media Specialist is a dynamic role focused on enhancing the online presence of our personal care center. This position requires a creative individual who can engage with our audience through various social media platforms, develop content strategies, and analyze performance metrics. The ideal candidate will be responsible for building brand awareness, driving customer engagement, and increasing overall reach through innovative social media campaigns. Responsibilities: Develop and implement social media strategies to enhance brand visibility. Create engaging content tailored to our target audience across multiple platforms. Monitor social media channels for customer feedback and respond promptly. Analyze performance metrics to optimize future campaigns and strategies. Collaborate with marketing and design teams to ensure cohesive messaging. Stay updated on industry trends and competitor activities to inform strategy. Manage social media advertising campaigns to increase reach and engagement. Organize and participate in promotional events to boost social media presence. Develop and maintain a content calendar for consistent posting. Train and guide team members on best social media practices. Preferred Candidate: Strong communication skills, both written and verbal. Proven experience in social media management or digital marketing. Creative mindset with a passion for storytelling. Ability to analyze data and derive actionable insights. Familiarity with graphic design tools and content creation. Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Knowledge of SEO and online marketing strategies. Adaptability to changing trends and technologies. Strong understanding of the personal care industry and its audience. Position Overview We are seeking a Senior Infrastructure Engineer to join our team and take ownership of the company’s infrastructure systems. As the inaugural infrastructure hire, you will play a pivotal role in designing, implementing, and maintaining the technical foundation that supports our business. This is a hands-on position with significant responsibility, working closely with engineering and product teams to ensure our systems are secure, scalable, and highly performant. As the organization grows, this role will evolve to include defining and shaping the structure of our infrastructure team and establishing best practices across the company. Key Responsibilities Infrastructure Management Design, provision, and maintain AWS resources using Infrastructure-as-Code tools such as Terraform or CloudFormation. Manage compute, storage, databases, networking, and IAM policies, including EC2, ECS/EKS, S3, EFS, RDS, DynamoDB, VPCs, and Load Balancers. Containerization & Orchestration Build, optimize, and maintain Docker images and registries. Operate container clusters (ECS, EKS, Kubernetes) and manage deployments using Helm or similar tools. CI/CD & Release Engineering Architect, maintain, and optimize end-to-end CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab CI, Bitbucket Pipelines). Automate build, test, security scanning, and deployment processes, including blue/green and canary releases. Enforce branch-and-release policies, code reviews, and pipeline governance. Monitoring, Logging & Reliability Implement and tune observability and monitoring systems (CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK/EFK, Datadog, Sentry). Define and track SLIs/SLOs, error budgets, and key operational metrics. Participate in on-call rotations, incident response, and post-incident reviews; maintain runbooks and operational documentation. Security & Compliance Manage secrets and credentials using AWS Secrets Manager, HashiCorp Vault, or Parameter Store. Apply security best practices to networks, hosts, and containers. Conduct regular security assessments and remediate vulnerabilities promptly. Collaboration & Process Improvement Collaborate with development teams to resolve production issues and optimize deployment and feedback processes. Document architecture, operational procedures, and standard operating practices. Identify opportunities to improve cost-efficiency, performance, reliability, and workflow processes. At Jadded , we transform interiors into high-end yet practical environments. Specializing in vinyl wrapping, flooring, wall panels, gypsum, and full interior fit-outs , our vision is to deliver affordable luxury with zero disruption . We are now seeking a talented Interior Architect to join our growing team. The Interior Architect will bridge design and execution — developing design concepts, producing BOQs and drawings, and coordinating with the project team to ensure seamless delivery. This is a client-facing role that requires both creativity and technical precision . Key Responsibilities Meet clients to understand design needs, lifestyle, and budget. Develop design concepts and present mood boards, layouts, and material selections. Prepare technical drawings, BOQs, and 3D renders for client approval. Conduct site inspections & surveys , ensuring accurate measurements. Coordinate with suppliers and subcontractors on materials and finishes. Support the Project Manager during execution to ensure design intent is maintained. Manage change requests and ensure they are documented. Stay updated with interior design trends, sustainable materials, and cost-efficient solutions. At Jadded , we transform interiors into high-end yet practical environments. This role involves ensuring an overall sustainable supply chain readiness and securing all factory operation needs. Main Responsibilities : 1- Lead, empower and develop all team personnel to handle multifunctional duties in compliance with quality & safety standards. 2- Continuously perform daily inspection and on-floor patrol for warehouses, main reception yard and machine areas. 3- Take responsibility for all CIL and 5S organization work within the designated areas. 4- Properly assess and train all the team working lines for increased output performance. 5- Practice an efficient time management and job distribution within the team. 6- Maintain and improve all the designated machine's condition by proper reporting to the maintenance of any breakdown and thru rigorous follow-up on repairs and preventive maintenance schedules. 7- Carry out all necessary tasks & procedures of material reception & supply, and storage while maintaining proper documentation and inventory. 8- Register, track, control and follow all bales production and delivery, waste and shredding operation. 9- Lead the proper implementation of good work behavior related to production quality, clean factory and safe machinery work and fire risk awareness. 10- Practice and apply good warehousing area management under FIFO concept, in addition to dynamic planning that enables to accommodate the maximum storage capacity. 11- Proactively foresee and contribute to continuous work improvement. Astrophysics EMEA is seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Service Engineer to join our team. This role is ideal for fresh graduates , who are welcome and will be given priority. The Service Engineer will be responsible for the installation, maintenance, and technical support of X-ray security inspection equipment across Europe, the Middle East, and Africa (EMEA) . The role also includes providing both customer and dealer training to ensure optimal equipment performance and user proficiency. Key Responsibilities Install, configure, and commission X-ray security equipment at customer sites. Perform preventive and corrective maintenance to ensure maximum system uptime. Diagnose and resolve technical issues in a timely and professional manner. Deliver operator training for customers at the end of every installation. Conduct technical training sessions for dealers’ engineers to enhance their servicing capabilities. Prepare service and installation reports with clear documentation of all work performed. Collaborate with the technical support and engineering teams to escalate and resolve complex issues. Ensure compliance with company standards, customer requirements, and safety regulations. Frequent travel across Europe, the Middle East, and Africa (up to 70%) to support regional projects and service needs. Head of Marketing (Creative + Growth) BBCorp is hiring a creative, data-driven Head of Marketing to own brand, growth, and lifecycle end-to-end. You’ll set the strategy, build the team, ship standout creative, and hit aggressive acquisition and retention targets. If ambiguity slows you down, this isn’t your role. What You’ll Own Strategy & Leadership: Build the marketing vision and plan across brand, product marketing, growth, content, PR, and partnerships. Hire and lead a high-output team and agency roster. Creative Direction: Define brand system, voice, and campaigns; push world-class creative across paid, organic, social, video, and onsite. Growth Engine: Full-funnel ownership—paid media, SEO, ASO/landing pages, referrals, influencer/affiliate, partnerships, and conversion rate optimization. Lifecycle & CRM: Architect onboarding, activation, and retention via email, push, SMS, and in-app. Product Marketing: Positioning, messaging, narrative, and competitive strategy; partner tightly with Product and Sales/BD. Insights & Analytics: Set the measurement framework, build dashboards, run experiments, and make calls on budget allocation. PR & Comms: Own the story. Manage media, thought leadership, speaking, and crisis comms. Budget & Forecasting: Own the marketing P&L; model scenarios, track ROI, and reallocate in real time. Outcomes (Non-Negotiable) 90 days: Clear strategy, hiring plan, channel diagnostics, first creative refresh live, baseline KPIs instrumented. 180 days: Scalable acquisition model with positive signal 12 months: Durable growth engine with You Are A builder with 4+ years in marketing, including 2–3 years leading teams across both brand + performance . A creative leader with a strong portfolio of campaigns that moved numbers, not just won awards. Fluent with experimentation, attribution, and marketing finance (cohorts, payback, incrementality, MMM/MTA basics). Operator DNA: plan → resource → execute → measure → iterate—fast. Fintech/Consumer Apps/Trading/Payments experience is a strong plus. Tooling We Use Ad Platforms: Google, Meta, TikTok, Programmatic Analytics: GA4, Mixpanel/Amplitude, Looker/Tableau CRM/Lifecycle: Braze/Klaviyo/Iterable, Segment Creative: Figma, Adobe Suite; UGC/influencer platforms Reporting & Team Reports to: CEO/GM Direct reports initially: Performance Lead, Brand/Creative Lead, Content/Comms, CRM/Lifecycle (hire and shape this) Head of Marketing (Creative + Growth) BBCorp is hiring a creative, data-driven Head of Marketing to own brand, growth, and lifecycle end-to-end. Growth Engine: Full-funnel ownership—paid media, SEO, ASO/landing pages, referrals, influencer/affiliate, partnerships, and conversion rate optimization. POSITION VALUE: The CSO is the first point of contact for customers and the key operator in preparing contracts, processing reservations, and ensuring excellent client service. This role handles all administrative tasks of bookings, payments, system input, and client communication. DAILY RESPONSIBILITIES: - Receive client inquiries (walk-in, phone, email, WhatsApp). - Check fleet availability via WheelSyS system. - Prepare new rental contracts in WheelSyS. - Verify client documents (ID, driving license, passport, insurance). - Explain rental terms, conditions, and insurance coverage to clients. - Handle payments (cash, card, corporate account bookings). - Open, update, and close rental contracts properly. - Ensure client satisfaction during car delivery and return. - Coordinate with Operation Manager for vehicle readiness and availability. - Upload contract files and customer IDs to digital archives (Google Drive). WEEKLY RESPONSIBILITIES: - Review and submit weekly closed contracts to Accountant. - Follow up on corporate account balances for upcoming bookings. - Report any customer service issues to Branch Manager. - Update CRM system with client notes and history. MONTHLY RESPONSIBILITIES: - Assist in preparing monthly sales reports for Branch Manager. - Review corporate account receivables with Accountant for overdue balances. - Participate in monthly customer service quality reviews. Role Overview We are looking for a Senior frontend UI developer who thrives on building seamless, engaging user interfaces. In this role, you will transform ideas and designs into performant, accessible, and scalable web experiences. You will be working with modern frameworks like Astro and Vue.js , collaborating closely with designers and backend engineers to deliver interfaces that feel intuitive, fast, and reliable. Responsibilities: · Craft elegant, responsive UIs using Astro and Vue.js , ensuring smooth interactions across all devices. · Develop reusable, modular components that follow best practices for scalability, accessibility (WCAG standards), and maintainability. · Fine-tune frontend performance for faster load times, responsive layouts, and SEO optimization. · Collaborate with backend engineers to integrate APIs and ensure seamless data flow. · Translate wireframes and design concepts into fully functional, production-ready interfaces. · Maintain high-quality code with Git , task management tools like Jira , and peer reviews. · Rigorously test interfaces across browsers and devices to guarantee consistency and reliability. · Drive improvements in frontend architecture, tools, and development workflows. · Leverage AI-driven design and coding tools to speed up development and maintain design consistency. Job Summary: The Unit Manager is responsible for leading a team of insurance advisors or agents to achieve sales targets, drive growth, and maintain a high standard of customer service. This role includes recruiting, training, mentoring, and monitoring performance while ensuring compliance with company policies and industry regulations. Key Responsibilities: Team Recruitment & Development: Recruit, interview, and onboard new insurance agents/advisors. Provide continuous training and development programs. Coach and mentor the team to improve productivity and skills. Sales Management: Set sales goals and monitor daily, weekly, and monthly performance. Implement effective sales strategies to achieve individual and team targets. Conduct regular team meetings and performance reviews. Operational Duties: Ensure all agents comply with internal policies and regulatory guidelines. Manage reports on sales, lead conversion, and productivity metrics. Coordinate with underwriting, claims, and customer service departments. Client Relationship & Business Development: Support agents in client prospecting, presentations, and closing deals. Promote cross-selling and upselling of insurance products. Maintain strong relationships with key clients and resolve escalated issues. Performance Monitoring: Analyze market trends and competition. Track and report key performance indicators (KPIs). Motivate the team to exceed expectations and handle underperformance. Required Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, or related field. Minimum 3–5 years of experience in sales or agency management. Proven leadership and team management skills. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Goal-oriented with a results-driven approach. Position Overview: We are seeking an experienced UX/UI Designer to contribute to the development of high-quality, user-centered digital solutions. The successful candidate will play a key role in defining and implementing user experience strategies, ensuring design consistency, and enhancing usability across our software platforms. Key Responsibilities: · Advocate for the importance of User Experience within the organization and educate teams on UX best practices. · Design user-centric solutions that meet both business objectives and user needs. · Develop user flows, wireframes, interactive prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups to address complex business and user challenges. · Establish and maintain a design system to ensure consistency and accelerate development across platforms. · Identify UX issues and propose actionable solutions to relevant stakeholders. · Gather, analyze, and incorporate user feedback, analytics, and usability findings to optimize the user experience. · Communicate design concepts and solutions effectively to stakeholders at all levels. · Collaborate closely with two Scrum teams responsible for software maintenance and enhancement. · Conduct UX research using methods such as user interviews, surveys, competitor analysis, laboratory studies, and analytics evaluation. We are seeking a motivated and organized Dispatch Supervisor to oversee the daily operations of our dispatch team. The role involves monitoring order flow, coordinating with drivers and call center agents, and ensuring efficient, on-time deliveries while maintaining high service standards. The Dispatch Supervisor will act as the link between management, drivers, and customer service to ensure smooth operations. Key Responsibilities Supervise and lead the dispatch team, ensuring efficient assignment of orders and delivery routes. Monitor real-time order flow and proactively resolve bottlenecks, overlaps, or delays. Coordinate closely with call center, kitchen, and drivers to ensure accuracy and speed of service. Track driver performance, attendance, and compliance with company policies. Handle escalations related to delivery issues and provide immediate solutions. Generate and analyze daily/weekly reports on dispatch efficiency, order accuracy, and delivery times. Train and coach dispatch team members to improve performance and customer satisfaction. Enforce discipline and adherence to company policies and operational standards. Suggest and implement process improvements to optimize operations. Qualifications & Skills Proven experience in dispatching, logistics, delivery operations, or similar supervisory role. Strong leadership and team management skills. Excellent communication and problem-solving abilities. Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment. Strong knowledge of dispatch systems, GPS tracking, and delivery operations. Proficient in MS Office and/or dispatch management software. Flexible schedule (including evenings, weekends, and holidays as required). Preferred Attributes Previous experience in food & beverage, restaurant, or logistics industry. Strong analytical and organizational skills. Customer-first mindset with attention to detail. The Executive Assistant plays a crucial role in supporting the executive team of an industrial production company in Beirut, Lebanon. This position requires a proactive individual who can manage a variety of administrative tasks while ensuring the smooth operation of the executive office. The ideal candidate will possess exceptional organizational skills, a keen attention to detail, and the ability to communicate effectively with various stakeholders. This role is pivotal in enhancing productivity and facilitating communication within the organization. Responsibilities: Manage and maintain the executive's calendar, scheduling appointments and meetings efficiently. Prepare and organize documents, reports, and presentations for executive meetings. Act as a liaison between executives and internal/external stakeholders, ensuring clear communication. Coordinate travel arrangements, including itineraries, accommodations, and transportation. Handle confidential information with discretion and professionalism. Assist in the preparation of budgets and financial reports as needed. Conduct research and compile data to support decision-making processes. Organize and maintain filing systems, both electronic and physical. Support the planning and execution of company events and meetings. Provide general administrative support to the executive team as required. Preferred Candidate: Strong organizational and multitasking abilities. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Proficiency in office software and technology. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. High level of professionalism and integrity. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Experience in an industrial production environment is a plus. Ability to adapt to changing priorities and work under pressure. Fluency in English and Arabic is preferred. Previous experience as an executive assistant or in a similar role. The General Manager of a 5-star hotel in Beirut, Lebanon, plays a pivotal role in ensuring the smooth operation and overall success of the establishment. This position requires a dynamic leader with extensive experience in the hospitality industry, capable of driving business growth while maintaining the highest standards of service and guest satisfaction. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing strategies that enhance the hotel's reputation, optimize operational efficiency, and foster a positive work environment for staff. Responsibilities: Oversee daily hotel operations, ensuring compliance with company policies and procedures. Develop and implement strategic plans to enhance guest satisfaction and increase revenue. Manage budgets, forecasts, and financial reports to ensure profitability. Lead and mentor department heads to achieve operational excellence and staff development. Establish and maintain relationships with key stakeholders, including suppliers and local businesses. Monitor market trends and competitor activities to identify opportunities for growth. Ensure adherence to health and safety regulations and maintain high standards of cleanliness and maintenance. Coordinate marketing and promotional activities to attract new guests and retain existing clientele. Conduct regular staff training sessions to enhance service delivery and operational efficiency. Resolve guest complaints and issues promptly to ensure a positive experience. Preferred Candidate: Proven experience in a managerial role within the hospitality industry. Strong leadership and team management skills. Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities. Ability to work under pressure and handle multiple tasks simultaneously. In-depth knowledge of hotel operations and financial management. Fluency in multiple languages is a plus. Strong problem-solving skills and a customer-focused mindset. Experience in developing and implementing marketing strategies. Proficient in using hotel management software and technology. Commitment to maintaining high standards of quality and service. We are looking for a seasoned engineer with Specialization in – JavaScript/TypeScript, AWS who is ready to take the lead. This role goes beyond coding—you will be steering technical strategy, mentoring engineers, and making the architectural calls that shape our Voice AI platform. You will thrive if you enjoy working in dynamic, startup-style environments where adaptability, ownership, and clear decision-making are essential. This is a chance to have a direct impact: you will guide the engineering culture, own core system design, and help scale both our product and our team. ROLE Lead a team of developers in an Agile setup—facilitating planning sessions, standups, and code reviews. Architect and build reliable front-end and back-end solutions with Next.js, Elysia.js, and TypeScript/JavaScript. Drive decisions around system architecture, infrastructure, and deployment strategies. Oversee and optimize SQL databases for performance and reliability. Own our DevOps roadmap, from CI/CD pipelines to AWS deployments (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, API Gateway, CloudWatch). Set high standards for code quality, scalability, and testing practices. Mentor engineers, provide hands-on guidance, and help scale the team capabilities. The Human Resources Officer plays a crucial role in managing the workforce of the hospitality and accommodation sector in Beirut, Lebanon. This position involves overseeing various HR functions, ensuring compliance with labor laws, and fostering a positive work environment. The HR Officer will be responsible for implementing HR strategies that align with the company's goals, enhancing employee engagement, and supporting organizational development. Responsibilities: Manage the recruitment process, including job postings, screening, and interviewing candidates. Develop and implement HR policies and procedures to ensure compliance with local labor laws. Conduct employee onboarding and orientation programs to facilitate smooth integration into the company. Oversee employee performance management processes, including evaluations and feedback sessions. Address employee relations issues, providing guidance and support to resolve conflicts. Organize training and development programs to enhance employee skills and career growth. Maintain and update employee records and HR databases to ensure accuracy and confidentiality. Assist in the development of compensation and benefits programs to attract and retain talent. Monitor employee satisfaction and engagement through surveys and feedback mechanisms. Collaborate with management to develop strategies for workforce planning and talent management. Preferred Candidate: Strong interpersonal and communication skills. Proven experience in HR management, preferably in the hospitality industry. Knowledge of labor laws and regulations in Lebanon. Ability to handle sensitive information with confidentiality and integrity. Proficient in HR software and Microsoft Office Suite. Strong organizational and multitasking abilities. Problem-solving skills and a proactive approach to challenges. Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment. Flexibility to adapt to changing business needs. Commitment to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace. Excellent knowledge of Lebanese Labor Law & NSSF calculation. Astrophysics EMEA office is looking for a self-motivated regional sales manager to be based in Lebanon and to help us expand our clientele base and sales in the EMEA. The position reports to the EMEA director of sales and it offers great opportunity for advancement and growth. Position Overview We are seeking an experienced Senior Full Stack Software Engineer to join our team in Beirut. This role will be instrumental in the modernization of our digital platforms, the development of new functionalities, and the delivery of high-quality technical solutions. The successful candidate will demonstrate strong technical expertise, leadership in innovation, and the ability to collaborate effectively across multidisciplinary teams. Key Responsibilities: · Modernization of User Interfaces: Redesign and enhance web portals to provide a seamless, intuitive, and contemporary user experience. · Application Development: Upgrade existing applications and design new features leveraging modern web technologies. · C ross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with backend developers, product managers, and stakeholders to define requirements and deliver scalable, high-performing solutions. · Innovation & Research: Identify opportunities for optimization, lead R&D initiatives, and implement innovative functionalities across platforms. · Code Quality & Reliability: Develop, review, and maintain clean, efficient, and well-documented code while ensuring compliance with industry best practices. · System Documentation: Prepare and maintain comprehensive documentation of system designs, integrations, and technical processes. · Continuous Improvement: Proactively identify and implement enhancements to optimize user experience and system performance. Required Qualifications: A-Technical Competencies · C#/.NET Development: Extensive experience in designing and developing applications using C# and the .NET framework. · Front-End Development: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ASP.NET MVC, Angular/React, and Web API. A demonstrated commitment to continuous learning and expanding technical expertise is expected. · Database Proficiency: Strong command of SQL and database design; familiarity with Oracle Database PL/SQL is highly desirable. · API Development: Demonstrated experience in designing, developing, and consuming APIs, including SOAP and REST. · Emerging Technologies: Familiarity with AI development tools (e.g., Cursor, Windsurf, Claude, or similar) will be considered an asset. B-Professional Competencies · Autonomy & Adaptability: Ability to work independently, prioritize effectively, and manage complex and evolving environments. · Analytical Capability: Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to resolve technical challenges with efficiency. · Communication Skills: Excellent ability to articulate technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. · Attention to Detail: Proven track record of delivering high-quality, reliable, and well-structured solutions. About Us: We are committed to helping individuals and families secure their financial future through tailored life insurance solutions. We are looking for driven and customer-focused professionals to join our team as Sales Specialists. This is a rewarding opportunity to grow your career while making a meaningful impact in the lives of others. Job Responsibilities: * Build and maintain strong client relationships by offering personalized life insurance solutions. * Assess client needs and provide recommendations based on their financial goals. * Educate clients on the benefits and value of life insurance coverage. * Consistently meet or exceed sales targets and performance goals. * Stay updated on industry trends, product offerings, and regulatory changes. * Deliver exceptional service and maintain long-term client engagement. What We Offer: * Competitive financing with attractive commission and bonuses. * Extensive training and career development programs. * Opportunities for advancement within a growing organization. * Flexible work structure. * Comprehensive benefits including health, and pension plans. Drive sales and achieve sales targets by promoting our products and building strong customer relationships. Maintain store presentation standards, including merchandising, stocking, Ironing and maintaining a clean and organized environment. Description: Job Summary We’re hiring a Waitress at Little Krazy, a whimsical fine-dinning restaurant. As a Captain Waitress , you will take customer orders, provide detailed knowledge of the menu, make personalized recommendations, and ensure every guest feels the rhythm, warmth, and energy of Saudi hospitality. This role combines professional service, salesmanship, and storytelling flair to deliver a unique and memorable dining journey. You’re not just waiting tables — you’re setting the stage for an unforgettable experience. You’ll be welcoming guests with energy, unique flair, and a bold personality. Your presence, voice, and energy should echo that spirit. Whether it’s through a warm smile, storytelling, or helping guests discover new flavors, your job is to turn every visit into a cultural experience. Key Responsibilities: Warmly greet guests with enthusiasm. Present, explain, and promote the menu, including specials, ingredients, preparation methods, and cultural context. Proactively upsell premium dishes, chef’s specials, signature drinks, and desserts to enhance the guest experience and boost revenue. Make confident, thoughtful recommendations based on guest preferences and dietary needs. Accurately take food and beverage orders and input them into the POS system. Ensure guest satisfaction throughout the meal and anticipate their needs proactively. Handle complaints or concerns promptly and professionally, escalating when necessary. Embody and express the spirit of the theme through language, tone, energy, and style of service. Maintain full knowledge of all food and beverage offerings, including allergens and dietary options. Work closely with kitchen and bar staff to ensure timely and accurate order fulfillment. Assist in table setting and resetting according to restaurant standards. Maintain a clean and organized service area. Uphold hygiene and grooming standards and wear the designated themed uniform with pride. Aspire Software is looking for an Intermediate Quality Assurance Analyst to join our team in Lebanon. Here is a little window into our company: Aspire Software operates and manages wholly owned software companies, providing mission-critical solutions across multiple verticals. By implementing industry best practices, Aspire delivers a time sensitive integration process, and the operation of a decentralized model has allowed it to become a hub for creating rapid growth by reinvesting in its portfolio. About the Role ValPay is a leading payments company dedicated to leveraging data and technology to drive innovation in the payments industry. We are seeking a skilled QA Engineer with experience in payments and/or financial data. We’re looking for a QA Engineer to join our dynamic team and play a key role in maintaining and improving the quality of our products through comprehensive testing and collaboration. Key Responsibilities: Develop, execute, and maintain test plans, test cases, and automation scripts for our desktop, web, and mobile applications. Ensure product quality for systems and applications by performing functional, regression, and integration testing. Test Web UIs and RESTful APIs, validating responses, performance, and data accuracy. Collaborate with the development and DevOps teams to identify and resolve issues quickly and effectively. Automate repetitive test cases using tools and frameworks like Selenium, Cypress, or equivalent. Monitor and maintain product health using testing pipelines integrated with CI/CD tools (GitHub Actions, AWS, Mongo Atlas). Perform cross-platform testing for mobile and desktop apps (e.g., React, MAUI). Track and document bugs in collaboration with development teams, ensuring resolution within sprint cycles. Conduct performance and security testing for both on-premise and cloud-hosted solutions. Tech Stack & Tools Languages & Frameworks: JavaScript, React, NextJS Test Automation Tools: Cypress, Swagger, CI/CD Tools: GitHub Actions, AWS Code pipeline Databases: PostgreSQL, Mongo Hosting Environments: AWS (S3) Aspire Software is looking for an Intermediate Quality Assurance Analyst to join our team in Lebanon.
