Job Duties and Responsibilities Charting out detailed plans for every event in alignment with the key objective Executing all aspects of the event, including setup, operation, and breakdown Promoting the brand through innovative and audience-engaging activities at the event Monitoring event budgets, negotiating contracts, and dealing with vendors Working closely with the team to ensure smooth operations and successful events Resolving potential problems effectively and efficiently with a solutions-driven mindset Coordinating with various parties for fundraising initiatives Charting out detailed plans for every event in alignment with the key objective Executing all aspects of the event, including setup, operation, and breakdown Promoting the brand through innovative and audience-engaging activities at the event Monitoring event budgets, negotiating contracts, and dealing with vendors Working closely with the team to ensure smooth operations and successful events Resolving potential problems effectively and efficiently with a solutions-driven mindset Coordinating with various parties for fundraising initiatives Required Qualifications Proven experience in event planning and organization Strong project management skills Excellent written and verbal communication skills The ability to think quickly, problem-solve and make decisions under pressure Financial literacy and budgeting experience A deep understanding of audience engagement strategies and brand promotion techniques A proven track record in running successful fundraising initiatives Proven experience in event planning and organization Strong project management skills Excellent written and verbal communication skills The ability to think quickly, problem-solve and make decisions under pressure Financial literacy and budgeting experience A deep understanding of audience engagement strategies and brand promotion techniques A proven track record in running successful fundraising initiatives

Company Description The Company: Sucafina is the leading sustainable Farm to Roaster coffee company, with a family tradition in commodities that stretches back to 1905. Today, with more than 1,400 employees in 34 countries, we help stakeholders worldwide to find the perfect coffee solutions. We embed technology, innovation, and sustainability throughout the supply chain, creating shared value for all by Investing in Farmers, Caring for People, and Protecting Our Planet. For more information, visit www.sucafina.com. What are we looking for: We are looking for entrepreneurs, techies, passionate, eager to learn, humble, with a positive attitude and a high level of integrity People. Flexible and willing to take challenges, work and live in coffee-producing countries, People who want to build expertise and a career in the coffee business and are ready to go the extra mile. What we offer: We offer within our pleasant family environment, great opportunities to learn and grow, we offer challenges and exposure to multicultural environments, on-merit base compensation, and free coffee around the clock! From our Sucafina Center of Excellence in Beirut you will join colleagues with a shared vision: Helping Beyers Koffie to be the leading, sustainable private label coffee roaster in Europe. The organization has been increasingly internationalizing in recent years. Today, Beyers - as part of Sucafina Group - has grown into the largest coffee roaster in Belgium and a major player in the European private label coffee market. Here you will have the opportunity to be part of a company that invests in people and where collegiality, flexibility and entrepreneurship are encouraged. Job Description Summary of the role We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Junior Accounting Analyst to join our team. The candidate will be responsible for performing various accounting tasks to ensure the accuracy and efficiency of our financial operations. Responsibilities of the role: Daily : Process and record journal entries. Handle and book suppliers' and clients' invoices. Process and book bank transactions Responsible for shared mailboxes Weekly : Running cash reports Creating manual sales invoices for one-offs Monthly : Bank reconciliations and sign off Suppliers’ reconciliation Clients’ reconciliation Intercompany reconciliation Process Accruals and prepaid Assisting in closing process Additional tasks in time: Assistance in SAP Qualifications Qualifications and Skills: 1 year of relevant accounting experien Bachelor's degree or higher, with a specialization in accounting and finance Strong knowledge of accounting principles and financial reconciliation processes Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Office, especially Excel Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills Strong communication and time-management skills Additional Information Soft skills Ability to work independently while also thriving in a team-oriented environment Proactive, curious, and eager to learn, with a drive for continuous improvement Aptitude for working in a fast paced, very dynamic work environment Self-motivated Languages Excellent knowledge of English (written and verbal communication skills) Knowledge of any other language is a plus (French) The Company: Sucafina is the leading sustainable Farm to Roaster coffee company, with a family tradition in commodities that stretches back to 1905. Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Tastelab to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Tastelab Job Description Job Summary: We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Event Coordinator to plan, manage, and execute various events. The ideal candidate will be responsible for coordinating all event logistics, ensuring smooth operations, and delivering exceptional experiences for attendees. This role requires strong communication, multitasking, and problem-solving skills. Key Responsibilities: Plan, organize, and execute events, including corporate meetings, conferences, trade shows, fundraisers, and social gatherings. Collaborate with clients to understand event objectives and requirements. Develop event budgets, negotiate contracts, and manage vendor relationships. Secure venues, catering, entertainment, and other necessary services. Oversee event setup, execution, and breakdown, ensuring all elements run seamlessly. Coordinate with marketing and PR teams to promote events and manage attendee registration. Handle logistics such as transportation, accommodations, and scheduling. Troubleshoot and resolve any issues that arise before, during, and after events. Maintain compliance with health, safety, and legal regulations. Evaluate event success through feedback and reporting. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in Event Management, Hospitality, Marketing, or a related field (preferred). Proven experience in event planning and coordination. Strong project management skills with the ability to multitask. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills. Proficiency in budgeting and contract negotiation. Experience working with corporate, nonprofit, or large-scale event planning. Knowledge of event marketing strategies. Certification in event planning (e.g., Certified Meeting Professional - CMP) is a plus. Additional Information This role may require working in office settings as well as on-site at various event venues. The job often involves irregular hours, including evenings and weekends, depending on event schedules. Company Description EXEO is a multi-specialist Managed Services Cloud and Cybersecurity Provider founded in 2012. Its mission is to guide clients on adopting digital services to run and scale their businesses securely, specializing in securing and managing hybrid workloads in Cloud environments. With headquarters in Paris and branches in Beirut and Dubai, Exeo offers 24/7 managed services to clients in 16 countries and is dedicated to detecting and preventing threats and anomalies to ensure safe and secure operations. The driving force behind our daily work at EXEO is Excellence, Creativity, Humanity, Reliability, and Integrity. Read more about us: https://exeo.net/en/ What We Offer Opportunity to shape and lead Exeo’s digital voice in EMEA. A collaborative and international team. Exposure to the fast-growing fields of cloud, cybersecurity, and digital services. Job Description We are looking for a creative and organized professional to manage and grow Exeo’s presence on Social Media and through email campaigns . This role combines content creation, publishing, and audience engagement with the goal of strengthening Exeo’s voice in cloud, cybersecurity, and digital services. You will be responsible for planning, producing, and managing content that reflects our values, builds trust with our community, and engages clients and prospects across EMEA. Qualifications Key Responsibilities Develop and execute a monthly content calendar for LinkedIn, Instagram, and email. Write, design, and publish posts that highlight Exeo’s expertise, people, and services. Manage day-to-day activity on LinkedIn, Instagram and other social media, ensuring timely responses and engagement. Coordinate and send regular email campaigns and newsletters. Work with the leadership team to align messaging with business goals. Track performance across all channels and provide simple, actionable reports. Stay current with industry trends in cloud, cybersecurity, and digital communications. Additional Information Qualifications Proven experience managing social media channels (LinkedIn and Instagram required). Strong skills in writing, editing, and visual storytelling. Familiarity with email marketing platforms (Mailchimp, HubSpot, or equivalent). Understanding of B2B communication and professional audiences. Basic design skills in Canva is a plus. Knowledge of analytics and ability to interpret performance metrics. Self-motivated, organized, and able to manage multiple projects at once. Experience in the tech, cybersecurity, or cloud sectors is an advantage. Mastering French and English is a must. Job Description: Foreground is a recruitment consultancy partnering with companies across the GCC, UK, and selected international markets to help them attract and hire exceptional talent. We deliver tailored recruitment solutions across industries and work closely with our clients to understand their business goals and hiring needs. We are looking for a B2B Lead Generator to join our remote team. In this role, you will focus on identifying potential clients, initiating contact with decision-makers, and creating qualified opportunities for our business development team. Role Overview The Lead Generator will be responsible for researching companies, engaging with decision-makers, and generating qualified B2B leads for our recruitment services. This role requires a commercially minded individual with strong communication skills and the ability to connect with senior business stakeholders. Key Responsibilities Research and identify potential client companies across target markets and industries. Conduct outbound outreach via LinkedIn, email, and calls to introduce Foregrounds recruitment solutions to decision-makers (HR Directors, CEOs, Founders, etc.). Engage prospects to understand their hiring challenges and qualify opportunities for the sales team. Schedule discovery meetings and hand over warm leads to the business development team. Build and maintain a structured pipeline of B2B leads and track outreach performance in CRM tools. Collaborate with the team to refine messaging, targeting, and lead generation strategies. Consistently meet and exceed monthly KPIs for qualified opportunities. Qualifications & Skills Minimum 2 years of B2B lead generation or business development experience , ideally within recruitment, HR services, SaaS, or professional services. Proven track record of engaging with business decision-makers and generating qualified B2B leads. Strong communication and interpersonal skills with a consultative outreach approach. Proficiency in LinkedIn Sales Navigator, CRM platforms (HubSpot, Salesforce, etc.), and email automation tools. Highly organised, target-driven, and self-motivated with the ability to work independently in a remote environment. Commercially aware and confident in initiating conversations with senior stakeholders. What We Offer Competitive fixed salary plus attractive commission based on converted leads. Fully remote role with flexible working hours. Opportunity to grow into a business development or client acquisition role. Supportive and collaborative environment focused on professional growth. Build and maintain a structured pipeline of B2B leads and track outreach performance in CRM tools. Collaborate with the team to refine messaging, targeting, and lead generation strategies. Consistently meet and exceed monthly KPIs for qualified opportunities. Murex is a global fintech leader in trading, risk management and processing solutions for capital markets. Operating from our 19 offices, 3 400 Murexians from over 65 different nationalities ensure the development, implementation and support of our platform which is used by banks, asset managers, corporations and utilities, across the world. Join Murex and work on the challenges of an industry at the forefront of innovation and thrive in a people-centric environment. You’ll be part of one global team where you can learn fast and stay true to yourself. Your Mission: You will design, implement and evolve solutions in the framework that orchestrates the software development lifecycle, quality assurance activities, and release management processes, all while ensuring backward compatibility across systems and versions. Responsibilities: Design, develop, test, and deploy high-quality software solutions Perform code reviews and ensure best practices in software development Collaborate with product managers, DevOps, and other engineers Mentor and support junior developers Participate in architecture and design discussions Optimize application performance and scalability by driving technical enablers Ensure security and data protection in software design Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends Job Requirements: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or Engineering and/or equivalent experience 3+ years of software development experience Strong proficiency in Java Solid understanding of software engineering principles, object-oriented programming and design patterns Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices English is a must, French a plus Teamwork and cross-team collaboration Analytical thinking and Problem-solving skills Collaborative mindset and ability to work effectively across teams Preferred Qualifications: Experience in developing applications using Spring Boot framework Knowledge of containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) Experience in web application development using Angular framework Experience in Agile/Scrum environments Murex is a global fintech leader in trading, risk management and processing solutions for capital markets. About Us We are a global climate technologies company engineered for sustainability. We create sustainable and efficient residential, commercial and industrial spaces through HVACR technologies. We protect temperature-sensitive goods throughout the cold chain. And we bring comfort to people globally. Best-in-class engineering, design and manufacturing combined with category-leading brands in compression, controls, software and monitoring solutions result in next-generation climate technology that is built for the needs of the world ahead. Whether you are a professional looking for a career change, an undergraduate student exploring your first opportunity, or recent graduate with an advanced degree, we have opportunities that will allow you to innovate, be challenged and make an impact. Join our team and start your journey today! If you are a Team Lead professional and looking for an opportunity to grow, Copeland has an exciting opportunity for you! Based out of our Lebanon, MO location, you will supervise and coordinate activities of production, while driving to achieve a positive safety culture. Work with all departments to achieve goals. As A Team Leader You Will: Drive safety initiatives to improve safety culture and performance, steer safety performance accountability across all areas of responsibility Consult with Center of Excellence (COE) organizations; attendance and performance tracking, investigations, terminations, employee inquiries, and driving team member support Lead Lean Daily Management in responsible areas to include key metric tracking, action item generation and completion, presenting daily to direct reports and various staff stakeholders Oversee daily production scheduling and operation of assembly team: Direct machine setup and compliance checks of assembly process Plan and assign manning requirements for daily production schedule Make staffing or procedure adjustments according to supplied manufacturing schedule Lead problem-solving initiatives to address production and quality concerns Consult with stakeholders on build priority and other activities requiring coordination Conduct applicant interviews and hiring recommendations Responsible for employee survey scoring and generating action items to improve overall employee engagement Estimate requisitions and inspects materials used in product production Deliver production within quality standards and customer expectations Operate within a Continuous Improvement mindset, suggesting improvement and efficiencies to the operation and to the work environment Support team members with workplace policy and practices questions; makes recommendations on workplace behavior accountability Complete recordkeeping requirements in a timely manner Drive employee engagement in all activities including promoting our safety culture Partner with others to ensure training of new associates is successful Work and carrie themselves in a manner consistent with Copeland values: Excellence, Innovation, Partnership, Respect, Responsibility REQUIRED EDUCATION, EXPERIENCE, & SKILLS: GED or high school diploma Two (2) years of experience in manufacturing Proficient with Microsoft Office Suite Proficient in Decision Quality Competency within a multi-tasking environment Legal authorization to work in the United States - Sponsorship will not be provided for this position. PREFERRED EDUCATION, EXPERIENCE, & SKILLS: Associate degree or equivalent from two-year college or technical school 5 plus years of manufacturing leadership experience Experience with timekeeping and attendance tracking systems (Kronos) Experience with HRIS systems (Workday) Experience with COE (Center of Excellence) PHYSICAL DEMANDS While performing the duties of this job, the employee would be required to: ability to stand on manufacturing floor for 10 hours per day; sit at desk and working on computer; navigate manufacturing areas to access components; have visual acuity to properly inspect and discern prints and components; have manual dexterity to handle components; lift up to 35 pounds at a time. Reasonable accommodation may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. Support Personnel: Our teams work together to ensure their chosen work schedules are supporting our customers. These jobs typically work a 5-day work week. Why Work in the Lebanon, MO Area Our facility in Lebanon, MO is located on Interstate 44 and Historic Route 66 in the scenic Ozarks of South-Central Missouri. We enjoy a small-town community with a Lebanon population of 14,628 and Laclede County population of 36,069. Our area is known for Bennett Spring State Park, lakes, rivers, hunting, and fishing. Lebanon is home to several boat manufacturers and two stock-car racing tracks. Lebanon is also centrally located, just 1 hour from the city of Springfield and 2.5 hours from St. Louis. Why not work and play where you can make your vacation home your “home”? We are only 35 minutes from the world-famous Lake of the Ozarks. For the outdoor enthusiasts, we have Bennett Spring, MO, which is an unincorporated community and home of the Bennett Spring State Park, which has the third or fourth largest natural spring in the state with an average daily flow of about 100-million gallons. Bennett Spring is home of Missouri’s largest trout park, featuring fishing, camping, hiking, dining, and lodging. We also have the Niangua River, which is host to numerous campgrounds, canoes, rafts, and kayaks, and is a premier water attraction for outdoor enthusiasts. About Our Location Our plant in Lebanon, MO is Copeland’s flagship operation for scroll compressor assembly and a machining powerhouse for main bearing housings and scroll elements, with over 60 million scroll compressors produced in the past 27 years. Our Commitment to Our People Across the globe, we are united by a singular Purpose: Sustainability is no small ambition. That’s why everything we do is geared toward a sustainable future—for our generation and all those to come. Through groundbreaking innovations, HVACR technology and cold chain solutions, we are reducing carbon emissions and improving energy efficiency in spaces of all sizes, from residential to commercial to industrial. Our employees are our greatest strength. We believe that our culture of passion, openness, and collaboration empowers us to work toward the same goal - to make the world a better place. We invest in the end-to-end development of our people, beginning at onboarding and through senior leadership, so they can thrive personally and professionally. Flexible and competitive benefits plans offer the right options to meet your individual/family needs: medical insurance plans, dental and vision coverage, 401(k) and more. We provide employees with flexible time off plans, including paid parental leave, vacation and holiday leave. Together, we have the opportunity – and the power – to continue to revolutionize the technology behind air conditioning, heating and refrigeration, and cultivate a better future. Learn more about us and how you can join our team! Our Commitment to Inclusion & Belonging At Copeland, we cultivate a strong sense of inclusion and belonging where individuals of all backgrounds, and with diverse perspectives, are embraced and treated fairly to enable a stronger workforce. Our employee resource groups play an important role in culture and community building at Copeland. Work Authorization Copeland will only employ those who are legally authorized to work in the United States. This is not a position for which sponsorship will be provided. Individuals with temporary visas such as E, F-1 with OPT or CPT, H-1, H-2, L-1, B, J or TN, or who need sponsorship for work authorization now or in the future, are not eligible for hire. Equal Opportunity Employer Copeland is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, race, color, religion, national origin, age, marital status, political affiliation, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, disability or protected veteran status. We are committed to providing a workplace free of any discrimination or harassment. Company Description Private Members' Club located in Beit Mery, Metn. Job Description The Front Office Receptionist is the first point of contact for members and guests of the club. This role ensures a welcoming, professional, and discreet experience at all times while managing the flow of arrivals, inquiries, reservations, and administrative support. As the face of the club, the receptionist plays a central role in maintaining the exclusive, family-oriented, and high-standard atmosphere expected by members. Key Responsibilities Member & Guest Experience Greet members and guests warmly upon arrival and departure. Verify membership status and ensure access control protocols are followed. Provide personalized assistance, addressing members by name and anticipating needs. Handle member inquiries, complaints, and requests promptly and with discretion. Coordinate guest registrations and ensure all visitor policies are respected. Front Desk Operations Manage phone lines, emails, and in-person queries in a professional manner. Schedule reservations for club facilities (restaurants, events, sports courts, spa, etc.). Support event bookings and coordinate with F&B, wellness, and event teams. Maintain accurate records of member visits, bookings, and communications. Monitor lobby/reception area to ensure it remains elegant, tidy, and welcoming. Administration & Coordination Assist the Membership Office in onboarding new members (forms, welcome packs, tours). Process payments for services, event registrations, or membership-related fees. Prepare daily reports on reservations, arrivals, and front desk activity. Collaborate with housekeeping, security, and operations teams to deliver seamless service. Uphold confidentiality and data privacy in all member-related matters. Qualifications Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills. Strong sense of discretion, diplomacy, and confidentiality. Highly organized with attention to detail and multitasking ability. Professional appearance and polished manner. Fluency in English required; additional languages (French, Arabic, etc.) preferred. Computer literacy (MS Office, POS systems, booking software, CRM tools). Private Members' Club located in Beit Mery, Metn. Company Description Private Members' Club located in Beit Mery, Metn. Job Description Results-driven hospitality professional with comprehensive experience in managing all operational, administrative, and service aspects of a private members’ country club. Oversaw multi-departmental functions including sports and recreation , food & beverage operations , member relations , facilities maintenance , and staff leadership to deliver a world-class club experience. Qualifications Sports & Recreation Management: Supervised gym, tennis, paddle, swimming, and fitness programs. Developed partnerships with coaches and trainers, optimized scheduling, and ensured compliance with safety and quality standards. F&B Operations: Directed the performance of restaurants, lounges, and catering services; collaborated with chefs and service staff to maintain premium service standards, cost efficiency, and consistency across outlets and events. Member Experience: Built a strong culture of hospitality and exclusivity by ensuring personalized service for members and their families. Implemented feedback systems and engagement programs that enhanced satisfaction and retention. Maintenance & Facilities Oversight: Managed preventive and corrective maintenance schedules for all club assets and amenities, coordinating with engineering and external vendors to uphold safety, hygiene, and visual excellence. Team Leadership: Recruited, trained, and supervised multidisciplinary teams (front office, operations, housekeeping, F&B, and sports). Fostered a high-performance culture emphasizing accountability, service excellence, and continuous improvement. Events & Programming: Planned and executed social, sports, and family events—ranging from tournaments to private functions—enhancing community engagement and club reputation. Financial & Administrative Management: Monitored budgets, P&L, and procurement to achieve cost targets without compromising service quality. Ensured regulatory compliance and maintained high audit standards. Additional Information Operations Management · Sports Administration · Food & Beverage Supervision · Luxury Hospitality · Preventive Maintenance · Member Relations · Event Coordination · Budgeting & Cost Control · Team Development · Quality Assurance Private Members' Club located in Beit Mery, Metn. Company Description Robban Assafina, the unique maritime MENA publication, website, and smart phones’ application, is a regional intensive maritime media services developed side by side with training courses/workshops in several countries in the Middle East and North Africa Region, with a specialized crew of maritime experts, masters & engineers, who focus directly on shipping, shipbuilding, ships, ports, offshore, and everything related to the world of marine navigation, communication and machineries. Job Description As a Bilingual Translator and Editor, you will combine your exceptional language skills, cultural understanding, and editorial expertise to ensure the accuracy, fluency, and quality of content across multiple languages. Your role will encompass translating written materials from one language to another while also editing and refining content to meet high editorial standards. This position requires a keen eye for detail, strong communication abilities, and a deep appreciation for linguistic nuances. Responsibilities: Translation: Translate written content, documents, and materials from one language to another (English/Arabic Arabi/English), ensuring accuracy, cultural appropriateness, and adherence to context. Editing and Proofreading: Review and edit translated content to ensure it maintains the intended meaning, style, and tone. Correct grammatical errors, punctuation, syntax, and formatting. Localization: Adapt content to suit the cultural and linguistic nuances of the target audience, ensuring that idioms, expressions, and cultural references are accurately conveyed. Language Proficiency: Demonstrate fluency and proficiency in both source and target languages, with a deep understanding of grammar, vocabulary, and language structure. Quality Control: Ensure the final translated and edited content meets high-quality standards and aligns with the organization's guidelines and branding. Collaboration: Work closely with writers, content creators, designers, and other team members to deliver seamless and impactful multilingual content. Research: Conduct research to ensure accurate translation and effective communication of specialized terminology and industry-specific jargon. Deadlines and Prioritization: Manage multiple translation and editing projects, meeting deadlines and prioritizing tasks effectively. Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Translation, Linguistics, Languages, Communications, or a related field. Fluency in at least two languages (source and target) with exceptional proficiency in grammar, vocabulary, and syntax. Strong attention to detail and accuracy in both translation and editing. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a dynamic environment. Strong organizational and time management skills to handle multiple projects and meet deadlines. Job Title: French Teachers – Partner with Canadian Immigration Consultancy (Commission-Based)
Description: Company Description Green Light Immigration Inc . is a leading Canadian immigration firm with 20+ years of experience and thousands of successful cases. We’re expanding across Lebanon and Francophone regions, and we’re hiring motivated people to help us grow. Job Description We are looking to collaborate with French teachers who already have students or clients interested in immigrating to Canada. This is not a teaching role . Instead, it is a referral-based collaboration : If you already have serious clients who are considering moving to Canada for work or study, we invite you to connect with us. Your role is simply to refer these clients to us. We take care of all the immigration process and paperwork. Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Tastelab to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Tastelab Job Description Job Summary: We are seeking a skilled and service-driven Head Waiter to lead our front-of-house team. This role requires strong leadership, coordination, and communication skills to ensure smooth and efficient dining service while delivering a premium experience to our members and guests. Key Responsibilities: Oversee and coordinate the daily front-of-house operations during service Lead and support the team of waiters/waitresses — assign sections, monitor performance, and assist where needed Ensure all guests receive prompt, courteous, and professional service Train and mentor junior staff on service standards, etiquette, and club protocols Act as the point of contact between kitchen, bar, and service staff during shifts Monitor table setups, cleanliness, and presentation before and during service Handle guest complaints or special requests with diplomacy and speed Ensure adherence to food safety and hygiene standards Support the planning and execution of club events, private dinners, and banquets Maintain stock of service-related supplies and report shortages Assist with performance reviews and suggest improvements to service procedures Qualifications Requirements: Proven experience as a senior waiter/head waiter or in a similar supervisory role Strong leadership and delegation skills Excellent interpersonal and conflict resolution abilities Deep understanding of fine dining service and hospitality standards Professional appearance and demeanor Comfortable working under pressure in a fast-paced, high-end environment Flexible schedule, including nights, weekends, and holidays Familiarity with POS systems and basic administrative tasks Preferred Qualifications: Previous experience in a private club, luxury hotel, or fine dining setting Food handling and/or alcohol service certifications Knowledge of wine, spirits, and pairings Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Tastelab to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Tastelab to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Tastelab Job Description Job Summary: We’re looking for an experienced and reliable Chef de Partie to take ownership of a kitchen section across both restaurant service and catering/event operations . You’ll be responsible for prepping, cooking, plating, and maintaining food quality and safety within your section, while supporting smooth coordination during high-volume service. Key Responsibilities: Restaurant Operations: Run a designated section (grill, larder, sauce, garnish, pastry, etc.) during service Ensure dishes are prepared and plated according to spec and standards Maintain mise en place for daily service Collaborate with other CDPs and kitchen staff for efficient, cohesive service Assist with daily prep lists and shift readiness Maintain cleanliness, organization, and hygiene in your station at all times Catering & Events: Prepare and pack food for off-site catering, banquets, and large-scale events Assist with setup, execution, and breakdown of food service at catering events Adapt recipes and service based on event type (buffet, plated service, canapés, etc.) Ensure proper transport, food safety, and presentation under varying conditions Work efficiently under pressure and tight timelines General Responsibilities: Follow all food safety and hygiene regulations (HACCP standards) Monitor stock levels and inform senior chefs of shortages Support junior kitchen staff and assist with training when needed Maintain high standards of cleanliness, efficiency, and professionalism Contribute to new menu ideas or seasonal updates where relevant Report equipment issues or kitchen hazards promptly Qualifications Requirements: Minimum [2–4] years of kitchen experience, including at CDP level or strong commis stepping up Solid understanding of professional kitchen operations Ability to work across different sections as needed Experience with both à la carte restaurant service and large-scale catering Food hygiene certification (Level 2 or higher preferred) Good organizational skills and attention to detail Able to stay calm, focused, and efficient under pressure Flexible with hours — including weekends, holidays, and early/late shifts Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Tastelab to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Description CALI Productions S.A.L. is a Lebanese company specializing in restaurants and food businesses, now expanding its operations locally. Job Description We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented Accountant to join our dynamic team in Beirut, Lebanon. As a key member of our finance department, you will play a crucial role in maintaining accurate financial records, ensuring compliance with local and international accounting standards, and supporting the overall financial health of our organization. Manage and update general ledger accounts with precision and accuracy Prepare and analyze weekly, monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports Record journal entries and reconcile bank statements Oversee accounts payable and receivable processes Assist in budget preparation and financial forecasting Ensure compliance with Lebanese accounting standards and international regulations Prepare and submit VAT and other statutory reports as required Coordinate with internal and external auditors Support month-end and year-end close processes Monitor and reconcile intercompany transactions Contribute to the improvement of financial processes and systems Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field Proven experience as an Accountant or in a similar role Strong analytical skills with a detail-oriented approach Proficiency in accounting software and advanced Microsoft Excel skills Thorough understanding of accounting principles and financial reporting standards Knowledge of Lebanese accounting standards and tax regulations Experience in preparing financial statements and reports Ability to work with multiple currencies Excellent organizational and time management skills Strong communication skills in English; Arabic language skills are a plus Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment Commitment to maintaining confidentiality and ethical standards CALI Productions S.A.L. is a Lebanese company specializing in restaurants and food businesses, now expanding its operations locally. Murex is a global fintech leader in trading, risk management and processing solutions for capital markets. Operating from our 19 offices, 3 000 Murexians from over 60 different nationalities ensure the development, implementation and support of our platform which is used by banks, asset managers, corporations and utilities, across the world. Join Murex and work on the challenges of an industry at the forefront of innovation and thrive in a people-centric environment. You’ll be part of one global team where you can learn fast and stay true to yourself. Your Mission As a Full Stack Developer, you will design and build the web experience for our AI-powered solution. Your primary focus will be on full-stack web development, while also contributing to data workflows and ETL processes that support our intelligent systems. What you’ll do Develop full-stack web applications using .NET Core (backend) and Angular (frontend) within a microservices architecture. Build secure, scalable APIs with proper authentication and Role-Based Access Control (RBAC). Design and implement responsive, user-friendly UIs for chatbot and AI-driven workflows. Develop ETL pipelines and data processing tools using Python for integrating structured and unstructured data sources Work with databases such as PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and caching solutions like Redis. Collaborate with cross-functional teams (designers, backend engineers, and AI specialists) to deliver high-quality features. Write clean, maintainable code following SOLID principles and best practices. Your Profile Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field. 1–3 years of experience in full-stack development with .NET Core and Angular. Experience in building and deploying production-grade applications. Proficiency in Python Solid understanding of microservices architecture, Domain-Driven Design (DDD), and SOLID principles. Strong communication skills in spoken and written English. Ability to work in a collaborative, fast-moving team environment. Extra Qualifications Experience with Docker & Kubernetes for containerized application deployment. Practical knowledge of Agentic AI frameworks (Llamaindex, Langchain), or other orchestration tools Understanding of RAG pipelines, prompt engineering, and knowledge augmentation techniques. Exposure to Apache Airflow or other ETL tools. Background in MLOps practices for CI/CD of AI models. Why Join Us Work on cutting-edge AI-powered solutions that impact real-world applications. Gain exposure to modern architectures (microservices, distributed systems, ETL pipelines). Career growth opportunities with mentorship and training in AI integration. A collaborative, innovative environment where your ideas matter. Murex is a global fintech leader in trading, risk management and processing solutions for capital markets. Write clean, maintainable code following SOLID principles and best practices. Job Title: Members Club Community and Sales Managament
Description: Description de l'entreprise Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Tastelab to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Tastelab Description du poste We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Members Club Community and Sales Manager to oversee membership growth, engagement, and retention. This role is responsible for managing the club’s community, enhancing the member experience, and driving sales through strategic partnerships and outreach. The ideal candidate will have experience in hospitality, sales, and community engagement, with a strong ability to build relationships and foster a vibrant club culture. Key Responsibilities: Community Management: Act as the primary point of contact for club members, ensuring a seamless and engaging experience. Foster a sense of community by organizing events, networking opportunities, and social gatherings. Maintain member satisfaction by addressing concerns, gathering feedback, and implementing improvements. Develop and execute initiatives that enhance the club’s brand and community appeal. Manage communication channels, including email newsletters, social media, and internal forums. Sales and Membership Growth: Develop and implement strategies to attract and retain club members. Drive membership sales through outreach, partnerships, and direct engagement. Conduct tours and presentations for prospective members, highlighting club benefits. Build relationships with corporate partners, local businesses, and high-net-worth individuals. Meet or exceed membership and revenue targets through proactive sales efforts. Operational and Administrative Tasks: Maintain accurate records of membership data, sales performance, and community engagement. Work closely with marketing, events, and operations teams to enhance member experience. Manage membership contracts, billing, and renewals efficiently. Monitor competitor trends and industry best practices to ensure a competitive edge. Company Description Kanz is an AI Recruiter Copilot revolutionizing recruiting. We make hiring in Saudi Arabia as simple as ordering an Uber. Tell us who you want to hire and when you want to meet them, our AI does the rest - job posting, sourcing, assessing, and scheduling, all within a week. We're helping 300 companies hire top Saudi talent. With 1M users on our platform, we're revolutionizing recruiting in the Middle East. Job Description You will join a senior development team responsible for architecting and delivering Kanz’s core user-facing products: the cross-platform mobile application and the web application. You are expected to deliver a lightning-fast experience, optimizing for speed and clarity over features. A critical focus will be the initial 90-second job posting flow and ensuring the mobile experience is prioritized. Key responsibilities include: Lead the development and architecture of the mobile application using React Native. Implement the 90-second job posting flow, AI matching engine, and interview scheduling. Integrate the front-end with our fully API-based backend, which utilizes GCP and PostgreSQL. Enforce high performance standards, including a page load of less than 2 seconds and API response. Work with the design system to ensure the application is aesthetically consistent. Implement mobile-specific features like Swipe Actions, Voice Notes for candidate feedback, and Commute Mode (audio summaries of new applicants). Ensure the application is accessible and compliant, particularly with WCAG 2.1 AA and full RTL support for Arabic. Qualifications Experience and Skills: 5+ years of professional experience in front-end development, with a strong background in architecting and shipping production-ready applications using React Native. Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript and experience with modern state management patterns. Expertise in mobile performance optimization, network latency handling, and caching strategies. Demonstrated ability to integrate complex applications with robust, API-based backends. Preferred (Bonus) Experience: Familiarity with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services. Direct experience implementing and maintaining full RTL (Right-to-Left) support for languages like Arabic. Experience working closely with design systems, component libraries, and translating high-fidelity design specifications (e.g., Figma) into performant code. Company Description Join us at Accor, where life pulses with passion! ​ As a pioneer in the art of responsible hospitality, the Accor Group gathers more than 45 brands, 5,600 hotels, 10,000 restaurants, and lifestyle destinations in 110 countries. While each brand has its own personality, where you will be able to truly find yourself, they all share a common ambition: to keep innovating and challenging the status-quo.​ By joining us, you will become a Heartist®, because hospitality is, first and foremost, a work of heart.​ You will join a caring environment and a team where you can be all you are. You will be in a supportive place to grow, to fulfil yourself, to discover other professions and to pursue career opportunities, in your hotel or in other hospitality environments, in your country or anywhere in the world!​ You will enjoy exclusive benefits, specific to the sector and beyond, as well as strong recognition for your daily commitment.​ Everything you will do with us, regardless of your profession, will offer a deep sense of meaning, to create lasting, memorable and impactful experiences for your customers, for your colleagues and for the planet. Hospitality is a work of heart , ​ Join us and become a Heartist ®. Job Description Summary of Role The Senior Sales Manager is a key member of the hotel's sales team responsible for driving revenue through the strategic management of group bookings and events. This role requires a seasoned sales professional with extensive experience in the Hotel industry and a proven track record of achieving targets and fostering strong client relationships. MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES Develop and implement a comprehensive sales strategy to drive revenue and achieve sales targets. Identify and prospect new business opportunities within the market segment. Build and maintain strong relationships with existing clients, understanding their needs and providing tailored solutions to enhance their event experience. Collaborate closely with the marketing team to create compelling promotional materials and campaigns. Lead negotiations with clients to secure contracts and agreements, ensuring favourable terms and conditions for the hotel. Coordinate with various hotel departments Conduct site inspections and presentations for potential clients, showcasing the hotel's facilities and capabilities to meet their requirements. Stay abreast of industry trends, competitor activities, and market developments to identify opportunities for growth and innovation. Prepare regular reports and forecasts on sales performance, highlighting achievements, challenges, and areas for improvement. Mentor and train junior members of the sales team, providing guidance on effective sales techniques and best practices. Any other duties as assigned by the Management Company Description Join us at Accor, where life pulses with passion! ​ As a pioneer in the art of responsible hospitality, the Accor Group gathers more than 45 brands, 5,600 hotels, 10,000 restaurants, and lifestyle destinations in 110 countries. While each brand has its own personality, where you will be able to truly find yourself, they all share a common ambition: to keep innovating and challenging the status-quo.​ By joining us, you will become a Heartist®, because hospitality is, first and foremost, a work of heart.​ You will join a caring environment and a team where you can be all you are. About Anghami Anghami is the leading multi-media technology streaming platform in the Middle East and North Africa ('MENA') region, offering a comprehensive ecosystem of exclusive premium video, music, podcasts, live entertainment, audio services and more. Since its launch in 2012, Anghami has led the way as the first music streaming platform to digitize MENA’s music catalog, reshaping the region's entertainment landscape. In a strategic move in April 2024, Anghami joined forces with OSN+, a leading video streaming platform, forming a digital entertainment powerhouse. This pivotal transaction strengthened Anghami's position as a go-to destination, boasting an extensive library of over 18,000 hours of premium video, including exclusive HBO content, alongside 100+ million Arabic and International songs and podcasts. With a user base exceeding 120 million registered users and 2.5 million paid subscribers, Anghami has partnered with 47 telcos across MENA, facilitating customer acquisition and subscription payment, in addition to establishing relationships with major film studios, entertainment giants, and music labels, both regional and international. Headquartered in Abu Dhabi, UAE, Anghami operates in 16 countries across MENA, with offices in Beirut, Dubai, Cairo, and Riyadh. We're looking for a Digital Marketing executive to work on the user acquisition initiatives for both Anghami and OSN+. You'll be working with a diverse Growth team that drives acquisition, conversion, and retention of users on the two entertainment platforms. About the Job Work on driving customer acquisition and brand consideration through digital marketing channels, in line with strategic goals. Work on various growth initiatives, including digital marketing, SEO, ASO, and lifecycle management. Manage and evaluate performance of all digital marketing campaigns, assess against business goals and constantly optimize performance. Analyze data to find answers about habits and trends, provide insights for optimization of overall marketing activities, improve content proposition and work on user retention. Research and identify trends in different markets to create relevant campaigns leading to the increase in user retention. Create marketing briefs based on the market insights and business requirements. Brainstorm and develop ideas for creative marketing campaigns. Collaborate with a cross functional team to create integrated marketing campaigns that prioritize the experience of the customer. Reach ambitious growth KPIs. About you You have 2-3 years of experience in marketing, growth marketing, preferably in the tech industry You understand the basics of user segmentation and marketing of products within an app You have good analytical skills You have the ability to communicate and express effectively You have an execution oriented mindset You have experience with launching campaigns for digital platforms on Google, Apple Search Ads, or Meta. Experience with any of the following is a plus: Amplitude, Tableau and Looker. Our Opportunity As a Quality Assurance Engineer, you will work closely with the Software Development Leads to ensure that our products meet our company's standards. You will break down the development process into achievable testing goals and relay any issues back to the development and product teams. You will review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback. You will also create detailed and well-structured test plans and cases, estimate, prioritize, plan, and coordinate testing activities, and develop and apply testing processes to meet our clients' needs. You Will Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback. Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans and test cases. Estimate, prioritize, plan, and coordinate testing activities. Design, develop, and execute automation scripts using open-source tools, including proficiency in JMeter and Selenium. Identify, record, document thoroughly, and track bugs. Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved, using automated testing tools like Selenium. Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs, including performance testing with JMeter. Liaise with internal teams (developers and product managers) to identify system requirements. Monitor debugging process results. Investigate the causes of non-conforming software and train users to implement solutions. Track quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts. Stay up-to-date with new testing tools and test strategies. Requirements To Be Successful in The Role You Will Need 3+ years of experience working as a Software Quality Assurance Engineer. Strong knowledge of Software Quality Assurance methodologies, tools, and processes. Experience in writing clear, concise, and comprehensive test plans and test cases. Hands-on experience with both white box and black box testing. Extensive hands-on experience with automated testing tools, particularly JMeter and Selenium. Solid knowledge of SQL and scripting. Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process. Experience with performance and/or security testing is a plus. Experience with functional, non-functional, and regression testing. Strong analytical skills. Strong interpersonal skills and ability to maintain good internal and external relationships. Excellent command of written, read and spoken Arabic and English. Strong sense of discretion and confidentiality. Benefits Siren is an equal opportunity employer. At Siren we value ethics, dedication, sustainability, safeguarding, respect and inclusion. Are you interested in working with our dedicated team on impactful projects? We welcome applications from all qualified candidates, regardless of background. Do apply! A Reputable Company located in Beirut is seeking to recruit an Accounting and Finance Specialist. Main Duties: Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements. Assist in the preparation and monitoring of budgets; analyze variances and provide insights to management. Manage invoicing, payment processing, and collections; maintain accurate records of all transactions. Conduct cost analysis for projects, providing insights on profitability and advising on financial decisions. Oversee payroll functions, ensuring timely and accurate employee compensation. Ensure compliance with tax regulations and liaising with external auditors. Coordinate with auditors for annual audits; prepare necessary documentation and reports. Monitor cash flow and prepare forecasts to ensure liquidity. Utilize accounting software and financial modeling tools to maintain accurate records and reports. The overall scope of the job includes serving food and beverages to guests in the assigned outlet, providing a courteous, professional, efficient and flexible service consistent with the standards of the hotel and in line with Kempinski’s DNA values in order to encourage sales and maximize guest satisfaction. Responsible to Head Waiter / Waitress, Supervisor, Assistant Manager, Outlet Manager. Report to duty punctually wearing the correct uniform, clean and well pressed including appropriate shoes (polished) and nametag at all times according to the hotels dress code & Kempinski grooming standards, maintaining a high standard of personal appearance and hygiene at all times. A courteous, professional and efficient service is provided at all times. All duties and tasks are performed as per the tasks required at the outlet. Be knowledgeable of all services and products offered by the hotel. Have a thorough knowledge and understanding of all food and beverage items offered by the department assigned. Have the knowledge and understanding to explain and perform upselling all items offered by the department assigned as well as offering alternatives. Monitor operating supplies, equipment and reduce spoilage and wastage successfully. Ensure that the place of work and surrounding area is kept clean and organized at all times. Successfully perform opening and closing procedures established for the assigned outlet Handle guest enquiries in a courteous and efficient manner and report guest complaints and feedback to supervisors. Report guest complaints immediately to the supervisors and ensuring follow up is performed with the guest. Be knowledgeable to operate the existing POS system based on the trained responsibility level as assigned in the department. Understand and strictly adhere to the rules & regulations established in the hotel’s policy manual and the hotel’s policy on fire, hygiene, health & safety. Maintain a good rapport and work relation with staff in the assigned department and within the hotel. Attend and contribute to all staff meetings, departmental trainings and hotel initiated trainings scheduled. Undertake reasonable tasks and secondary duties as assigned by the Department Head. Respond to any changes in the department as dictated by the hotel management. Assist in carrying out scheduled inventories of products and operating equipment. Perform any other assigned reasonable duties and responsibilities as assigned. Project at all times a positive and motivated attitude and exercise self-control. Additional responsibilities and tasks can be added at any time according to the needs of the business and of the hotel. Job Summary: As a Guest Experience Agent, you will be responsible for providing exceptional customer service to guests, addressing their inquiries and concerns, and ensuring a positive experience throughout their visit. Job Responsibility: - Greet guests upon arrival and assist with check-in processes - Respond to guest inquiries via phone, email, or in-person - Coordinate reservations and bookings for guests - Address and resolve guest complaints and issues in a timely and efficient manner - Provide information about services, facilities, and local attractions to guests - Maintain a clean and organized workspace to enhance the overall guest experience Candidate Requirements: - Proven experience in a customer service role, preferably in the hospitality industry - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills - Strong problem-solving abilities and the ability to handle difficult situations with tact and professionalism - Knowledge of hotel operations and services - Ability to work well under pressure and in a fast-paced environment - Availability to work evenings, weekends, and holidays Job Summary: As a Guest Experience Agent, you will be responsible for providing exceptional customer service to guests, addressing their inquiries and concerns, and ensuring a positive experience throughout their visit. Job Title: Freelance Referral Partner – Immigration to Canada
Description: Company Description Green Light Immigration Inc . is a leading Canadian immigration firm with 20+ years of experience and thousands of successful cases. We’re expanding across Lebanon and Francophone regions, and we’re hiring motivated people to help us grow. Job Description We are seeking to collaborate with travel agencies, immigration agents, or freelance professionals who already have a solid network of clients interested in immigrating to Canada. Since French is currently a strong advantage for Canadian immigration, referrals should be French speakers or people serious about learning French to qualify. Key Responsibilities: Refer potential clients who are actively interested in immigrating to Canada. Ensure that referred clients are either French-speaking or committed to learning French. Maintain clear communication with our team regarding referred clients. Qualifications Must already have access to people actively seeking immigration opportunities. Ability to refer at least 1 client immediately and maintain a flow of 2–3 referrals per month . Strong network within your community, business, or client base. Prior experience in immigration, travel, or related services is an asset. Additional Information Compensation: This is a freelance, commission-only role . Commission is paid for every successful referred client. Why Partner With Us: Work directly with a licensed Canadian immigration company. Flexible, remote collaboration. Unlimited earning potential based on your referrals. Green Light Immigration Inc . is a leading Canadian immigration firm with 20+ years of experience and thousands of successful cases. We are growing! We are currently looking to hire a CX Analyst to work with us remotely! Who we are: Founded in 2006, our story started with two entrepreneurs. Today, we’re proud to be a global business. From Shanghai to Paris, we have 12 offices and operate across four continents in 70 countries. We are home to over 250 professionals from around the world, working together to serve more than 200 luxury clients. At CXG, we love to evolve, elevate, and transform experiences while bringing brand promises to life. We offer strategic solutions that impact performance and elevate the customer experience of some of the world’s most iconic premium and luxury brands. Company Description DesignHub is a dynamic and creative interior design company based in lebanon. We specialize in delivering innovative, functional, and aesthetically inspiring residential, commercial, and hospitality spaces. Our team is passionate about design excellence, attention to detail, and creating environments that reflect our clients' vision and lifestyle. At DesignHub, we value collaboration, creativity, and growth. We are now looking to expand our team with a motivated and talented Interior Designer who shares our passion for transforming spaces. Job Description We are seeking a talented and innovative Interior Designer to join our team in Dekwaneh, Lebanon. As an Interior Designer, you will be responsible for creating visually stunning and functional spaces that exceed our clients' expectations. Your creativity, attention to detail, and collaborative spirit will be essential in bringing design concepts to life. Develop and present innovative interior design concepts that align with client needs and preferences Create detailed 2D and 3D renderings to effectively communicate design ideas Collaborate closely with clients, architects, and contractors throughout the design process Select and specify appropriate materials, colors, finishes, and furnishings for each project Ensure all designs comply with local building codes and regulations Manage multiple projects simultaneously, meeting deadlines and budget requirements Conduct on-site visits to oversee project implementation and address any issues Stay up-to-date with the latest design trends, technologies, and sustainable practices Contribute to the company's design library and resource database Participate in client meetings and presentations to showcase design concepts Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Interior Design or a related field Proven experience as an Interior Designer, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work Proficiency in industry-standard design software such as :Autocad,SketchUp ,lumion,Strong 3D modeling skills Executional Drawings BOQ Works well under pressure Hungry for real-world experience Additional Information Send CV & portfolio (mandatory) Include your salary expectation Email:[email protected] DesignHub is a dynamic and creative interior design company based in lebanon. Description de l'entreprise Nous sommes une entreprise en ligne dans les secteurs de la beauté et de la mode. Nous constituons actuellement une équipe dédiée d’experts en médias et marketing au Liban pour soutenir la croissance et la performance de nos plateformes internationales. Notre objectif est de construire des marques digitales fortes et de générer de l’engagement grâce à un contenu performant et une communication ciblée. Description du poste Nous recherchons un directeur créatif visionnaire pour rejoindre notre équipe à Mezher, au Liban. En tant que force créatrice de notre marque, vous dirigerez notre talentueuse équipe de conception, façonnerez notre identité visuelle et proposerez des solutions novatrices conformes à nos objectifs stratégiques. Vous développerez et maintiendrez la vision créative globale de l'entreprise, en veillant à la cohérence sur toutes les plateformes et dans tous les médias. Diriger et inspirer une équipe de concepteurs, d'artistes et d'autres professionnels de la création. Collaborer avec des équipes interfonctionnelles pour créer un travail créatif convaincant et cohérent. Superviser la conceptualisation et l'exécution des projets de conception, du début à la fin. présenter des stratégies créatives et des concepts de conception aux clients et aux parties prenantes Se tenir au courant des tendances de l'industrie et des technologies émergentes afin de maintenir la fraîcheur et la pertinence de notre travail créatif. Veiller à ce que tous les travaux de création soient conformes aux lignes directrices de la marque et respectent les normes de qualité. Gérer efficacement les délais et les budgets des projets Offrir des opportunités de mentorat et de développement professionnel aux membres de l'équipe. Contribuer aux efforts de développement commercial en participant à des présentations et à des réunions avec les clients. Qualifications Licence en design, en beaux-arts ou dans un domaine connexe. 7 à 10 ans d'expérience dans des fonctions créatives, avec une expérience avérée en matière de leadership Compréhension approfondie des principes de conception et de leur application à différents médias. Maîtrise des logiciels et outils de conception standard de l'industrie. Portefeuille solide présentant divers projets et campagnes créatifs. Vision créative exceptionnelle et capacité à penser de manière stratégique et innovante Excellentes compétences en matière de leadership et de gestion d'équipe Excellentes aptitudes à la communication, tant orale qu'écrite Capacité à gérer plusieurs projets simultanément et à respecter les délais. Solides compétences en matière de résolution de problèmes et souci du détail Expérience des relations avec les clients et de la gestion des parties prenantes Capacité d'adaptation à l'évolution des tendances et des technologies dans le secteur de la création Esprit de collaboration et capacité à travailler efficacement au sein d'équipes interfonctionnelles. Maîtrise du français et de l'anglais indispensable Informations complémentaires Intitulé du poste : Chargé(e) des Réseaux Sociaux Lieu : Presential – Liban Type de contrat : Temps plein / Contrat de prestation de services Département : Marketing / Communication / Digital Nous sommes une entreprise en ligne dans les secteurs de la beauté et de la mode. Nous constituons actuellement une équipe dédiée d’experts en médias et marketing au Liban pour soutenir la croissance et la performance de nos plateformes internationales. Notre objectif est de construire des marques digitales fortes et de générer de l’engagement grâce à un contenu performant et une communication ciblée. Job Summary: We are looking for a friendly and professional Waiter/Waitress to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for taking orders, serving food and beverages, and ensuring a positive dining experience for our guests. Job Responsibility: - Greeting and seating customers - Presenting menus and taking orders - Serving food and beverages - Providing excellent customer service - Handling customer inquiries and complaints - Cleaning and setting up tables - Collaborating with kitchen staff to ensure timely service Candidate Requirements: - Proven work experience as a Waiter or Waitress - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills - Ability to work in a fast-paced environment - Good physical condition to stand and walk for long periods - Attention to detail - Flexibility to work in shifts, including weekends and holidays Job Summary: We are looking for a friendly and professional Waiter/Waitress to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for taking orders, serving food and beverages, and ensuring a positive dining experience for our guests. Company Overview We are a rapidly growing group of fintech, digital, and telemarketing companies, expanding operations across the GCC region. To ensure excellence in service delivery and compliance with industry standards, we are building a strong quality assurance and training framework within our call center operations. We are now seeking a Quality Assurance & Training Specialist to monitor performance, ensure compliance, and deliver ongoing coaching and training that drives both customer satisfaction and sales effectiveness. Position Summary The Quality Assurance & Training Specialist is responsible for evaluating call center interactions, ensuring adherence to company standards, and identifying opportunities for performance improvement. This role plays a dual function: maintaining high-quality service through systematic monitoring and actively training agents to develop their skills, improve conversion rates, and comply with regulatory requirements. By bridging quality control and training, this role helps drive operational excellence and client trust. Key Responsibilities Quality Assurance Monitor and evaluate inbound and outbound calls against quality benchmarks. Ensure agents follow approved scripts, compliance rules, and data protection standards. Maintain detailed reports of evaluations, performance scores, and trends. Provide structured feedback to agents to improve communication, professionalism, and compliance. Identify recurring issues and collaborate with supervisors to design corrective actions. Audit lead qualification processes to ensure accuracy and high conversion potential. Ensure telemarketing activities adhere to compliance standards (customer consent, transparency, and regulatory guidelines). Training & Development Collaborate with supervisors to design and implement agent development plans. Deliver onboarding and refresher training sessions on scripts, compliance, and best practices. Create and update quality assurance guidelines, training manuals, and evaluation forms. Use QA insights to identify skill gaps and organize targeted coaching sessions. Conduct workshops to improve sales techniques, customer handling, and objection management. Support initiatives to build trust, transparency, and professionalism in customer acquisition. Qualifications & Skills Bachelor’s degree in Business, Communications, Compliance, or related field (preferred). Previous experience in call center quality assurance, training, or operations is highly desirable. Familiarity with fintech, payments, or digital services is an advantage (training provided). Strong analytical skills with attention to detail and accuracy. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to deliver constructive feedback diplomatically. Proficiency in call center software, QA tools, CRM systems, and MS Office. Ability to multitask and thrive in a fast-paced environment. Fluency in Arabic and English (written and spoken); additional languages are an asset. Positive, team-oriented, and committed to continuous improvement. Core Competencies Quality Focus: Ensures high standards in every customer interaction. Training & Coaching: Develops agent skills through structured feedback and training. Compliance Awareness: Maintains strict adherence to regulations and data protection. Analytical Thinking: Identifies performance trends and improvement opportunities. Communication: Clearly conveys feedback and engages agents constructively. Adaptability: Adjusts QA and training methods in a dynamic sales environment. Collaboration: Works with supervisors and management to align QA with business goals. We are growing! We are currently looking to hire a Digital learning Content Design Associate to work with us remotely to support the launch of our new digital Learning platform CXG LEARN . Who we are: Founded in 2006, CXG began as the vision of two entrepreneurs, and today, we are proud to be a global business. From Shanghai to Paris, we operate in 12 offices across four continents, serving over 200 luxury clients in 70 countries. Our team of 250+ professionals from around the world is united in the mission of transforming and elevating customer experiences for some of the world’s most iconic premium and luxury brands At CXG, we love to evolve, elevate, and transform experiences while bringing brand promises to life. We offer strategic solutions that impact performance and elevate the customer experience of some of the world’s most iconic premium and luxury brands. What you will be doing: As a Digital learning Associate, you will play a vital role in supporting our Academy Team to deliver innovative and immersive training content on CXG Learn —our first all-in-one digital learning platform. This platform is designed specifically for our luxury retail clients, empowering their front-line teams—sales advisors, store managers, and trainers—with engaging, interactive learning experiences that elevate the retail experience. It’s a pioneering project and a high-priority initiative for 2025, marking CXG’s first major step into digital learning. In this role, you’ll work closely with our Content Creation Manager, contributing to a comprehensive library of training content tailored to the needs of luxury retail. The modules will cover essential themes such as retail experience, the art of selling, luxury retail management, and retail performance. Responsibilities: 1- Needs Analysis and Scoping: Contribute to the analysis of clients’ training needs. Identify learning objectives with the support of the tutor. 2- Instructional Design: Support the creation of training paths (classroom, e-learning, blended learning). Participate in the development of storyboards and instructional scenarios. Adapt content according to the target audience. 3- Content Production: Select and design learning resources (videos, quizzes, infographics, etc.). Produce e-learning modules using authoring tools (Articulate Storyline, Rise, Autrice, etc.). Create media elements using digital and AI tools (Heygen, Canva Pro, etc.). Contribute to defining the digital graphic identity of the modules. 4- Evaluation and Continuous Improvement: Test developed modules and gather feedback. Suggest Learning and technical adjustments. 5- Research and Innovation: Conduct competitive intelligence (digital learning, digital tools, innovative learning methods). 6- Project Management: Contribute to training project planning and monitoring. Job Title: Online Arabic Language and Culture Teachers
Description: Company Description Alefb is non profit organization incorporated in France and the US since 1994. We have been teaching the Arabic language and culture in a playful way for 25 years. See video, and website www.alefb.org Job Description Alefb is looking for motivated, dynamic Arabic teachers for a few hours after school during weekdays and/or weekends for its new one-on-one online courses. Requirements: Applicants must live in Lebanon Attend two Zoom interviews Candidates must be able to attend all training sessions prior to teaching Assist in adapting/refining curriculum in order to meet individual student needs and increase its quality Monitor and assess student performance Fill up student reviews for parents Be available for a minimum of a full 10-weeks session per student Compensation: Hourly compensation commensurate with experience. Free training will be provided. If interested, apply immediately!
