It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing! Job Description: Join Us at the Forefront of Sales Account Management! Who We Are: We are the business behind the world’s brands. At Ingram Micro, we’re redefining distribution and reaching nearly 90% of the world's population. With operations in 57 countries and approximately 24,000 associates, we help businesses run better, grow faster, and achieve their sustainability goals. It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing! How Our Team Works: Collaboration is at the heart of innovation. Our team drives Ingram Micro’s innovative campaigns, highlighting our cutting-edge solutions and enabling us to maintain leadership in the technology distribution industry. We work together to shape the future of technology distribution, ensuring products reach customers efficiently and helping businesses thrive globally. Our Values in Action: At Ingram Micro, we are shaping the future with cutting-edge technology! We foster a culture of collaboration, transparency, and continuous improvement. Our team members are encouraged to share ideas, challenge the status quo, and work together to shape the future of technology distribution. What You’ll Do: As a Cloud Sales specialist you’ll play a critical role in driving and improving vendor sales while meeting both vendor and company objectives and targets. Your key responsibilities will include: Establishing productive, professional relationships with key personnel in assigned partner accounts. Coordinating the involvement of company personnel to meet partner performance objectives and expectations. Meeting assigned targets for profitable sales volume and strategic objectives in assigned partner accounts. Leading joint partner planning processes to develop mutual performance objectives, financial targets, and critical milestones. Proactively assessing, clarifying, and validating partner needs on an ongoing basis. What You Bring to the Role: We’re looking for someone with: 3+ years of experience in selling Cloud products. IT distribution experience is a plus. Enthusiasm and a results-driven mindset with a strong will to succeed. A self-starter, self-motivated, and a team player. A strong ‘customer-first’ mentality, able to utilize relationships to drive results. Your Growth with Us: Joining Ingram Micro means becoming part of a global leader in technology solutions. We offer a dynamic work environment, opportunities for professional growth, and the chance to make a significant impact on the future of technology distribution. Let's shape tomorrow together. #LI-SMR1 It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing! It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing! Company Description About Nucleus Ventures Nucleus Ventures is a leading entity in corporate innovation, venture building, and advisory services, with a track record of successful ventures, operational advisory missions, and startup incubators. Based in Beirut, Nucleus Ventures also operates in France, the UK, and Cyprus, serving the EMEA region. The company collaborates closely with clients, leveraging subject matter experts, startups, and entrepreneurs to drive growth and innovation through tailored strategies. Job Description Role Overview We are seeking a creative and proactive Social Media Intern to support our digital campaign efforts and drive engagement across our social media platforms. You’ll play a key role in shaping our online presence, building community, and ensuring our messaging reaches the right audiences with impact. Key Responsibilities: Assist in developing and scheduling engaging content for our social media platforms (Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, etc.) Support the execution of digital campaigns and outreach initiatives Monitor social media trends and recommend ideas for fresh, relevant content Track engagement metrics (likes, shares, comments, reach) and prepare performance reports Interact with followers, respond to comments and messages, and foster a sense of community Help coordinate cross-posting with partners and amplify campaign reach Maintain a content calendar and ensure alignment with campaign timelines Assist in creating basic visuals or liaise with the design team for graphics when needed What You’ll Gain: Hands-on experience managing real-time campaigns and social media communities Exposure to impact-driven initiatives and a chance to shape conversations in your sector Mentorship and feedback from an experienced communications team A letter of recommendation and opportunity for future roles, depending on performance Qualifications Qualifications: Currently pursuing a degree in Marketing, Communications, Media, or a related field Strong understanding of major social media platforms and their best practices Excellent written communication skills (English and/or Arabic depending on your audience) Creative mindset and ability to come up with engaging content ideas Organized, reliable, and able to meet deadlines Experience with design tools (Canva, Adobe Express, etc.) is a plus Familiarity with analytics tools (Meta Insights, LinkedIn Analytics, etc.) is a plus Additional Information Interested candidates should submit their CV and/or a short cover letter here or send an email to [[email protected]] with the subject line: SM & Communications A reputable company located in Lebanon is seeking to recruit a Business Development Manager. Main duties : Drive aggressive new business growth across the GCC by identifying, pursuing, and converting high-value opportunities. Build and maintain relationships with C-level executives, boards, and senior decision-makers. Develop and execute a clear business development strategy to meet and exceed monthly, quarterly, and annual revenue targets. Prepare and deliver monthly progress reports on business development activities, pipeline performance, and market opportunities. Manage the entire sales cycle, from lead generation and prospecting to proposal, negotiation, and contract closure. Actively network and build targeted relationships with decision-makers across priority sectors to generate new business leads. Leverage market insights and client feedback to position Governance Dynamics ahead of competitors in every proposal. Collaborate with internal teams to create tailored proposals and ensure a smooth delivery. Consistently meet or exceed quarterly revenue targets and maintain an active pipeline of qualified opportunities. Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Pairhouse s.a.r.l. to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Pairhouse s.a.r.l. Job Description A Social Media Manager plays a vital role in enhancing our brand's presence on various social media platforms. Using your strong skills in content creation, audience engagement, and analytical prowess, you will be integral to our team's mission of increasing our web traffic and maintaining a positive brand image. Job Purpose The primary goal of the Social Media Manager position is to boost our brand's reputation by skillfully managing our online communities and responding swiftly to user inquiries. This will involve the development and implementation of innovative social media strategies, highly engaging content, and interactions designed to drive traffic to our website and engage our target audiences. Job Duties and Responsibilities Develop and implement social media strategies that foster brand awareness. Create compelling content to engage our target audience and prompt interaction. Drive web traffic to our company's site through savvy use of social media platforms. Keep a keen eye on performance metrics to assess and optimize social media campaign effectiveness. Manage online communities and handle all customer inquiries in a timely manner, upholding a favorable image of our brand. Job Description A Social Media Manager plays a vital role in enhancing our brand's presence on various social media platforms. Using your strong skills in content creation, audience engagement, and analytical prowess, you will be integral to our team's mission of increasing our web traffic and maintaining a positive brand image. Job Purpose The primary goal of the Social Media Manager position is to boost our brand's reputation by skillfully managing our online communities and responding swiftly to user inquiries. This will involve the development and implementation of innovative social media strategies, highly engaging content, and interactions designed to drive traffic to our website and engage our target audiences. Job Duties and Responsibilities Develop and implement social media strategies that foster brand awareness. Create compelling content to engage our target audience and prompt interaction. Drive web traffic to our company's site through savvy use of social media platforms. Keep a keen eye on performance metrics to assess and optimize social media campaign effectiveness. Manage online communities and handle all customer inquiries in a timely manner, upholding a favorable image of our brand. About Ogilvy Ogilvy was founded in 1948 by David Ogilvy. David created a culture that deeply respects and cares about its people and clients. Our mission is to inspire people and brands to make an impact and we are committed to attracting, growing, and retaining the best talent in the industry.   About the Role   Memac Ogilvy, a leading creative network in MENA and part of the global Ogilvy/WPP network, is seeking a Senior Art Director for our Beirut office. We are an integrated communications agency focused on 'Making Brands Matter' through agile delivery and a strong people agenda. You'll join a diverse creative team, led by our Executive Creative Director, contributing to award-winning work in a competitive industry space. What You’ll Do     Conceptualize & Execute : Develop and execute compelling visual concepts and designs for integrated campaigns, ensuring high-quality craft, brand adherence, and effective communication across various platforms, especially digital and social. Collaborate & Innovate : Work closely with creative partners, managers, and clients to translate briefs into visually engaging solutions, pushing creative boundaries and exploring new techniques, including leveraging AI tools. Manage & Deliver : Oversee campaigns from concept to completion, managing multiple projects, meeting deadlines, and ensuring all work is delivered on time, on budget, and to the highest quality. Strategic Thinking : Understand client needs, market trends, and brand values to develop strategic, insightful creative solutions. Internal Relationships : Build strong relationships with internal departments (Account Management, Planning, Traffic) to ensure seamless project execution.   What You’ll Need      Experience : Proven experience in art direction with a strong portfolio showcasing excellent craft in design, typography, layout, and visual storytelling across integrated campaigns. Technical Proficiency : Expert in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and other relevant design software. Solid understanding of visual design principles, digital, and social media best practices. Basic to intermediate knowledge of AI tools for design, with a willingness to learn. Creative & Strategic Acumen : Ability to generate fresh, original ideas, translate strategic concepts into effective visuals, and articulate creative ideas clearly. Strong understanding of brand stewardship. Communication & Collaboration : Excellent communication skills (written and verbal), strong listening skills, and a collaborative team-player attitude. Ability to give and receive constructive feedback. Organizational Skills : Highly organized, proactive, and able to manage multiple tasks and work effectively under pressure. Language : Native or near-native proficiency in Arabic (speaking, reading, writing) is mandatory.   How We’ll Support You   Ogilvy celebrates its people. Fully. Enthusiastically. Unhesitatingly. We’ll empower you with the tools you’ll need to succeed. We’ll give you the autonomy to seek out new paths and better ways of doing things. We’ll support you with colleagues who are experts in their disciplines, drawn from across the Ogilvy network. And we’ll provide opportunities for you to do work of which you’ll be proud, with people you’ll be proud to call your teammates.    Ogilvy was founded in 1948 by David Ogilvy. David created a culture that deeply respects and cares about its people and clients. Our mission is to inspire people and brands to make an impact and we are committed to attracting, growing, and retaining the best talent in the industry.   Ogilvy was founded in 1948 by David Ogilvy. A reputable company located in Lebanon is seeking to recruit an Associate Consultant. Main Duties : Execute assigned project tasks in governance, risk management, compliance, and internal audit engagements, ensuring timely and accurate delivery. Prepare detailed project documentation, including process maps, risk registers, audit working papers, compliance reports, and client presentations. Conduct structured research, data analysis, and benchmarking to support client deliverables. Coordinate directly with client teams to gather information, validate data, and follow up on agreed actions. Support in conducting workshops, training programs, and client interviews by preparing materials and documenting outputs. Work on multiple client assignments simultaneously, demonstrating flexibility and attention to detail. Contribute to business development activities, such as drafting proposal sections, developing case studies, and preparing marketing materials. Job Purpose Responsible for developing, implementing and monitoring strategic and tactical marketing programs, innovative winning growth strategies and plans that will result in achieving superior brand and sales performance and substantial local and international growth for a specific line of products Responsible for supporting the Head of Marketing in Business Development tasks such as conducting research, analysis and presenting recommendations for assigned projects Perform duties in accordance with Malia Group Policies and Procedures Duties And Responsibilities On Business Development - Identify, in collaboration with the Head of Marketing and Business Development Department opportunities for development and growth (enlargement of Pharmaline portfolio: newly created products, existing products extension) - Conduct needed research and analysis for assigned projects and submit recommendations to Head of Marketing - Monitor the execution to achieve business growth and substantial profit of the brands and products locally and internationally - Attend progress meetings with Pharmaline Management to share findings and recommendations On Marketing Plan - Support the Head of Marketing in the development of the yearly marketing plan for the assigned line of products that will result in achieving agreed sales performance, in local and export markets - Set the strategy for the Pharmacy Channel and ensure its execution - Contribute in setting brand goals and annual targets per product - Follow up on setting product strategy and action plans - Follow up on the implementation of the yearly marketing plan initiatives - Act proactively to avoid problems; identify and take advantage of opportunities that will pay off in the mid/long term On Product Launching - Develop and follow-up on new products' launching plans (suggest new product price following applicable regulations, set target by SKU) - Handle briefing with Pharmaline’s creative team & follow-up on agreed agenda to ensure the necessary promotions are created and developed in a timely manner - Ensure that all materials needed for launching are available two weeks ahead of launch date - Prepare the training agenda and material, in collaboration with the Medical Advisor and the R&D - Implement set initiatives with excellence, keep track of expenditures and respect budget limits - Conduct post launches situation analysis (market dynamics, market growth market share, medical feedback, penetration strategy) On Budget - Set the marketing budget for the line of assigned products - Monitor the marketing budget versus spending. Analyze expenditure and recommend necessary corrective actions On Market Research - Conduct physicians, customers’ research locally and internationally and continuously master a deep understanding of their needs and motivation. Propose recommendations, take corrective actions and set needed plans to meet changing circumstances - Conduct for local and international markets, regular analysis of goal achievements, activities evaluation, obstacles, suggestions, opportunities and suggest recommendations accordingly On Post-Clinical Market Studies - Collaborate with Key Opinion Leaders and Medical Advisor to conduct post clinical marketing studies of Pharmaline Products - Coordinate with the Head of Marketing to get the approval on the budget of the study and with the Medical Advisor for protocol approval - Prepare with Medical Advisor the needed marketing tools (brochure, training...) On Competition Analysis - Monitor continuously competitor activities locally, internationally and ensure that product line is competitive in the market place On Marketing Tools -Support Product Managers in developing marketing materials, sales aids, presentations, in collaboration with the medical advisor, for all involved parties to successfully market, promote, advertise, educate and sell the products locally and internationally; Make sure that content meet scientific specifications and authorities regulations - Coordinate with the procurement department for visibility material, promotional marketing material ideas, sourcing options and production offers as per set budget On Medical Events - Develop and actively contribute with involved parties for the organization of local and international launching plans, events, and seminars On Marketing Trainings - Prepare, in collaboration with the medical advisor and the R&D, the needed medical trainings to be provided to the marketing and sales team members On Customer Relations - Build and maintain a distinguished relationship with the medical community On Reporting - Submit on a monthly basis reports to management including sales achievements versus targets, previous period growth, poor versus strong performing group of products with recommendations to meet objectives Responsible for developing, implementing and monitoring strategic and tactical marketing programs, innovative winning growth strategies and plans that will result in achieving superior brand and sales performance and substantial local and international growth for a specific line of products Responsible for supporting the Head of Marketing in Business Development tasks such as conducting research, analysis and presenting recommendations for assigned projects Perform duties in accordance with Malia Group Policies and Procedures Duties And Responsibilities On Business Development - Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Designhub to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Designhub Job Description Our company is looking for a talented and experienced Interior Designer. The prospective candidate will be responsible for creating visually pleasing and functional interior spaces that align with our client's needs and preferences. Using your expertise in interior design and proficiency in 3D Max software, you will be producing high-quality renderings that effectively communicate your design concepts. Job Purpose The objective of the Interior Designer role is not just to ensure the aesthetic appeal of the spaces, but also to make them functional and apt for client needs. It involves demonstrating an excellent understanding of spatial design, attention to detail and the capability to collaborate effectively with clients, ensuring the final design aligns with their vision. Job Duties and Responsibilities Creation of visually appealing and functional interior spaces according to the client's needs and preferences. Proficiency in using 3D Max software for high-quality rendering of design concepts. Demonstrate strong skills in 3D modeling and rendering as part of the design process. Exhibit a keen understanding and implementation of spatial design and bring attention to detail in all projects. Work in collaboration with clients and other stakeholders to align the final design with the client's vision. Qualifications Required Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Interior Design or a related field. Proficiency in 3D Max software and other design tools. Solid experience and proven skills in 3D modeling and rendering. Strong understanding of spatial design. Excellent attention to detail. Experience in client and stakeholder collaboration. Company Description SLEEP COMFORT Job Description Experience Required: Minimum 5 years in industrial and factory maintenance Employment Type: Full-time Job Summary: We are seeking an experienced and proactive Maintenance Manager to oversee the maintenance operations of our factory and ensure the smooth functioning of all machinery, equipment, and facilities. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background in industrial maintenance and proven experience in managing maintenance teams in a manufacturing or factory environment. Key Responsibilities: Develop and implement preventive and corrective maintenance plans for all machines and equipment. Supervise and lead the maintenance team to ensure timely and efficient work execution. Monitor equipment performance, troubleshoot issues, and minimize downtime. Manage spare parts inventory and ensure availability of critical components. Coordinate with production and operations teams to schedule maintenance activities without disrupting workflow. Ensure compliance with safety regulations and company policies in all maintenance operations. Prepare and manage maintenance budgets, cost estimates, and reports. Liaise with external service providers for specialized repairs and technical support. Qualifications & Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical, Electrical, or Industrial Engineering (or equivalent technical field). Minimum 5 years of experience in maintenance management within industrial or manufacturing settings. Strong knowledge of industrial machinery, equipment, and maintenance best practices. Proven leadership and team management skills. Ability to analyze and solve technical problems effectively. Strong organizational and time management skills. Good communication skills in Arabic and English. Work Schedule: Full-time, based in Beirut. About Anghami Inc: Join the Team at Anghami Inc.! Anghami Inc. is home to two of the region’s most dynamic digital entertainment platforms—Anghami and OSN+. Together, they’ve created a powerhouse reshaping how the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region experiences music, premium video, podcasts, and live entertainment. Founded in 2012, Anghami is the MENA region’s leading multimedia streaming platform, connecting a community of over 120 million users, including 2.5 million paid subscribers. With headquarters in Abu Dhabi and offices across Dubai, Beirut, Cairo, and Riyadh, Anghami proudly became the first Arab tech company listed on NASDAQ (ANGH), making it more than a platform—it’s a hub for innovation, offering diverse entertainment experiences. In 2024, Anghami joined forces with OSN+, the region and go-to platform for premium video streaming. OSN+ is known for its exclusive HBO series, Max Originals, and a great mix of local and international content. With top partnerships with studios like Warner Bros. and NBC Universal, OSN+ brings even more exciting entertainment to the Anghami ecosystem, offering a complete experience for millions of users. At Anghami Inc., we’re passionate about building experiences that empower users to explore, connect, and share through entertainment. The team constantly pushes boundaries, crafting tools and features that allow people to express themselves and tell their unique stories. Be part of a team that shaping the future of entertainment in the MENA region and beyond. Where Words Become Culture We’re in the business of moments; those shows everyone’s talking about, that song you can’t stop playing, the stories and sounds that bring people together. At OSN+ and Anghami, we don’t just stream content; we set the stage for how the Arab world watches, listens, and connects with what’s next. OSN+ is home to HBO exclusives, Hollywood blockbusters, Arabic originals, and family favourites; ready to watch anytime, anywhere, and always ad-free. Anghami is the soundtrack of the region, offering millions of songs, podcasts, and playlists, plus exclusive releases and originals that keep fans coming back for more. Together, we’re creating an entertainment ecosystem like no other; movies, series, music, and podcasts; shaped by the tastes, trends, and stories of the MENA region. Welcome to Your Next Big Story We work on brands people watch, stream, talk about, and share. From binge-worthy shows to viral music releases, global campaigns to regional pushes, our words spark conversations that matter. We’re looking for a Bilingual Copywriter who can move effortlessly between Arabic and English; crafting copy that’s culturally sharp, strategically smart, and impossible to ignore. You’re deeply passionate about words, the streaming industry, and the power of storytelling. You stay ahead of the curve, tracking trends, testing fresh copy tricks, diving into benchmarking studies and you’re never afraid to think outside the box to make every message resonate. Based in Beirut, you’ll collaborate with our Creative Services team and report to the Head of Copywriting in Dubai, writing for audiences across the GCC and MENA region. You’ll be part of a team where creativity is celebrated, respect is real, and pride in the brands we work on runs deep. What You’ll Do Write daily copy across the OSN+ and Anghami ecosystem; CRM in-app messages, push notifications, banners, emails, and SMS. Turn insights into ideas and ideas into fully-fledged campaign concepts for titles, categories, and brand campaigns. Script and craft supers for video promos, trailers, and branded content. Balance big creative thinking with quick, functional copy for fast-moving projects. Work closely with designers and art directors to ensure words and visuals tell the same story. Contribute to proactive pitches and take an active role in creative brainstorms. What You’ll Bring 3–6 years’ experience in copywriting, creative strategy, or marketing, preferably in media, streaming, content, or entertainment. Native/fluent Arabic and fluent English (French is a plus). Proven skill in writing across formats: short-form, long-form, conceptual, and brand tone-of-voice work. A deep understanding of Arabic dialects and cultural nuances, especially Egyptian, Levant, and GCC. A conceptual mindset that can transform a small brief into a big, memorable idea. Experience crafting copy that performs in digital marketing and paid media. Why You’ll Love Working Here Write for two of the region’s most exciting entertainment and streaming brands. Be part of a team that values creativity, respect, and fun as much as performance. Shape brand voices across industries, formats, and platforms. We’re looking for a Bilingual Copywriter who can move effortlessly between Arabic and English; crafting copy that’s culturally sharp, strategically smart, and impossible to ignore. You’re deeply passionate about words, the streaming industry, and the power of storytelling. You stay ahead of the curve, tracking trends, testing fresh copy tricks, diving into benchmarking studies and you’re never afraid to think outside the box to make every message resonate. Bilingual Copywriter Based in Beirut, you’ll collaborate with our Creative Services team and report to the Head of Copywriting in Dubai, writing for audiences across the GCC and MENA region. You’ll be part of a team where creativity is celebrated, respect is real, and pride in the brands we work on runs deep. What You’ll Do What You’ll Do Write daily copy across the OSN+ and Anghami ecosystem; CRM in-app messages, push notifications, banners, emails, and SMS. Write daily copy across the OSN+ and Anghami ecosystem; CRM in-app messages, push notifications, banners, emails, and SMS. Turn insights into ideas and ideas into fully-fledged campaign concepts for titles, categories, and brand campaigns. Turn insights into ideas and ideas into fully-fledged campaign concepts for titles, categories, and brand campaigns. Script and craft supers for video promos, trailers, and branded content. Script and craft supers for video promos, trailers, and branded content. Balance big creative thinking with quick, functional copy for fast-moving projects. Balance big creative thinking with quick, functional copy for fast-moving projects. Work closely with designers and art directors to ensure words and visuals tell the same story. Work closely with designers and art directors to ensure words and visuals tell the same story. Contribute to proactive pitches and take an active role in creative brainstorms. Contribute to proactive pitches and take an active role in creative brainstorms. What You’ll Bring What 3–6 years’ experience in copywriting, creative strategy, or marketing, preferably in media, streaming, content, or entertainment. 3–6 years’ experience in copywriting, creative strategy, or marketing, preferably in media, streaming, content, or entertainment. Native/fluent Arabic and fluent English (French is a plus). Native/fluent Arabic and fluent English (French is a plus). Proven skill in writing across formats: short-form, long-form, conceptual, and brand tone-of-voice work. Proven skill in writing across formats: short-form, long-form, conceptual, and brand tone-of-voice work. A deep understanding of Arabic dialects and cultural nuances, especially Egyptian, Levant, and GCC. A deep understanding of Arabic dialects and cultural nuances, especially Egyptian, Levant, and GCC. A conceptual mindset that can transform a small brief into a big, memorable idea. A conceptual mindset that can transform a small brief into a big, memorable idea. Experience crafting copy that performs in digital marketing and paid media. Experience crafting copy that performs in digital marketing and paid media. Why You’ll Love Working Here Why Write for two of the region’s most exciting entertainment and streaming brands. Write for two of the region’s most exciting entertainment and streaming brands. Be part of a team that values creativity, respect, and fun as much as performance. Be part of a team that values creativity, respect, and fun as much as performance. Shape brand voices across industries, formats, and platforms. Shape brand voices across industries, formats, and platforms. Work on campaigns that people see, hear, share, and remember. Work on campaigns that people see, hear, share, and remember.

Careem is building the Everything App for the greater Middle East, making it easier than ever to move around, order food and groceries, manage payments, and more. Careem is led by a powerful purpose to simplify and improve the lives of people and build an awesome organisation that inspires. Since 2012, Careem has created earnings for over 2.5 million Captains, simplified the lives of over 70 million customers, and built a platform for the region’s best talent to thrive and for entrepreneurs to scale their businesses. Careem operates in over 70 cities across 10 countries, from Morocco to Pakistan. About the team The Careem Analytics team’s mission is to build and track the full lively picture for Careem businesses and experiences, uphold the experience bar, provide actionable insights, formulate problems, and contribute to solving them. As part of this team, you will be a core team member fulfilling this mission. You will be working alongside the top analyst talent of the region, leveraging modern analysis and visualization tools to solve the region’s day-to-day problems. We are offering this position as a consultancy-based, full-time remote role based in Lebanon Only.  What you'll do Act as the first point of contact to answer all business data queries Develop effective reporting solutions by utilizing engineering best practices and various reporting tools Participate in continuous improvement of these reporting solutions Drive and support your designated business unit by converting complex data and findings into understandable tables, graphs, and written reports Present appropriate analysis and commentary to technical and non-technical audience Gain subject matter expertise and help define appropriate key metrics for the business unit and discover untapped areas for business improvement Provide concrete data-driven insights Test and communicate new features to users Run regular data integrity audits Devise and evaluate methods for collecting data, such as surveys, questionnaires, and opinion polls Gather data about consumers, competitors, and market conditions What you'll need 4+ years of demonstrated experience working in an analytical role 3+ years of demonstrated experience with business intelligence and visualization tools creating management dashboards Strong analytical skills and a passion to work with large sets of data Passionate about learning new technologies and working on a product of massive scale and impact Expert at writing SQL queries against large amounts of data Self-starter with excellent communication and organizational skills Ability to get hands-on in a complex operational environment Must be process-oriented and a logical thinker with good attention to detail Working knowledge with reporting tools such as Tableau, MicroStrategy, or Looker Working knowledge in Python, R, Spark, Hive Experience in ETL / ELT is a plus Experience working with dimensional data, data lakes is a plus Experience working with MPP databases like Redshift is a plus   Careem is building the Everything App Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with ATC to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: ATC Job Description نحن نبحث عن سائق سيارة فيتيس محترف للانضمام إلى فريقنا في شركة تعهدات بالحدت. يتطلب الدور قيادة فعالة لسيارة فيتيس وهو يتطلب مهارات قيادة ممتازة، والقدرة على الالتزام بالمواعيد والتعامل مع المهام اليومية بكفاءة. Job Purpose الهدف من هذه الوظيفة هو القيادة الفعالة لسيارة فيتيس في شركة تعهدات بالحدت. يجب أن يكون لديك القوة والدقة في التنقل والقيادة، والتقيد بالقوانين والمعايير المرورية. Job Duties and Responsibilities قيادة سيارة فيتيس بشكل فعال في شركة الحدت مكافحة التأخير والانتظام في احترام المواعيد ضمان المعالجة اليومية للمهام الخاصة بكفاءة تطبيق المعرفة الجيدة لقوانين المرور والسلامة على الطرق Qualifications Required Qualifications القدرة على قيادة سيارة فيتيس بفعالية مهارات قيادة متميزة القدرة على الالتزام بالمواعيد القدرة على التعامل مع المهام اليومية بكفاءة معرفة جيدة بقوانين المرور والسلامة على الطرق Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with ATC to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Cloud Ascent to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Cloud Ascent Job Description The role of a Technical Support Specialist is critical in our organization as they serve as the first point of contact for our customers who are experiencing technical issues related to our products or services. Job Purpose The main purpose of this role is to assist customers in resolving technical issues, to provide them a smooth user experience. This includes diagnosing the problem, providing solutions, and guiding users through troubleshooting steps. Job Duties and Responsibilities Assist customers in resolving technical issues related to our products or services Ensure the smooth user experience by diagnosing problems and providing immediate solutions Guide users through troubleshooting steps effectively Demonstrate strong problem-solving abilities and effective communication Maintain customer satisfaction by addressing their concerns with patience and empathy Qualifications Required Qualifications Experience in a similar technical support role Strong problem-solving abilities Excellent communication skills Solid understanding of the technology or software being supported Ability to guide users through troubleshooting steps effectively Patience and empathy when working with customers Experience in diagnosing problems and providing solutions Demonstrated customer service skills Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Cloud Ascent to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. The Telephone Operator is responsible for answering all incoming calls originating from within and outside the hotel in a friendly and caring manner according to the Kempinski and LQA standards. The job of Telephone Operator is executed satisfactorily when: LQA (Leading Quality Assurance) audit results are 85% and above. CSS (Customer Satisfaction Survey) results are rated on an average with “5” and above. Telephone system is always well maintained. Telephone lists are up to date. Company Description Cloud Ascent is a Microsoft Partner and technology startup operating in the Middle East and recently expanding into Europe, with established entities in Lebanon and Cyprus. We help organizations grow in the digital age through the transformative power of Microsoft cloud technology. By leveraging the full capabilities of the Microsoft ecosystem, we deliver tailored solutions that empower organizations of all sizes and industries while also modernizing their workforce experience. Job Description As a Learning and Development Coordinator at Cloud Ascent, you’ll spark growth and unlock talent across the organization. This is your opportunity to design and deliver interactive training programs that elevate our teams by strengthening the soft skills that drive success in every workplace. Your creativity and passion for development will help shape a culture where people are equipped to grow, lead, and thrive personally and professionally. Beyond soft skills development, you’ll help implement a Learning Management System (LMS) and integrate it with Microsoft tools to enhance training accessibility and tracking. You’ll then oversee all aspects of Microsoft-related learning initiatives, including the effective use of Microsoft Learn and Viva Learning. You’ll also manage certification tracking systems, coordinate training sessions, and support employees along their Microsoft skilling and certification journeys. Responsibilities: Training Needs Assessment: Identify skill gaps and learning priorities through surveys, performance data, and collaboration with management to align training with organizational goals. Program Design and Development: Design and update training programs using diverse formats (e-learning, workshops, seminars) to meet evolving learning needs. Create and deliver engaging training materials, including presentations, handouts, and digital content. Develop and facilitate onboarding programs to introduce new hires to company policies, culture, and learning practices. Learning Management System (LMS) Administration: Research, evaluate, and recommend the most suitable LMS platform for company-wide implementation. Manage and maintain the LMS, ensuring accurate course registration, tracking, and user management. Integrate the LMS with Microsoft Learn and Viva Learning to streamline access to role-based skilling and certification resources. Employee Engagement and Development: Promote a culture of continuous learning by encouraging participation in training initiatives and assigning relevant courses with clear deadlines and progress assessments. Support career growth through coaching, mentoring, and peer-learning opportunities. Training Logistics & Microsoft Exam Readiness Coordinate employee enrollment in Microsoft Learn paths and manage certification exam scheduling, including registration and rescheduling. Maintain calendars for training sessions, exam deadlines, and certification milestones, while liaising with Microsoft Learning Partners and external providers to ensure smooth program delivery. Support internal and external training events (e.g., workshops, bootcamps) and track employee progress, offering reminders and resources to boost exam readiness. Continuous Improvement and Innovation: Stay informed about the latest trends and best practices in learning and development. Introduce new learning technologies, tools, and methods to enhance training programs. Reporting and Documentation: Maintain accurate records of all training activities, including attendance, feedback, and outcomes. Prepare reports for management on training program performance, successes, and areas for improvement. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Education, Information Technology, Computer Science, or any related field. 0-3 years of relevant experience. Well-developed communication skills with the ability to connect with people at all levels and influence effectively when appropriate. Confident, proactive personality with the ability to lead discussions, influence stakeholders, and motivate learners. Fluency in written and spoken English is mandatory (French is a plus). Basic knowledge in Microsoft Office Suite (Outlook, Excel, Word, PowerPoint...). Prior internship or hands-on experience in learning and development or HR is preferred. Strong organizational skills with a focus on relationship building. About Us Anghami is the leading multi-media technology streaming platform in the Middle East and North Africa ('MENA') region, offering a comprehensive ecosystem of exclusive premium video, music, podcasts, live entertainment, audio services and more. Since its launch in 2012, Anghami has led the way as the first music streaming platform to digitize MENA’s music catalog, reshaping the region's entertainment landscape. In a strategic move in April 2024, Anghami joined forces with OSN+, a leading video streaming platform, forming a digital entertainment powerhouse. This pivotal transaction strengthened Anghami's position as a go-to destination, boasting an extensive library of over 18,000 hours of premium video, including exclusive HBO content, alongside 100+ million Arabic and International songs and podcasts. With a user base exceeding 120 million registered users and 2.5 million paid subscribers, Anghami has partnered with 47 telcos across MENA, facilitating customer acquisition and subscription payment, in addition to establishing relationships with major film studios, entertainment giants, and music labels, both regional and international. Headquartered in Abu Dhabi, UAE, Anghami operates in 16 countries across MENA, with offices in Beirut, Dubai, Cairo, and Riyadh. We believe in data-driven innovation, cross-functional collaboration, and a culture of continuous learning. Job Summary We’re looking for a Senior UX Writer to lead UX copy across English, French, and Arabic for Anghami and OSN+, enhancing user experiences through clear, concise, and engaging content. Key Responsibilities Own and lead UX writing across mobile, web, and TV platforms for Anghami and OSN+, aligning with each brand’s tone of voice and guidelines. Craft intuitive, effective copy that guides users seamlessly through the app, covering everything from default interface text to subscription and upgrade flows. Write and optimize default user journeys to ensure clarity and a smooth experience across all touchpoints. Develop and maintain UX copy style guides for both platforms to ensure consistency and reinforce each brand’s identity. Collaborate closely with product designers, product managers, and other stakeholders on a variety of initiatives, including: - New user journeys - Journey optimizations - Subscriptions, churns, payments and cancellation journeys - Landing pages for marketing & partnership - SMS, Email, and Push Notifications - Incorporate feedback and insights to continuously improve copy for clarity, usability, and engagement. Tasks Overview Subscription journey and communications, including emails, push notifications Cancellation flow Partnerships landing pages (including special offers, redeem) Error scenarios Grace period journey and communications, including emails, push notifications Churn journey communications, including emails and push notifications Enhancements on existing journeys and screens (My list, sign up/log in screen, etc.) Subscription repricing emails and dialogues Soundtrack list revamp Update payment method journey New shows landing pages (The White Lotus, The Last of Us) Restart subscription journey Weekly watchlist email guidelines Requirements Proven experience writing UX copy in English and Arabic, with working proficiency in French. Strong understanding of UX principles and user behavior. Experience working with Figma. Familiarity with POEditor is a plus. About Four Seasons: Four Seasons is powered by our people. We are a collective of individuals who crave to become better, to push ourselves to new heights and to treat each other as we wish to be treated in return. Our team members around the world create amazing experiences for our guests, residents, and partners through a commitment to luxury with genuine heart. We know that the best way to enable our people to deliver these exceptional guest experiences is through a world-class employee experience and company culture. At Four Seasons, we believe in recognizing a familiar face, welcoming a new one and treating everyone we meet the way we would want to be treated ourselves. Whether you work with us, stay with us, live with us or discover with us, we believe our purpose is to create impressions that will stay with you for a lifetime. It comes from our belief that life is richer when we truly connect to the people and the world around us. About the location: Centuries-old Lebanese hospitality with a modern twist. At Four Seasons Hotel Beirut, our passionate team of local insiders can’t wait to introduce you to the people and places that make our stylish and friendly city tick. From the Hotel’s downtown location, you can set out to explore the capital’s bustling markets, admire ancient ruins, bask in the sun along our Mediterranean coastline and discover the natural wonders that lie within the snow-capped Lebanese Mountains just a short drive away. Or, simply take it all in at once from our 26th-floor rooftop, offering one of the best views in the entire city. The Role of Commercial Director: Following an extensive renovation and restoration, The Four Seasons Hotel Beirut is anticipated to reopen in 2026, marking an exciting new chapter for our property. We are now seeking a Commercial Director to join our team and help shape its future. Reporting to the General Manager, you will be an integral member of the Hotel Leadership team that is collectively responsible for making key strategic and operational decisions for the hotel. The Commercial Director oversees all commercial activities with the support of teams including Sales, Revenue Management, Reservations and Public Relations. This leadership role focuses on all Sales, Marketing, and product development activities to ensure strategies yield optimal performance while supporting the overall brand strategy. In collaboration with your General Manager, you will provide direction on pricing, revenue management, MarCom, Rooms sales strategy and tactics. You will be responsible for developing and implementing the annual commercial plan and budget process, analyzing the property’s capabilities and identifying the direct sales, advertising and public relations programs to attract business, developing marketing programs, managing hotel presence and content across all communication channels, developing the Public Relations strategy, and crafting Social Media strategy and distribution outlets along with overseeing updates and execution in collaboration with your PR Director. You will have a special talent for building, leading, coaching, training, and developing a strong team; ensuring our employees feel at home and receive the highest levels of support and care along with creating a great workplace for all great people to deliver great experiences. Our Ideal Commercial Director candidate will have: Sales and marketing experience in the luxury segment with strong revenue and budget management skills, exceptional communication skills with the ability to build trust and confidence with your team and your stakeholders. A strategist who understands the luxury market, customer, and travel preferences; the ability to think critically and evaluate best possible solutions and resources to implement priorities and manage multiple initiatives; have an exceptional eye for detail, and a creative flair; bringing your personal touch and energy to our hotel. Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts can offer what many hospitality professionals dream of; the opportunity to build a life-long career with global potential and a real sense of pride in work well done. We look for talent who share the Golden Rule – people who, by nature, believe in treating others as we would have them treat us. As Four Seasons works towards phenomenal growth in the next decade, our most valuable partners continue to be our talent, with whom we have a strong relationship based on the Golden Rule. This relationship is made tangible by the awards received year after year by Four Seasons on a corporate level, as well as by our hotels, resorts and residences around the world, making us an undisputed “employer of choice.” About Four Seasons: About Four Seasons: Four Seasons is powered by our people. A strategist who understands the luxury market, customer, and travel preferences; the ability to think critically and evaluate best possible solutions and resources to implement priorities and manage multiple initiatives; have an exceptional eye for detail, and a creative flair; bringing your personal touch and energy to our hotel. Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts can offer what many hospitality professionals dream of; the opportunity to build a life-long career with global potential and a real sense of pride in work well done. We look for talent who share the Golden Rule – people who, by nature, believe in treating others as we would have them treat us. As Four Seasons works towards phenomenal growth in the next decade, our most valuable partners continue to be our talent, with whom we have a strong relationship based on the Golden Rule. This relationship is made tangible by the awards received year after year by Four Seasons on a corporate level, as well as by our hotels, resorts and residences around the world, making us an undisputed “employer of choice.”

Job Purpose Responsible for maintaining the accuracy, consistency and integrity of financial data across all Malia Group subsidiaries. Responsible for monitoring the trial balance, ensuring the correct application of profit and cost centers, managing price lists in coordination with the Sales team, and generating financial reports. Perform duties in accordance with Malia Group policies and procedures. Duties And Responsibilities On Trial Balance Control - Review the trial balance weekly on System to ensure the completeness and accuracy of accounting entries while meeting reporting deadlines - Investigate discrepancies and/or errors, coordinate with the accounting team to implement corrections, and liaise with concerned departments to prevent recurrence - Maintain a log of recurring issues and propose process improvements to enhance data accuracy and efficiency On Profit & Cost Centers Management - Verify the effective recording of transactions under the correct profit centers and cost centers in compliance with internal policies - Follow up with concerned departments to adjust misallocations promptly and provide guidance on correct coding practices On Price List Administration - Maintain and update price lists across all subsidiaries - Liaise with the Sales team regarding currency fluctuations, cost increases due to purchasing changes or other factors affecting pricing On Financial Reporting - Generate accurate and timely financial reports across all subsidiaries on system - Ensure compliance with reporting standards and internal deadlines - Support the team with ad-hoc data analysis and reporting as needed On Support - Support treasury-related activities during the absence of the Treasury Analyst, ensuring smooth continuity in daily financial operations Responsible for maintaining the accuracy, consistency and integrity of financial data across all Malia Group subsidiaries. Job Description We are seeking an experienced and customer-focused Front Office Supervisor for an Hotel Located in Iraq to join our team. This role is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced hospitality environment and takes pride in delivering exceptional guest experiences. Key Responsibilities: Oversee daily front office operations to ensure smooth, efficient service. Lead and motivate front desk staff, providing training and performance feedback. Handle guest inquiries, complaints, and special requests with professionalism. Coordinate with other departments to meet guest needs and maintain service standards. Monitor check-in/check-out procedures, reservations, and billing accuracy. Qualifications Previous experience in a front office or guest services supervisory role. Strong communication, leadership, and problem-solving skills. Proficiency with front office systems and standard office software. Ability to work flexible shifts, including weekends and holidays. A passion for hospitality and a commitment to excellence. Murex is a global fintech leader in trading, risk management and processing solutions for capital markets. Operating from our 19 offices, 3 000 Murexians from over 60 different nationalities ensure the development, implementation and support of our platform which is used by banks, asset managers, corporations and utilities, across the world. Join Murex and work on the challenges of an industry at the forefront of innovation and thrive in a people-centric environment. You’ll be part of one global team where you can learn fast and stay true to yourself. The team Secured funding and trading domain is delivering best of breed products and functionalities to Secured Funding and Trading market players via the MX.3 award-winning SecFin solution. As part of the exploration and development of a new offering in the financial markets servicing space—specifically focused on the Equity Prime Swaps business— you will be joining the Synthetics financing team which encompasses synthetic products on equities, securities, indices, or private debt that emulate the buying/selling of securities in a synthetic manner in exchange for financing. The team is responsible for modeling the various business lines associated with these products, covering a wide range of activities: Delta 1, Prime Brokerage, Secured Private Debt, etc. The missions Combining Functional and technical expertise and acting as Product consultant, you mission consists of: Contribute to the corrective and evolutive maintenance of SecFin solution : Manage client incidents and provide assistance in a timely manner. Gather new client business requirements, prepare specifications, follow the development cycle and manage client communication Prepare design and specification of new Prime swap servicing offer: Analyzing market trends in Equity Prime Swaps, Organizing and facilitating client workshops and working sessions Contributing to the identification of platform evolutions required to support the Equity Prime Swaps servicing model, including booking, lifecycle, margining, and connectivity. Validating the design and specification with relevant stakeholders. Assisting Agile teams during implementation acting as product expert. Documenting and making demos of the new interfaces/functionalities. Knowledge sharing with the team, pre-sales and client services around the globe including documentation demoes … and promote team’s productized solution Contribute to solution packaging by using Murex configuration tooling to implement standard business processes. Follow client implementation and ensure smooth go-live process. Who you are Engineering degree or equivalent with up to 3 years of experience ideally in the banking or software development industry Passionate about technology and financial markets Good understanding of post-trade for derivatives and securities finance Experience with organizing / formalizing specifications and validation documents Strong analytical and problem-solving skills English is a must Autonomous, self-driven working approach working collaboratively on multiple projects concurrently. Company Description Cloud Ascent is a Microsoft Partner and Cloud Service Provider operating in the Middle East and recently in Europe, with established entities in Lebanon and Cyprus. We help organizations grow in the digital age through the transformative power of Microsoft cloud technology. By leveraging the full capabilities of the Microsoft ecosystem, we deliver tailored solutions that empower organizations of all sizes and industries. We also offer Microsoft training courses to promote global cloud awareness and equip individuals with the essential skills needed for success in the digital and intelligent business era. Job Description As an Entry-Level Cloud Support Associate, you will provide top-tier technical support for clients using Microsoft cloud solutions. Your responsibilities include troubleshooting and resolving support incidents, ensuring optimal system performance, and documenting technical issues. You will also collaborate with vendors and customers to assist both technical and non-technical users in effectively utilizing Microsoft Cloud technologies, while continuously staying informed on the latest cloud advancements. Job Duties and Responsibilities Technical support: •Provide remote technical assistance and IT support to customers utilizing Microsoft cloud services, including Microsoft 365, SharePoint Online, OneDrive for Business, Microsoft Intune, Azure, Windows 365, and related Microsoft technologies. •Investigate and troubleshoot system-related incidents, ensuring timely resolution and accurate documentation of technical issues and user interactions. •Perform proactive monitoring and routine maintenance of Microsoft cloud environments to ensure optimal performance, security, and availability. •Assist in the development of technical implementation plans for Microsoft cloud deployments, working closely with internal teams and customers. •Collaborate with Microsoft Support and escalation teams to resolve complex technical issues efficiently. •Create and maintain comprehensive technical documentation, including troubleshooting steps and workarounds for recurring issues. •Assist in IT project implementations by supporting the deployment and configuration of Microsoft cloud solutions alongside the implementation team. •Conduct on-site customer visits, as needed, to support implementation, training, and ongoing relationship management. •Work closely with cross-functional teams to understand customer requirements and recommend tailored Microsoft Cloud solutions that align with their business goals. Customer Communication: •Engage with customers to thoroughly understand their technical concerns, offering clear communication and timely updates on IT incidents from identification through to resolution. •Provide high-level training to end-users on IT tools, applications, and industry best practices. Professional Development/ Training: •Stay current with the latest cloud technology trends by actively researching and exploring advancements in Microsoft cloud services. •Create short technical announcements to share updates on new or enhanced Microsoft cloud products and features, promoting knowledge sharing internally and with clients. •Prepare for and pursue Microsoft certifications to further develop expertise and gain recognized credentials in cloud technologies. Qualifications Required Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science/ Engineering, or any related field. 2–3 years of experience in an IT support or cloud support role. Strong understanding of Windows 11 operating system features, configuration, and troubleshooting. Working knowledge of common cloud computing concepts, including IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS. Hands-on experience with Microsoft 365 services (Exchange Online, Teams, OneDrive, SharePoint...). Familiarity with Entra ID and Microsoft Intune. Strong understanding of Windows Server, DNS, network protocols, and security concepts. Experience working with PowerShell for basic automation and scripting. Proven ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team. Excellent communication and collaboration skills (both verbal and written), with a strong customer-centric approach. Ability to effectively convey technical information to both technical and non-technical audiences. Strong attention to detail, excellent problem-solving skills, and the ability to perform well under pressure. Experience in coordinating with cross-functional teams and managing dependencies. Eagerness to continuously learn and apply new Microsoft technologies. Proficient in English and Arabic (French is a plus). Strong attention to detail, excellent problem-solving skills, and the ability to perform well under pressure. Experience in coordinating with cross-functional teams and managing dependencies. Eagerness to continuously learn and apply new Microsoft technologies. Proficient in English and Arabic (French is a plus).

A reputable NGO is Beirut, is urgently looking for a motivated Outreach and Community Engagement Officer to join their team on part time basis. The officer will play a key role in supporting and engaging the local community through the ongoing activities. Key Responsibilities: Connect with community members from the surrounding of Horsh Beirut area to ensure active participation in the project’s activities. Support in planning, coordinating, and implementing events and activities. Build trust with beneficiaries and encourage their involvement in activities. Collect feedback from participants and share insights with the project team. Document activities through attendance lists, photos, and brief reports. Company Description Green Light Immigration Inc . is a leading Canadian immigration firm with 20+ years of experience and thousands of successful cases. We’re expanding across Lebanon and Francophone regions, and we’re hiring motivated people to help us grow. Job Description What You’ll Do Use social media (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, LinkedIn) to find and engage potential clients Participate in groups, forums, and discussions related to immigration Create posts, stories, and reels promoting our services Chat with leads via DM/comments and refer them to our consultation team Follow up and track lead quality and conversions Collaborate with our team to improve strategy (Optional) Run or help manage paid ads if experienced Qualifications You’re a Great Fit If You: You are a student based in Lebanon (required) Speak Arabic, French, and English fluently Are active and skilled on social media Are passionate about immigration and helping others Are self-motivated, ambitious, and results-driven Understand online audiences in Lebanon, Algeria, Morocco, Tunisia , etc. Have experience in sales, marketing, or lead generation (preferred) Additional Information Compensation Fixed base + commissions on converted leads Earn up to $1,000+ per month, depending on performance To Apply Send us your CV , along with: Your social media profiles Examples of past content (if available) We’re hiring immediately – join a trusted firm, work remotely, and help people achieve their Canadian dream. Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Yaghi Group to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Yaghi Group Job Description We are looking for a dedicated Administrative Assistant who can efficiently support our team to ensure smooth office operations. This involves managing schedules, organizing files, handling correspondence and assisting with a range of administrative tasks. Job Purpose The purpose of the Administrative Assistant role is to be the backbone of the office, providing the necessary support to make sure the office operations run smoothly. This includes tasks such as managing schedules, handling correspondence, and keeping the work environment orderly and efficiently organized. Job Duties and Responsibilities Provide efficient support for smooth office operations Manage schedules and organize files Handle correspondence and assist with administrative tasks Demonstrate strong organizational abilities and effective communication skills Maintain proficiency in office software and ensure meticulous attention to detail Qualifications Required Qualifications Ability to provide efficient support to ensure smooth office operations Experience managing schedules and organizing files Adept at handling correspondence and proficiency in administrative tasks Strong organizational abilities and effective communication skills Proficiency in office software Keen attention to detail Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Yaghi Group to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Job Title: Fractional Chief Technology Officer (CTO) – SaaS & AI/LLM
Description: Company Description About Nucleus Ventures Nucleus Ventures is a leading entity in corporate innovation, venture building, and advisory services, with a track record of successful ventures, operational advisory missions, and startup incubators. Based in Beirut, Nucleus Ventures also operates in France, the UK, and Cyprus, serving the EMEA region. The company collaborates closely with clients, leveraging subject matter experts, startups, and entrepreneurs to drive growth and innovation through tailored strategies. Job Description About the Role We are seeking a highly skilled and entrepreneurial Fractional CTO to join our team. This role is ideal for a hands-on technology leader who thrives in fast-paced environments and can take a product from concept to launch. You will be instrumental in shaping the technical direction of our next-generation SaaS platform, built with AI and Large Language Models (LLMs) at its core. Key Responsibilities Design and architect the product’s technical foundation. Build and deliver the Minimum Viable Product (MVP). Lead the integration and experimentation with AI/LLM technologies. Drive rapid prototyping to move from idea, working product quickly. Ensure scalability and robustness of the product architecture. Collaborate with founders and stakeholders to align technical execution with business goals. Qualifications Qualifications & Skills 5+ years of software engineering experience, with at least 2–3 years in a senior leadership role (CTO, Lead Engineer, or equivalent). Strong hands-on coding ability (preferably full-stack). Deep knowledge of AI/ML frameworks and LLM integration. Expertise in SaaS architecture and cloud infrastructure. Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent practical experience). Entrepreneurial mindset with the ability to work in a lean, agile startup environment. Excellent problem-solving and decision-making skills. Strong communication and collaboration skills. Additional Information Interested candidates should submit their CV and a short cover letter here or send an email to [[email protected]] with the subject line: Fractional Chief Technology Officer (CTO) Application – [Your Name] About Nucleus Ventures Nucleus Ventures is a leading entity in corporate innovation, venture building, and advisory services, with a track record of successful ventures, operational advisory missions, and startup incubators. Company Description E-Wallet Services Job Description We are looking for dynamic and results-driven Field Sales Agents to promote and sell our E- wallet services to local merchants. As a key part of our merchant acquisition strategy, you will be responsible for onboarding new merchants, training them on using the platform, and supporting their activation and initial usage. Key Responsibilities: • Merchant Acquisition: Identify, approach, and close deals with small to medium-sized businesses (grocery shops, pharmacies, mini markets, service providers, etc.) to onboard them onto the e wallet platform. • Product Pitching & Demonstration: Clearly communicate the benefits of the e-wallet solution, including payment acceptance, float management, cash-out services, and loyalty programs. • Training & Activation: Guide merchants through registration, wallet activation, and first transaction. Ensure they are comfortable using the app/platform. • Relationship Building: Act as the main point of contact for new merchants for the first 30 days. Gather feedback and ensure merchant satisfaction. • Reporting & Documentation: Submit daily visit reports, leads pipeline, and merchant onboarding data using mobile tools or tracking sheets provided. • Market Intelligence: Provide insights on competitor activities, merchant needs, and general feedback from the field. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): • Number of new merchants onboarded per week • Activation rate (% of merchants doing transactions) • Lead conversion rate • Territory coverage and number of visits • Merchant retention rate in first 30 days Qualifications: • High school diploma or equivalent; Bachelor's degree is a plus • 1 - 2 years of experience in field sales, especially in fintech, telecom, FMCG, or payment services • Strong interpersonal and negotiation skills • Knowledge of the local market and geography • Self-motivated and target-driven • Basic smartphone proficiency (apps, GPS, data entry) Additional Requirements: • Must own or have access to a smartphone • Ability to travel daily within assigned territory • Flexibility to work on weekends or extended hours if needed E-Wallet Services Job Description We are looking for dynamic and results-driven Field Sales Agents to promote and sell our E- wallet services to local merchants. Company Description Remote Call Center Job Description 🔹 Position Overview • Remote Call Center Representative • Entry-level position with on-the-job training • Minimum 9-month commitment required 🔹 Requirements • Good communication & computer skills • Fluent in English • Reliable and coachable • Must follow a strict training attendance policy (up to 2 weeks) 🔹 Tech Requirements • Laptop specs: o Windows: 8GB RAM, Core i5 (4 cores), 2.0GHz+ o Mac: 8GB RAM, Catalina/Big Sur/M1 chip, 2.0GHz+ • Headset: o Wired USB headset with visible microphone (No AirPods or wireless) • Internet: o Wired LTE router (SIM-powered, connected via cable) o Wi-Fi and hotspot not accepted 🔹 Schedule & Salary • Full-time: 5 days/week, 8–9 hrs/day • Base salary + performance incentives (if applicable) • Two yearly company events 🔹 Responsibilities • Handle inbound/outbound sales calls • Problem solving & documentation • Follow scripts and internal procedures • Maintain a calm, quiet work environment 🔹 How to Apply • Fill out the form: https://bit.ly/Forms-Telemarketingsub (please include where you found the link in the designated question on the form) Additional Information All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines. Company Description Since 1948, Parissis has evolved from a Lebanese ship repair workshop to a reputed leader in modern engineering and steel construction, working on high profile regional projects. Job Description General Administrative and Logistics Works: · Lead the implementation of the ERP system: o Learn how to use the ERP and be proactive in perfecting it o Implement and teach the use of aging reports – payables and receivables – in order to lead the customer and supplier payments follow up o Enhance the organization of the ERP system developing an adequate filing system, making sure workflows are implemented for each department. · Assist the logistics department in implementing the new workflow and tracking RFQs and Orders. · Assist the Business Development Manager in implementing other workflows and procedures to optimize departments organization, as well as performance reviews for each department. · Make process / system improvements to increase the overall effectiveness of forecasting reporting, planning and deliverables. · Assist the Administrative Manager in general office works (legalities, NSSF, etc…) if needed o Assist the Administrative Manager in collections and billings: Keep track of all projects, Track over and under billings, general follow ups, Payment Certificates preparation, invoice and proforma invoice preparations, POS, etc… · Assist the Business Development Manager in preparing business plans for expansion to new countries. Financial Management: · Cost Control: o Lead the implementation of cost control processes. o Analyze monthly cost report, with the assistance of procurement officer, then compare to monthly budget to see if anything is out of the ordinary. o Assist Financial Manager in cost control per project, preparing the Static Budget Analysis and the Flexible Budget Analysis reports. o Provide timely, accurate month-end variance reports to key stakeholders every month. o Assistant he Financial Manager in developing Job Cost report template and monitoring it. o Monitor the day-to-day financial operations within the company, such as payroll, invoicing, and other transactions. o Oversee financial department employees, including financial assistants and accountants. o Liaise with auditors to ensure appropriate monitoring of company finances is maintained. o Track the company's financial status and performance to identify areas for potential improvement. o Seek out methods for minimizing financial risk to the company o Provide insightful information and expectations to senior executives to aid in long-term and short-term decision making. o Review financial data and prepare activity reports and financial forecasts. o Present financial reports to the management. o Analyze costs, pricing, variable contributions, sales results and the company’s actual performance compared to the business plans. o Develop trends and projections for the firm’s finances. o Conduct reviews and evaluations for cost-reduction opportunities. o Manage the preparation of the company’s budget. o Establish and maintain financial policies and procedures for the company. o Understand and adhere to local financial regulations and legislation. · Cash Flow Management: o Petty Cash and Receipt Reconciliation o Assist the Financial Manager with the Project /Company cash flow forecast, in order to determine if the organization will have enough cash, need a loan, or have more cash. o Monitor and control the flow of cash coming into and going out of the organization, presenting weekly reports to finance manager, helping ensure the company’s business and investment needs are met. o Act as lead advisor in the continuous cycle forecasting process, taking decisions regarding customer and supplier payments, and act to quantify risks and opportunities. o Present and manage the risks and opportunities specific to the business unit. Proactively make recommendations to mitigate risk and realize opportunities. o Assist the Financial Manager regarding the dashboards, baseline analyses, and presentations related to financial management. o Leads the budget process and the implementation of improvements to the working capital forecasting process. Create new dashboards and develop KPIs for capital allocation requests. o Contribute to the decision-making process, identify emerging trends and activities, recommend appropriate alternatives or options, perform general and personalized analyzes, develop value-added KPIs, and make sound strategic decisions in a timely manner. o Lead the cash flow success plan by maintaining an appropriate level of communication with subject matter experts across all areas of the organization. o Research investment options when needed and perform capital budgeting analyses. o Safeguard, verify, and control all cash assets. o Establish and maintain banking relationships if needed. o Establish and maintain cash movement policies, procedures, and controls. o Produce monthly company reports, reports on working capital dashboards, treasury reports (cash balances, cash projections, credit reviews, etc.) Qualifications · Bachelor’s degree in Finance. · Fluency in English is imperative. · Knowledge of the construction industry.
