Job Description General Administrative and Logistics Works: · Lead the implementation of the ERP system: o Learn how to use the ERP and be proactive in perfecting it o Implement and teach the use of aging reports – payables and receivables – in order to lead the customer and supplier payments follow up o Enhance the organization of the ERP system developing an adequate filing system, making sure workflows are implemented for each department. · Assist the logistics department in implementing the new workflow and tracking RFQs and Orders. · Assist the Business Development Manager in implementing other workflows and procedures to optimize departments organization, as well as performance reviews for each department. · Make process / system improvements to increase the overall effectiveness of forecasting reporting, planning and deliverables. · Assist the Administrative Manager in general office works (legalities, NSSF, etc…) if needed o Assist the Administrative Manager in collections and billings: Keep track of all projects, Track over and under billings, general follow ups, Payment Certificates preparation, invoice and proforma invoice preparations, POS, etc… · Assist the Business Development Manager in preparing business plans for expansion to new countries. Financial Management: · Cost Control: o Lead the implementation of cost control processes. o Analyze monthly cost report, with the assistance of procurement officer, then compare to monthly budget to see if anything is out of the ordinary. o Assist Financial Manager in cost control per project, preparing the Static Budget Analysis and the Flexible Budget Analysis reports. o Provide timely, accurate month-end variance reports to key stakeholders every month. o Assistant he Financial Manager in developing Job Cost report template and monitoring it. o Monitor the day-to-day financial operations within the company, such as payroll, invoicing, and other transactions. o Oversee financial department employees, including financial assistants and accountants. o Liaise with auditors to ensure appropriate monitoring of company finances is maintained. o Track the company's financial status and performance to identify areas for potential improvement. o Seek out methods for minimizing financial risk to the company o Provide insightful information and expectations to senior executives to aid in long-term and short-term decision making. o Review financial data and prepare activity reports and financial forecasts. o Present financial reports to the management. o Analyze costs, pricing, variable contributions, sales results and the company’s actual performance compared to the business plans. o Develop trends and projections for the firm’s finances. o Conduct reviews and evaluations for cost-reduction opportunities. o Manage the preparation of the company’s budget. o Establish and maintain financial policies and procedures for the company. o Understand and adhere to local financial regulations and legislation. · Cash Flow Management: o Petty Cash and Receipt Reconciliation o Assist the Financial Manager with the Project /Company cash flow forecast, in order to determine if the organization will have enough cash, need a loan, or have more cash. o Monitor and control the flow of cash coming into and going out of the organization, presenting weekly reports to finance manager, helping ensure the company’s business and investment needs are met. o Act as lead advisor in the continuous cycle forecasting process, taking decisions regarding customer and supplier payments, and act to quantify risks and opportunities. o Present and manage the risks and opportunities specific to the business unit. Proactively make recommendations to mitigate risk and realize opportunities. o Assist the Financial Manager regarding the dashboards, baseline analyses, and presentations related to financial management. o Leads the budget process and the implementation of improvements to the working capital forecasting process. Create new dashboards and develop KPIs for capital allocation requests. o Contribute to the decision-making process, identify emerging trends and activities, recommend appropriate alternatives or options, perform general and personalized analyzes, develop value-added KPIs, and make sound strategic decisions in a timely manner. o Lead the cash flow success plan by maintaining an appropriate level of communication with subject matter experts across all areas of the organization. o Research investment options when needed and perform capital budgeting analyses. o Safeguard, verify, and control all cash assets. o Establish and maintain banking relationships if needed. o Establish and maintain cash movement policies, procedures, and controls. o Produce monthly company reports, reports on working capital dashboards, treasury reports (cash balances, cash projections, credit reviews, etc.) Qualifications · Bachelor’s degree in Finance. · Fluency in English is imperative. · Knowledge of the construction industry. Since 1948, Parissis has evolved from a Lebanese ship repair workshop to a reputed leader in modern engineering and steel construction, working on high profile regional projects. Company Description Aldibel L.L.C is dedicated to , ensuring top-notch services and products that cater to the unique needs of our clientele. Job Description We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Pharmacy Operation Manager to join our team in Beirut, Lebanon. The ideal candidate will be responsible for overseeing and optimizing the daily operations of our pharmacy, ensuring exceptional patient care, regulatory compliance, and operational efficiency. Manage and supervise pharmacy staff, including pharmacists, technicians, and support personnel Develop and implement strategies to improve pharmacy workflow, productivity, and customer service Oversee inventory management, including ordering, stock control, and minimizing waste Ensure compliance with all relevant pharmaceutical regulations and standards in Lebanon Analyze financial performance and prepare budgets for the pharmacy department Collaborate with healthcare professionals and other departments to enhance patient care Implement and maintain quality assurance programs to ensure safe and effective medication dispensing Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to drive continuous improvement Handle customer inquiries and resolve complex issues professionally and efficiently Develop and maintain relationships with key stakeholders, including suppliers and healthcare providers Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Pharmacy or related field (required); Master's degree in Business Administration or Healthcare Management (preferred) Licensed pharmacist in Lebanon (required) Minimum 5 years of experience in pharmacy operations management Proven track record of implementing process improvements and optimizing pharmacy workflows Proficiency in pharmacy management software and inventory management systems Strong financial analysis and budgeting skills In-depth knowledge of pharmaceutical regulations and standards in Lebanon Excellent leadership and team management abilities Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills Demonstrated problem-solving and decision-making capabilities Ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment Fluency in Arabic and English; knowledge of French is a plus Additional Information Only Egyptian need Aldibel L.L.C is dedicated to , ensuring top-notch services and products that cater to the unique needs of our clientele. Job Description Role Overview We are seeking a talented Business Development & Marketing Specialist to join our team. In this dual-focused role, you will be responsible for growing the agency's business through proactive marketing initiatives while also responding to RFPs and developing compelling proposals. The ideal candidate will be a strategic thinker with exceptional communication skills who can effectively position our agency's capabilities to potential clients and maintain our strong brand presence. Key Responsibilities Agency Brand Management and Uplift Maintain and evolve the agency's brand identity, ensuring consistency across all touchpoints Develop and implement strategic marketing plans to enhance agency positioning Monitor industry trends and competitor activities to identify opportunities for brand differentiation Content Creation and Distribution Create compelling articles, case studies, and thought leadership pieces that showcase agency expertise Develop content calendars and distribution strategies across multiple platforms Collaborate with internal subject matter experts to produce valuable industry insights Events Management Plan and execute agency participation in industry events, conferences, and networking opportunities Organize and manage internal events, workshops, and client appreciation functions Measure and report on event ROI and lead generation performance Internal Communications Develop and manage internal communication strategies to keep team members informed and engaged Create regular updates on agency achievements, upcoming opportunities, and strategic initiatives Support leadership in communicating vision, values, and organizational changes Talent Communications and Programs Marketing Work with HR to promote employment brand and recruitment initiatives Create marketing materials for professional development programs Highlight employee success stories and agency culture through various channels Proposal Development and RFP Responses Lead the development of compelling proposal documents and pitch decks Coordinate inputs from various departments to respond to RFPs effectively Customize presentation materials to address specific client needs and requirements Develop a systematic approach to managing the RFP response process Newsletter and Email Marketing Design and implement engaging email marketing campaigns targeting prospects and clients Produce regular agency newsletters highlighting services, case studies, and thought leadership Analyze email performance metrics and optimize campaigns accordingly SEO Presence Develop and execute SEO strategies to improve agency visibility in search results Conduct keyword research relevant to agency services and target audiences Collaborate with website team to implement SEO best practices Monitor and report on website analytics and search performance Community Management Manage agency presence across social media platforms and WhatsApp groups Develop engaging social content that reflects agency culture and expertise Monitor and respond to online engagement, fostering meaningful conversations Build and nurture relationships with industry influencers and partners Qualifications Qualifications Required Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or related field 3-5 years of experience in marketing, business development, or agency environment Exceptional written and verbal communication skills Experience with proposal development and RFP responses Proficiency with social media platforms and content management systems Strong project management abilities and attention to detail Preferred Experience marketing professional services or working within an agency setting Knowledge of SEO principles and digital marketing best practices Familiarity with email marketing platforms and analytics tools Portfolio demonstrating successful marketing campaigns or content creation Experience with graphic design and presentation software Personal Attributes Self-motivated with ability to work independently and as part of a team Creative problem-solver with strategic thinking capabilities Excellent time management skills and ability to handle multiple priorities Relationship-builder who can connect with diverse stakeholders Passion for marketing and staying current with industry trends We are Ethos, the fastest growing digital communication group in MENA. Company Description CityStar Lebanon Job Description We are currently looking for a highly organized, detail-oriented, and proactive Executive Secretary to support our executive team for our office premises in Roumieh. This role is vital in ensuring the smooth and professional operation of our leadership office and requires a candidate who thrives in a fast-paced environment. Key Responsibilities: Manage and maintain executive calendars, appointments, and meeting logistics Draft, format, and translate official correspondence and documents in both Arabic and English, organize executive meetings, prepare agendas, take accurate minutes, Requirements: 3 - 4 years of proven experience in a similar administrative or executive support role Fluency in Arabic and English and teamwork. You should have a solid background in administrative support, with a focus on outstanding Microsoft Office skills and exceptional attention to detail, particularly in document formatting, follow-up, and scheduling. You should have a solid background in administrative support, with a focus on outstanding Microsoft Office skills and exceptional attention to detail, particularly in document formatting, follow-up, and scheduling. Company Description Nulabe is a UAE based environmental advisory firm, focused on delivering sustainable, impactful, and regionally relevant solutions to clients across the MENA and GCC regions. We work with clients in both the public and private sectors to address challenges in waste management, decarbonization, sustainability, and circularity, spanning the full spectrum of environmental and sustainability needs. Our team combines deep industry experience with a systems-thinking mindset, offering advisory services that are rooted in regional realities and designed for lasting impact. Job Description We are currently looking for a technically grounded and highly organized professional to join our team in Beirut. This role is central to our consultancy operations and offers a unique opportunity to support the delivery of high-impact environmental projects while working closely with clients and subject-matter experts. The role blends project coordination, client communication, and technical oversight. It involves guiding the work of external consultants, conducting contextual research to support project scopes, and reviewing deliverables to ensure they meet expectations and align with the client’s needs. In parallel, the successful candidate will contribute to business development efforts and strategic outreach, helping us expand our advisory work across the region. Scope of Work 1. Project Management & Technical Oversight Coordinate internal and external resources to ensure timely and accurate delivery of consultancy outputs. Review expert deliverables to ensure alignment with the scope of work and client expectations. Conduct background research to understand the technical and regulatory context of new projects. Translate complex requirements into clear briefs for technical contributors. 2. Client Relationship Management Serve as the main point of contact for assigned client accounts. Proactively manage communications, follow-ups, and progress updates. Help shape scopes of work and ensure client satisfaction throughout the delivery lifecycle. Identify and flag new areas where we can provide added value to clients. 3. Business Development & Proposal Coordination Monitor tendering platforms and evaluate new opportunities. Coordinate and contribute to the preparation of proposals and technical submissions. Track pipeline status, deadlines, and proposal outcomes. 4. Cross-functional Collaboration Facilitate seamless coordination between clients, internal stakeholders, and expert consultants. Ensure meeting agendas, minutes, and deliverable trackers are maintained and updated. Support ongoing learning and process improvements within the project delivery team. Qualifications Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Environmental Science, Environmental Engineering, Architecture , or a closely related field. 5+ years of experience in environmental consulting, project coordination, or technical service delivery. Strong research and analytical skills with the ability to quickly understand technical frameworks and sector-specific contexts. Experience in waste management , circular economy initiatives, OR construction design verification is highly desirable. Prior consultancy experience is a strong asset. Bonus: Familiarity with LEED, SITES , or other sustainability certification systems. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Strong project management discipline, including meeting facilitation and documentation. Company Description Toters is an on-demand e-commerce and delivery platform that operates a service that enables customers to get anything in their city at the highest level of convenience. At Toters, technology is at the heart of everything we do. We have product teams that are working hard every day to create products that make our customers' lives easier. Our engineers are also continuously creating solutions to make our processes more efficient, all in an effort to get to our customers fast and at the best cost. If you are interested in working in a high-growth startup environment, and look to be part of a team that will potentially change the way customers shop in the Middle East, apply now. Job Description We are looking for a highly talented Senior Android Engineer to join our Mobile Engineering team. If you are looking for a place where you can gain hands-on experience and create a direct impact, then this may be the place for you! The ideal candidate will have a track record as a significant individual contributor as well as a strong team player. In this role, you will: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate requirements into well-designed features for our mobile app. Design, develop, and test new Android features, prioritizing a smooth user experience. Create reusable, scalable code for app stability and future enhancements. Optimize performance to ensure quick and responsive user interactions. Implement robust security measures for data protection and compliance. Conduct rigorous testing to maintain high application quality. Integrate mobile apps with backend APIs in coordination with backend engineers. Stay updated on mobile development trends for innovative contributions. Participate in code reviews to uphold quality and standards. Support cross-functional troubleshooting and feature delivery. Qualifications Key Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field. Minimum of 5 years of professional experience in Android application development. Proficiency in Kotlin and Java. Experience in Jetpack compose and other Jetpack libraries. Strong knowledge of Dependency Injection (DI) frameworks. Proven track record of independently designing and developing well-architected Android applications, following established design patterns. In-depth understanding of the entire mobile development life cycle, including familiarity with mobile industry trends, architectures, and emerging technologies. Expertise in interactive application development on the Android platform, with a strong grasp of memory management, file I/O, network programming, concurrency, multithreading, and a successful track record of publishing apps on the Google Play Store. Proficiency in using version control systems, particularly Git. Strong collaborative skills, both as an independent contributor and as part of a team. Exceptional problem-solving and analytical thinking abilities. Experience with app analytics and crash reporting tools like Firebase Analytics or Crashlytics. Experience with reactive programming (RxJava, RxKotlin, Flows, etc.), providing a significant advantage. Outstanding written and verbal communication skills. Nice to Have: Knowledge of Huawei Store and SDKs Experience in handling third-party hardware such as scanners and printers. Experience with gradle scripts Knowledge of unit testing and experience with test-driven development. Additional Information All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines. Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Leadhesive to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Leadhesive Job Description We are seeking a goal-oriented and professional Appointment Setter to join our team. The ideal candidate for this position will possess excellent communication and organizational skills, along with a basic understanding of our product or service, to effectively facilitate initial contact with potential clients and coordinate schedules for our sales representatives. Job Purpose The primary purpose of the Appointment Setter is to generate and qualify leads, as well as to arrange meetings between potential clients and our sales representatives. This involves establishing and maintaining positive relationships with clients, effectively managing schedules and follow-ups, and utilizing product knowledge to communicate value to prospects. Job Duties and Responsibilities Lead generation for potential clients. Scheduling meetings between clients and sales representatives. Using strong communication skills to engage and win over prospects. Handling objections effectively and maintaining a positive rapport with clients. Managing schedules and follow-ups diligently. Qualifications Required Qualifications Experience in Lead Generation and Meeting Scheduling. Strong Communication Skills. Proven ability in Objection Handling and Rapport Building. Excellent Organizational Skills and Follow-Up Management. Basic Product Knowledge. Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Leadhesive to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Company Description A Multinational insurance company for over 150 years, has been helping individuals, families, and businesses around the world create a more confident future by providing financial protection and peace of mind through a wide range of insurance products and services. Job Description Key Responsibilities: Client Acquisition and Relationship Management: Proactively identify and develop new business opportunities through networking, referrals, lead generation activities, and community engagement. Establish, build, and maintain strong, lasting relationships with potential and existing clients, fostering trust and loyalty. Conduct thorough needs assessments to understand clients' financial situations, goals, and existing insurance coverage. Provide exceptional customer service and support, addressing inquiries, concerns, and assisting with policy renewals and claims. Consultative Sales and Solution Delivery: Educate clients on diverse portfolio of insurance products, including life, health, accident, & group benefits. Customize insurance programs and present tailored solutions that align with individual or business client needs and financial objectives. Clearly explain policy features, benefits, terms, and conditions to ensure client understanding and confidence. Prepare and present compelling insurance proposals. Sales Performance and Compliance: Achieve and exceed assigned sales targets and contribute to the overall team success. Maintain accurate records of client interactions, sales activities, and policy information using CRM systems. Stay updated on industry trends, market changes, competitive products, and evolving product offerings. Ensure strict compliance with all industry regulations, company policies, and ethical standards in all sales activities. Professional Development: Actively participate in training and development programs to enhance product knowledge, sales skills, and industry expertise. Collaborate with colleagues and cross-functional teams to ensure seamless service delivery. Essential Business Experience and Technical Skills: Required: Minimum of two years of experience sales or a similar client-facing sales role with a proven track record of success. Strong desire to work independently and with a "hunter" mentality for new business development. Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and influence. Highly motivated, results-driven, and goal-oriented. Proficiency in basic computer skills (Microsoft Office Suite - Word, Excel, Outlook). Ability to learn and effectively use CRM systems for client management and sales tracking. Twenty- Five and above. Lebanese Baccalaureate. Car is a must Preferred: Bachelor’s degree in business, Finance, Marketing, or a related field Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to assess client risks and tailor solutions. Adaptability and resilience in a dynamic sales environment. What do we offer: Progressive income potential with competitive commission structures and bonus opportunities. Comprehensive benefits package, including medical insurance and pension plan. Opportunities for career growth and advancement within a global organization. Work-life balance with a supportive environment. Access to extensive training and development programs. Recognition and awards at various international forums for top performers (e.g., MDRT qualification). A purpose-driven culture dedicated to helping customers achieve a confident future. Qualifications - Car is a must. - Above 25 years old. _ holding minimum a bachelor degree. Company Description German Pub Resto Job Description We are seeking a talented and visionary Chef de Cuisine to lead our culinary team in Dbayeh, Lebanon. As the Chef de Cuisine, you will be responsible for overseeing all aspects of our kitchen operations, creating innovative menus, and maintaining the highest standards of food quality and presentation. Develop and implement new menu concepts, ensuring a balance between creativity and profitability Lead and mentor a team of kitchen staff, fostering a positive and collaborative work environment Manage food costs, inventory, and kitchen budget to maximize efficiency and profitability Ensure compliance with all health, safety, and sanitation regulations Collaborate with the management team to enhance overall guest experience and restaurant performance Stay current with culinary trends and incorporate them into menu offerings Maintain relationships with local suppliers and source high-quality ingredients Participate in food tastings, special events, and culinary demonstrations as needed Continuously improve kitchen processes and procedures to enhance productivity and quality Qualifications Minimum 5-7 years of experience in high-end restaurants or hotels, with a proven track record of leading kitchen teams Advanced knowledge of culinary techniques, menu planning, and food cost management Excellent leadership and team management skills Proficiency in kitchen equipment operation and maintenance Up-to-date knowledge of food safety regulations and certifications Exceptional time management and organizational skills Creativity and innovation in menu development and food presentation Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment Flexibility to work evenings, weekends, and holidays as required German Pub Resto Job Description We are seeking a talented and visionary Chef de Cuisine to lead our culinary team in Dbayeh, Lebanon. Company Description Welcome to Health Care Pharmacy LLC, your trusted healthcare partner. Established in 2022 by Dolphin Group W.L.L, our pharmacy is a rapidly growing beacon of wellness located in the heart of Al Khor, Qatar. We are dedicated to enhancing and sustaining patient health in our community, and our growing reputation stands as a testament to our unwavering commitment to this mission. Our commitment extends beyond providing high-quality medical supplies and medicines; we aim to foster an environment that encourages health awareness, supports patient well-being, and cultivates lasting relationships with our customers. Our strong foundation, combined with our team’s dedication, comprehensive product portfolio, and our strategic business objectives, propels our journey towards becoming a leading player in the national healthcare industry. Job Description We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Medical Sales Promoter to join our team in Beirut, Lebanon. In this role, you will be responsible for promoting and selling our range of medical products to healthcare professionals, clinics, and hospitals across the region. The ideal candidate will have a passion for the healthcare industry and a proven track record of achieving sales targets. Develop and maintain strong relationships with existing clients while actively pursuing new business opportunities in the Lebanese medical market Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to showcase the benefits of our medical products to healthcare professionals Achieve and exceed sales targets by implementing effective sales strategies Provide expert advice on product features, benefits, and usage to customers Stay up-to-date with industry trends, competitor activities, and market dynamics in the Lebanese healthcare sector Collaborate with the marketing team to develop promotional materials and campaigns tailored to the local market Attend medical conferences, trade shows, and industry events to promote our products Maintain accurate records of sales activities, customer interactions, and product inventory using CRM software Ensure compliance with all relevant regulatory requirements for medical products in Lebanon Provide regular reports on sales performance, market trends, and customer feedback Travel within the assigned territory to meet with clients and prospects Qualifications Proven experience in medical product sales, with a track record of meeting or exceeding targets Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport with healthcare professionals and decision-makers In-depth knowledge of medical products, including their features, benefits, and applications Excellent presentation and negotiation skills Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, Life Sciences, or a related field preferred Sales certifications are a plus Thorough understanding of the medical products industry, including current trends and regulatory requirements Knowledge of the Lebanese healthcare system and market Familiarity with local medical regulations and compliance standards Ability to travel within the assigned territory as required Fluency in Arabic and English; French language skills are a plus Strong time management and organizational skills Self-motivated with a results-oriented approach to sales Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret market data and sales trends Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy in reporting and record-keeping Customer-focused attitude with a commitment to providing exceptional service Additional Information All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines. Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Intex for construction to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Intex for construction Job Description We are seeking a Project Architect to join our team. The ideal candidate will be an experienced professional with a strong background in overseeing architectural projects from concept to completion, demonstrating proficiency in architectural design, project management, and technical drawing. Job Purpose The primary purpose of the Project Architect role is to oversee the design and execution of architectural projects, ensuring they align with client specifications, meet regulatory standards, and are within budget constraints. This role also requires proficiency in software tools like AutoCAD and Revit, and the ability to effectively communicate and collaborate with various stakeholders such as clients, engineers, and construction teams. Job Duties and Responsibilities Oversee the design and execution of architectural projects Ensure projects meet client specifications, regulatory standards, and budget constraints Demonstrate strong skills in architectural design, project management, and technical drawing Utilize software tools like AutoCAD and Revit for project execution Facilitate effective communication and collaboration with clients, engineers, and construction teams Qualifications Required Qualifications Proven experience in architectural design Strong project management skills Proficiency in technical drawing Extensive experience with AutoCAD and Revit Excellent communication skills Ability to collaborate effectively with various stakeholders Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Intex for construction to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Company Description Toters is an on-demand e-commerce and delivery platform that operates a service that enables customers to get anything in their city at the highest level of convenience. At Toters, technology is at the heart of everything we do. We have product teams working hard every day to create products that make our customers' lives easier. Our engineers are also continuously creating solutions to make our processes more efficient, all in an effort to get to our customers fast and at the best cost. If you are interested in working in a high-growth startup environment and looking to be part of a team that will potentially change the way customers shop in the Middle East, apply now. Job Description Description: We are looking for a highly skilled iOS Engineer to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing, testing, and maintaining iOS applications. The iOS Engineer will work closely with our product team to design and implement new features and enhancements and ensure that our applications are highly functional, stable, and performant. In this role, you will: Design and build advanced, scalable applications in Swift. Write high-quality, performant, and reliable code while working on defined tasks/bugs independently. Work with the product and design teams to understand end-user requirements and use cases, and translate them into pragmatic and effective technical solutions. Unit-test code for robustness including edge cases, usability, and general reliability. Participate in the on-call rotation and be willing to jump in and help resolve any incidents within the defined SLA. Participate in the team’s agile and engineering practices and contribute to their continuous evolution. Provide mentorship and guidance to junior engineers. Contribute to multiplatform libraries using Swift. Qualifications Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or a related technical field. 5+ years of experience in iOS application development, with a strong proficiency in Swift, standard libraries, and iOS frameworks. Comprehensive understanding of the mobile development life cycle, including knowledge of industry trends, architectures, and emerging technologies. Proficiency in interactive application development paradigm, memory management, file I/O, network programming, concurrency, multithreading, and the process of publishing iOS apps on the App Store. Strong expertise in design patterns relevant to iOS development. Exceptional debugging skills, with the ability to diagnose and resolve complex issues efficiently. Experience collaborating with remote teams in an Agile/Scrum environment to deliver high-quality software products. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, suitable for formal and informal communication channels. Experience with Combine, Apple's reactive programming framework for Swift. Nice to have: Familiarity with continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) tools such as CircleCI, Fastlane, or Bitrise. Understanding of advanced iOS app performance optimization techniques, including memory management, caching, and threading. Experience with SwiftUI, Apple's declarative UI framework for building iOS apps. Proficiency in unit testing and test-driven development (TDD) to ensure code quality and reliability. Additional Information All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines. Company Description Smartsource Consulting SAL Job Description Join the Team! 🚀 We are hiring Sales Superstars to join a top-tier Digital Marketing Agency in Canada! About Us Anghami is the leading multi-media technology streaming platform in the Middle East and North Africa ('MENA') region, offering a comprehensive ecosystem of exclusive premium video, music, podcasts, live entertainment, audio services and more. Since its launch in 2012, Anghami has led the way as the first music streaming platform to digitize MENA’s music catalog, reshaping the region's entertainment landscape. In a strategic move in April 2024, Anghami joined forces with OSN+, a leading video streaming platform, forming a digital entertainment powerhouse. This pivotal transaction strengthened Anghami's position as a go-to destination, boasting an extensive library of over 18,000 hours of premium video, including exclusive HBO content, alongside 100+ million Arabic and International songs and podcasts. With a user base exceeding 120 million registered users and 2.5 million paid subscribers, Anghami has partnered with 47 telcos across MENA, facilitating customer acquisition and subscription payment, in addition to establishing relationships with major film studios, entertainment giants, and music labels, both regional and international. Headquartered in Abu Dhabi, UAE, Anghami operates in 16 countries across MENA, with offices in Beirut, Dubai, Cairo, and Riyadh. We believe in data-driven innovation, cross-functional collaboration, and a culture of continuous learning. Job Summary We are seeking a detail-oriented and results-driven Data Analyst with 3–5 years of professional experience. In this role, you’ll be responsible for transforming complex data into actionable insights that support strategic decision-making across the organization. Key Responsibilities Analyze large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and actionable insights that drive business performance - with a primary focus on subscription-related metrics (e.g., acquisitions, resurrections, churn, revenues, MRR, ARPU, LTV) and user engagement (e.g., content streaming behavior, session frequency, retention). Perform cross-analysis, user segmentation, and classification to identify behavioral patterns, target cohorts, and optimize user lifecycle strategies (e.g., acquisition channels, churn risk, high-LTV segments) ; Leverage segmentation and classification techniques to group users by behavior, value, and lifecycle stage, enabling more targeted marketing, retention, and content strategies. Build dashboards, reports, and visualizations (such as Tableau, Power BI, or Looker). Work closely with cross-functional teams (Product, Marketing, Finance, etc.) to define data needs and deliver analytical solutions. Translate business questions into analytical problems and provide recommendations based on data. Perform data validation, cleaning, and transformation (ETL/ELT flows) to ensure data accuracy and integrity. Assist in designing and implementing data collection processes and best practices. Communicate findings clearly and concisely to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, or a related field. 3–5 years of experience in a data analyst or business intelligence role. Highly proficient in SQL and working with relational databases (AWS Redshift, MySQL). Proficiency in scripting language, mainly Python and PySpark. Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, and ideally Looker). Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skills. Solid understanding of statistical methods and data modeling techniques, including dimensional modeling (e.g., star and snowflake schemas) and third normal form (3NF) entity-relationship (ER) modeling. Proficiency in Excel. Excellent communication and presentation skills. Experience working with cloud-based data platforms (AWS : S3, Redshift). Exposure to tools like Airflow, or other data engineering workflows. Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Leadhesive Inc. to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Leadhesive Inc. Job Description We are seeking an Experienced Caller / Appointment Setter to join our sales team. This is a key role within our organization, where the right candidate will be tasked with contacting potential clients, building rapport, and scheduling appointments for our sales representatives. Job Purpose The main goal of this position is to effectively engage with potential clients over the phone, manage call lists, and set up appointments for our sales team. Success in this role is demonstrated by maintaining accurate records, following up on leads, and ultimately, contributing to our overall sales process by setting up quality appointments. Job Duties and Responsibilities Engage potential clients effectively through phone calls Schedule appointments for sales representatives Demonstrate strong communication skills and active listening Quickly build rapport with potential clients Manage call lists and maintain accurate records Qualifications Required Qualifications Experience in effective communication Proficiency in active listening Strong skills in rapport building Experience in appointment scheduling Proficiency in call list management Experience in record keeping Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Leadhesive Inc. to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Job Title: Outdoor Field Market Researcher & Analyst - Beauty Sector
Description: Company Description We are a Lebanese company in the consumer health and wellness sector, preparing to exclusively launch a global beauty and skincare brand in Lebanon. Our mission is to introduce high-quality, science-backed products tailored to modern consumer needs. We are building a local team in research, marketing, regulatory, and sales. Job Description You will conduct market visits, collect field data, and deliver insights to support brand strategy. Ideal for someone passionate about beauty, data-driven, and confident in the field. Qualifications Bachelor’s in Marketing, Market Research, or related field 2+ years in beauty/skincare industry Strong analysis and reporting skills Fluent in English (spoken and written) Organized, detail-oriented, self-driven Based in Lebanon, ready for in-person visits Knowledge of the Lebanese beauty market is a plus Additional Information Part-time field role with potential for long-term work Requirement: Personal car is mandatory Immediate start required Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted To apply: Send your CV and brief cover letter to [email protected] We are a Lebanese company in the consumer health and wellness sector, preparing to exclusively launch a global beauty and skincare brand in Lebanon. Join the Team at Anghami Inc.! Anghami Inc. is home to two of the region’s most dynamic digital entertainment platforms—Anghami and OSN+. Together, they’ve created a powerhouse reshaping how the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region experiences music, premium video, podcasts, and live entertainment. Founded in 2012, Anghami is the MENA region’s leading multimedia streaming platform, connecting a community of over 120 million users, including 2.5 million paid subscribers. With headquarters in Abu Dhabi and offices across Dubai, Beirut, Cairo, and Riyadh, Anghami proudly became the first Arab tech company listed on NASDAQ (ANGH), making it more than a platform—it’s a hub for innovation, offering diverse entertainment experiences. In 2024, Anghami joined forces with OSN+, the region's go-to platform for premium video streaming. OSN+ is known for its exclusive HBO series, Max Originals, and a great mix of local and international content. With top partnerships with studios like Warner Bros. and NBC Universal, OSN+ brings even more exciting entertainment to the Anghami ecosystem, offering a complete experience for millions of users. At Anghami Inc., we’re passionate about building experiences that empower users to explore, connect, and share through entertainment. The team constantly pushes boundaries, crafting tools and features that allow people to express themselves and tell their unique stories. Be part of a team that's shaping the future of entertainment in the MENA region and beyond. About the Role: As a Social Media Executive, you’ll play an integral role in supporting and shaping the social media presence of OSN+ and Anghami across key platforms. You will share ideas, identify opportunities, and help adapt the overarching strategy to fit platform trends and audience behaviors. Working closely with the Social Media Manager, you’ll help bring content calendars to life, monitor and interpret performance, and ensure that every piece of content and interaction aligns with brand objectives. This is a great opportunity for someone who is not only creative and detail-oriented, but also curious about the why behind social media strategy. You’ll collaborate with brand, creative, and content teams to ensure our voice, visuals, and engagement are cohesive and impactful across all social platforms. Key Responsibilities: Strategic Support & Planning Support in planning and refining social strategies that align with platform trends and business goals. Participate in weekly content and campaign planning meetings, offering ideas based on platform insights, trends, and audience behavior. Contribute to the development of platform-specific approaches, ensuring concepts and content formats are optimized for each platform. Content Development and Execution Collaborate with in-house creative teams and agencies to help develop high-impact, locally relevant social content. Assist with planning, publishing and scheduling daily content across platforms, ensuring timely delivery. Design and create basic social media posts (static, carousel, stories, and short-form video) using tools like Canva, Figma, or Adobe Creative Suite. Spot real-time trends and recommend reactive content ideas that fit the brand’s tone and priorities. Manage comment replies and interactions to foster a positive community environment. Performance & Monitoring Track content performance, audience engagement, and social trends. Help compile regular reports highlighting successes, learnings, and opportunities. Monitor competitor activity and industry benchmarks to identify opportunities for improvement. Support with community listening, identifying patterns in sentiment, feedback, and opportunities to spark conversation. Stay on top of platform trends, algorithm updates, and best practices. Cross-Functional Collaboration Work closely with brand, content, CRM, and product teams to ensure social media reflects broader business and user engagement goals. · Assist with influencer content coordination where needed. Qualifications and Experience Educations: Bachelor’s degree in marketing, Communications, Media or a related field Experience: 2-3 years of experience in a social media, digital marketing, preferably in entertainment, media, or digital platforms. Familiarity with publishing and analytics tools (e.g., Sprout Social, Meta Business Manager, TikTok Analytics). Experience working with influencers and social media creators. Knowledge of design and creative tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, or similar is a strong plus. Fluency in English and Arabic is required Passionate about social media, pop culture, and digital storytelling. Strong organizational skills with a keen eye for detail. Confident communicator with excellent writing skills Proactive, collaborative, and flexible in a fast-paced, evolving environment. Skills & Competencies: Passionate about social media, pop culture, and digital storytelling. Strong Organizational skills with a keen eye for detail. Company Description Dolphin Group, established in 1992, stands as a testament to the power of vision, collaboration, and unwavering commitment. Over the years, we have transformed from a budding enterprise to a leading conglomerate in [Qatar], with a diversified portfolio that spans across multiple sectors. Our growth narrative is not just about numbers but about the relationships we’ve nurtured, the partnerships we’ve forged, and the milestones we’ve achieved. Job Description Promote and sell medical cosmetic products to clients, dermatologists, pharmacists, clinics, and cosmetic stores. Deliver product knowledge and demonstrations to potential customers and healthcare professionals. Attend promotional events, exhibitions, and product launches to generate interest and leads. Monitor inventory levels at assigned outlets and ensure proper product placement. Provide feedback from the market to the sales and marketing team. Achieve monthly and quarterly sales targets. Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and new customers. Educate clients on proper product usage and benefits. Maintain a professional image and high level of product knowledge. Qualifications High school diploma or higher; degree in Marketing, Pharmacy, Nursing, or related field is a plus. Proven sales experience, preferably in cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, or healthcare. Knowledge of skin care, beauty, and cosmetic science is highly preferred. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently and meet sales targets. Presentable and confident in interacting with diverse clients. Willingness to travel locally for client visits and events. Additional Information Preferably Female Must have experienced 3-5 years Dolphin Group, established in 1992, stands as a testament to the power of vision, collaboration, and unwavering commitment. Over the years, we have transformed from a budding enterprise to a leading conglomerate in [Qatar], with a diversified portfolio that spans across multiple sectors. Our growth narrative is not just about numbers but about the relationships we’ve nurtured, the partnerships we’ve forged, and the milestones we’ve achieved. Company Description Modeex is a leader company in the German spirits industry Job Description We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Sales Professional to join our team in Zalqa, Lebanon. As a key member of our sales force, you will be responsible for driving revenue growth, building strong client relationships, and representing our company's products and services in the local market. Develop and implement effective sales strategies to meet and exceed targets Identify and pursue new business opportunities through prospecting and lead generation Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to potential clients Negotiate contracts and close deals with customers Maintain and expand relationships with existing clients Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure customer satisfaction Stay updated on industry trends, competitor activities, and market conditions Accurately forecast sales pipeline and report on sales activities Attend industry events and networking functions to promote the company's offerings Utilize CRM software to manage customer interactions and sales processes Qualifications Proven track record of success in sales, preferably in B2B or B2C environments Excellent communication, interpersonal, and negotiation skills Strong ability to build and maintain client relationships Proficiency in CRM software and sales tools Exceptional time management and organizational skills Persuasive presentation and public speaking abilities Self-motivated with a results-oriented mindset Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or related field preferred Sales certifications are a plus Fluency in English and Arabic; knowledge of French is an advantage Familiarity with local market trends and business practices in Lebanon Valid driver's license and willingness to travel within the region Modeex is a leader company in the German spirits industry Job Description We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Sales Professional to join our team in Zalqa, Lebanon. Company Description Nulabe is a UAE based environmental advisory firm, focused on delivering sustainable, impactful, and regionally relevant solutions to clients across the MENA and GCC regions. We work with clients in both the public and private sectors to address challenges in waste management, decarbonization, sustainability, and circularity, spanning the full spectrum of environmental and sustainability needs. Our team combines deep industry experience with a systems-thinking mindset, offering advisory services that are rooted in regional realities and designed for lasting impact. Job Description Client Engagement & Opportunity Development Identify and research potential clients and project opportunities across key sectors (public and private) in the MENA and GCC regions. Develop tailored client presentations, pitch decks, and capability statements based on Nulabe’s service offerings. Support the preparation and submission of proposals in response to RFPs, tenders, or direct opportunities. Coordinate with technical leads to ensure proposal content is accurate, competitive, and aligned with client expectations. Assist in crafting messaging and narratives that communicate Nulabe’s value proposition clearly and persuasively. Maintain an updated tracker of outreach efforts, proposal submissions, and win/loss insights. Prospecting & Relationship Building Proactively identify and approach potential clients and strategic partners via platforms such as LinkedIn, tender portals, and industry events. Conduct initial outreach, follow-ups, and scheduling of introductory meetings. Represent Nulabe in client interactions, with the ability to speak confidently about the firm’s services and past work. Nurture and manage relationships with leads throughout the pre-engagement process, from cold contact to signed proposal. Expert & Resource Alignment (Secondary Focus) Identify and engage relevant experts based on client requirements and project scopes. Maintain an up-to-date expert roster, including qualifications, sector experience, and availability. Support coordination between experts and internal teams during proposal development. Reporting & Knowledge Management Prepare regular reports summarizing BD activity, outreach metrics, and opportunity pipelines. Maintain organized records of client and partner interactions, proposal versions, and submission timelines. Contribute to internal knowledge management by documenting lessons learned from successful and unsuccessful bids. Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field. Proven experience in business development, client relations, or a similar role. Proficiency in using LinkedIn for professional networking and client outreach. Excellent organizational, communication, and interpersonal skills. Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. Familiarity with database management and meeting coordination tools. Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Toters to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Toters Job Description We are seeking a skilled and experienced Senior Backend Developer to join our team. This individual will play a critical role in designing, developing, and maintaining our robust backend systems using PHP and the Laravel framework, with a focus on B2C applications within the fintech sector. Job Purpose The purpose of the Senior Backend Developer role is to ensure the smooth operation and continuous development of our backend systems, specifically for B2C applications in the fintech sector. The role will involve integrating various payment gateway systems to ensure seamless transaction processing, maintaining the security and integrity of our systems. Job Duties and Responsibilities Design, develop, and maintain robust backend systems using PHP and Laravel. Focus on developing and improving B2C applications within the fintech sector. Integrate various payment gateways to ensure seamless transaction processing. Maintain and enhance the security and integrity of our systems. Constantly seek to improve our systems and processes through innovative thinking and problem-solving. Qualifications Required Qualifications Advanced knowledge of PHP programming and Laravel framework is essential. Proven experience in developing B2C applications, preferably in the fintech sector. Expertise in integrating various payment gateways for seamless transaction processing. Experience in database management and a strong understanding of payment systems and security protocols. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, coupled with attention to detail. Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Toters to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Company Overview We are a fast-growing group of fintech, digital, and telemarketing companies, expanding rapidly across the GCC market. As part of our 2025 growth plan, we are hiring 30 to 50 Inside Sales Representatives to drive our telemarketing campaigns. Successful candidates will receive intensive training in marketing, telesales, and customer engagement , equipping you with the skills and confidence to succeed in your role and grow with our organization. Position Summary The Inside Sales Representative is responsible for engaging prospects and clients through telemarketing campaigns, building trust, qualifying leads, and driving conversions into our financial and digital services. This role blends telesales, customer support, and relationship management, making you a key player in expanding our presence and ensuring client satisfaction across the GCC. The Position will be located in Saidi City Key Responsibilities Telemarketing & Sales Conduct outbound calls to targeted prospects in the GCC region. Present and promote company services, platforms, and offers with professionalism. Qualify leads, understand customer needs, and book follow-up calls or demos. Support the sales pipeline by scheduling meetings for senior advisors and closing smaller deals directly. Maintain high activity levels while meeting or exceeding monthly targets. Customer Relationship & Support Act as the first point of contact via phone, chat, and email. Guide clients through onboarding, documentation, and account setup. Provide clear product and platform explanations to build confidence and trust. Handle objections, resolve complaints, and ensure customer satisfaction. Keep accurate records of all client communications in CRM systems. Client Engagement & Retention Conduct follow-up calls to maximize client engagement and encourage adoption. Support platform demos, walkthroughs, and training sessions. Proactively maintain relationships with existing clients to encourage retention. Collect client feedback to improve products, services, and sales scripts. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Finance, or related field (preferred). 2–5 years’ experience in telemarketing, telesales, or inside sales. Experience in fintech, payments, or blockchain is an advantage. Strong communication and persuasive skills in both English and Arabic ; French is a plus. Confident in handling client objections and closing conversations. Familiarity with CRM tools (HubSpot, Salesforce) and MS Office. Interest or knowledge in blockchain or financial markets is a strong plus. Core Skills & Competencies Sales Drive: Goal-oriented with a proven track record of meeting targets. Customer Focus: Ability to engage clients with empathy and professionalism. Persuasive Communication: Clear, confident, and impactful phone presence. Problem-Solving: Quickly overcomes objections and finds solutions. Detail-Oriented: Keeps accurate records and follows processes. Adaptability: Thrives in a fast-paced, evolving environment. Team Collaboration: Works seamlessly with sales, product, and operations teams. Company Name: Bikers Inc. s.a.r.l. Job Description We are hiring for the role of a Sales Executive to join our dynamic team. As a Sales Executive, you will play a key role in strengthening our organization's presence in the marketplace by driving revenue growth, identifying new business opportunities, and building rewarding client relationships. Job Purpose The purpose of the Sales Executive role is to grow our company's revenue by identifying and securing new business opportunities, maintaining strong relationships with our clients, presenting our products or services effectively, and using sales data to develop and execute effective strategies. The ideal candidate is someone who is results-oriented, excellent at problem-solving and is driven to exceed sales targets. Job Duties and Responsibilities Drive revenue growth by identifying and pursuing new business opportunities. Build and maintain effective relationships with clients. Effectively present our company's products or services to meet clients' needs. Analyze sales data and inform strategies. Achieve sales targets with a results-oriented mindset. Qualifications Required Qualifications Proven ability to drive revenue growth and identify new business opportunities. Successful track record in building and maintaining client relationships. Excellent in presenting products or services and meeting customers' needs. Strong analytical skills to interpret sales data and inform strategies. Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with KerningCode to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: KerningCode Job Description We are seeking an experienced and talented Odoo Developer and Functional Expert to join our team. This role is essential in facilitating our business needs by designing, customizing, and implementing Odoo ERP solutions. Job Purpose The key objective of this role is to utilize a deep understanding of Odoo's modules and functionalities in order to analyze our business processes and translate these needs into effective and efficient software solutions. Job Duties and Responsibilities Design, customize, and implement Odoo ERP solutions to align with specific business needs. Utilize a thorough understanding of Odoo's modules and functionalities to maximize efficiency. Analyze business processes and work with stakeholders to translate them into software solutions. Develop software solutions using Python and JavaScript. Communicate effectively with stakeholders to gather necessary requirements and provide system training. Qualifications Required Qualifications Prior experience in Odoo ERP solution design. Demonstrated ability in customizing and implementing Odoo. Strong understanding of Odoo modules. Proven experience in business process analysis. Excellent skills in translating business processes into software solutions. Proficiency in Python and JavaScript. Strong communication skills and experience working with stakeholders. Experience in gathering requirements and providing system training. Company Description Welcome to Health Care Pharmacy LLC, your trusted healthcare partner. Established in 2022 by Dolphin Group W.L.L, our pharmacy is a rapidly growing beacon of wellness located in the heart of Al Khor, Qatar. We are dedicated to enhancing and sustaining patient health in our community, and our growing reputation stands as a testament to our unwavering commitment to this mission. Our commitment extends beyond providing high-quality medical supplies and medicines; we aim to foster an environment that encourages health awareness, supports patient well-being, and cultivates lasting relationships with our customers. Our strong foundation, combined with our team’s dedication, comprehensive product portfolio, and our strategic business objectives, propels our journey towards becoming a leading player in the national healthcare industry. Join us as we continue to expand and provide excellent healthcare services to our growing community, turning first-time customers into loyal patrons. Our Vision: To rise as a leading pharmacy group at a national level, becoming the preferred agent for the finest international brands, ensuring unparalleled health solutions for the Qatari community. Our Mission: Promoting healthcare and improving the quality of life by delivering unmatched healthcare services, superior quality medical supplies, and expert advice with friendly service. Job Description Job Title: Pharmacist Job Summary: A pharmacist is responsible for dispensing prescribed medications to patients, providing advice on their proper use, and ensuring the safety and effectiveness of medications. They work closely with other healthcare professionals to optimize patient care and ensure safe medication practices. Pharmacists also provide valuable counsel on health and wellness, over-the-counter treatments, and lifestyle changes. Key Responsibilities: Medication Dispensation: Dispense prescription medications accurately and efficiently. Verify and review prescriptions for authenticity, legality, and appropriateness. Ensure proper labeling and packaging of medications. Patient Counseling: Educate patients on how to take prescribed medications, potential side effects, and interactions with other drugs. Advise patients on lifestyle changes and preventive health measures. Medication Therapy Management (MTM): Review patient medication regimens for safety, efficacy, and drug interactions. Work with healthcare providers to adjust medication therapies as needed. Clinical Support: Provide expert advice to physicians, nurses, and other healthcare providers regarding medication choices, dosing, and potential side effects. Participate in patient care teams to monitor treatment progress and provide input on care plans. Inventory and Drug Management: Maintain accurate inventory records for medications. Order, stock, and manage medications and supplies to ensure they are available for patient needs. Monitor medication expiration dates and ensure proper disposal of expired or unused drugs. Regulatory Compliance: Ensure compliance with legal, regulatory, and ethical standards. Keep up-to-date with the latest pharmaceutical laws, regulations, and safety guidelines. Health Screenings and Immunizations: Administer certain vaccines and perform health screenings (e.g., blood pressure, cholesterol levels). Provide guidance on the management of chronic conditions, such as diabetes. Customer Service: Assist customers in selecting over-the-counter medications. Provide prompt and courteous service to patients and healthcare providers. Record Keeping: Maintain accurate patient records in compliance with health privacy regulations. Document patient interactions and medication consultations. Required Skills and Qualifications: Education: Doctor of Pharmacy (PharmD) degree from an accredited pharmacy school. Licensing: Active pharmacist license in the state/province where practicing. Knowledge: In-depth understanding of pharmacology, drug interactions, and treatment protocols. Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills to interact effectively with patients and healthcare professionals. Attention to Detail: Ability to identify medication errors and ensure safe dispensing. Customer Service: Ability to provide excellent service and communicate complex information to patients. Qualifications Required Skills and Qualifications: Education: Doctor of Pharmacy (PharmD) degree from an accredited pharmacy school. Licensing: Active pharmacist license in the state/province where practicing. Knowledge: In-depth understanding of pharmacology, drug interactions, and treatment protocols. Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills to interact effectively with patients and healthcare professionals. Additional Information We Need 5 years + experience candidates Welcome to Health Care Pharmacy LLC, your trusted healthcare partner. معلومات عن الشركة Established in 2001, LibanTissus is a Lebanese industry known for manufacturing customized uniforms for schools, companies, and businesses. Additionally, the company offers personalized items such as napkins, covers, towels, and tablecloths for various events and weddings. Renowned for its unique quality and advanced technology machinery, LibanTissus ensures professional service and smooth delivery, guaranteeing client satisfaction. وصف الوظيفة This is a full-time on-site role for an Administrator at LibanTissus, located in Fanar. The Administrator will handle day-to-day administrative tasks, including managing schedules, coordinating with different departments, maintaining records, and ensuring efficient office operations. Job Description Logistica is looking for a Purchasing and Forwarding Executive to join the team: Responsibilities Responsible for day to day forwarding related matters to meet the Customer demands. Communicate and receive/send pre-alerts to all stakeholders: shipping lines, airlines, shipping agents, freight forwarders and local customers. Manage all administrative matters of freight and customs operations: bookings, orders tracking, documentations, custom declarations, cash outlay co-ordination, shipments follow-up, monitor clearance & deliveries. Manage timely receipt and submission of documentation for import and export of air/sea freight clearance: AWB, HAWB, Permits, Manifest, Commercial Invoice, Packing List, Bill of ladings, Certificate of Origin, Hazardous Cargo Declaration etc. Co-ordinate Import and Export freight bookings including Air / Sea (FCL/LCL) / Cross Border Trucking / Inland Clearance & Trucking. Track and trace shipments, researching and resolving any issues regarding billing or shipping discrepancies, communicate timely correspondence back to both customers and vendors Follow-up and handle all import/export/cross + freight shipments, insurance brokers and customs clearing procedures along with ongoing survey for records and documentations related to trades in order to ensure the work is compliant with forwarding standards and requirements. Qualifications ﻿Qualifications 3 to 5 years’ experience in freight forwarding. Candidate with diploma or degree in Logistics/Supply Chain or equivalent are preferred. Excellent knowledge of Freight Forwarding (Import/Export/Cross Trade/Ocean/Air/Trucking) and regulatory requirements. Proficient in handling shipping documents and familiar with INCOTERMS. Knowledge in permit declaration, chamber certificate of origin. Company Description syd life AI (HQ: London, UK) is a Life Quality & preventive health technology powered by proprietary AI, >1 million scientific research papers and real world evidence, delivering predictive, actionable data solutions that empower human- centric industries to revolutionise Life Quality at scale. Our vision is to improve people’s Life Quality by the power of research, AI, and technology—making it universally accessible. If you want to be part of a passionate and high-per forming team to transform the landscape of Life Quality & Health Tech, have a closer look at this opportunity. As a UI/UX Designer you will leverage various skills, but your main super-powers must be creativity and a deep understanding for user behaviour. Job Description **IMPORTANT ** To Apply : Please complete this Typeform : https://form.typeform.com/to/Da1kmwfc Overview: Junior / Mid-level with 1- 4 years of experience Remote Initially project-based, with the potential to evolve into a long-term, permanent role or collaboration Key Requirements Advanced proficiency in Figma Proven UI/UX design experience with a strong portfolio Basic understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for design system implementation Strong visual design skills with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics Excellent communication and collaboration skills Ability to work in a fast-paced environment . Main Responsibilities Collaborate with our Product Manager & cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and user needs Create wireframes, mock-ups, prototypes and dev-ready designs for web and mobile applications. Translate concepts into visually appealing and user-friendly inter faces, adhering to design principles and brand guidelines. Company Description Welcome to Health Care Pharmacy LLC, your trusted healthcare partner. Established in 2022 by Dolphin Group W.L.L, our pharmacy is a rapidly growing beacon of wellness located in the heart of Al Khor, Qatar. We are dedicated to enhancing and sustaining patient health in our community, and our growing reputation stands as a testament to our unwavering commitment to this mission. Our commitment extends beyond providing high-quality medical supplies and medicines; we aim to foster an environment that encourages health awareness, supports patient well-being, and cultivates lasting relationships with our customers. Our strong foundation, combined with our team’s dedication, comprehensive product portfolio, and our strategic business objectives, propels our journey towards becoming a leading player in the national healthcare industry. Job Description Marketing (B2B Focus) Pharmaceutical Key Responsibilities & Requirements: 1. Expertise in B2B marketing strategy, including lead generation, account-based marketing (ABM), and targeted content creation. 2. Experience in premium/luxury branding, including brand storytelling and high-end positioning strategy. 3. Experience with digital marketing tools such as Google Ads, SEO, email marketing platforms, instagram and snapchat, etc. 4. Experience organizing and executing high-end events, trade shows, exhibitions, and client-facing activations. 5. Develop and implement marketing strategies aligned with business goals. 6. Conduct market research and analyze consumer behavior to identify trends and opportunities. 7. Monitor and report on the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. 8. Stay up-to-date with the latest marketing trends and technologies. 9. Preferred Age Bracket: 35 y/o – 45 y/o 10. Total Experience: not less than 8 years Additional Information All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines. Company Description The Executive Chef will lead and oversee all culinary operations across both the country club’s F&B outlets and the catering division. This role is responsible for menu development, kitchen operations, food quality, team leadership, event coordination, and cost control. The ideal candidate is a hands-on leader with experience in both à la carte service and high-volume event catering. Job Description Key Responsibilities: 🔪 Culinary Leadership & Execution Design and execute creative, seasonal, and high-quality menus for the club’s restaurants and all catered events (weddings, banquets, private parties). Ensure consistency and excellence in food presentation, flavor, and hygiene across all outlets. Supervise food production for à la carte, buffet, and off-site catering setups. Adapt menus to meet client requests, dietary restrictions, and current trends. 👨‍🍳 Team Management Recruit, train, and mentor kitchen staff across both departments. Assign roles, manage schedules, and ensure proper coverage across all shifts and events. Foster a disciplined, respectful, and professional kitchen culture. 📈 Operational Oversight Maintain a strong presence during peak service hours and major events. Collaborate with FOH managers and Catering Manager/Event Coordinator to ensure smooth event execution. Monitor food inventory levels and oversee purchasing to ensure fresh and cost-effective sourcing. Lead kitchen safety protocols, sanitation practices, and compliance with food safety regulations. 💰 Cost Control & Profitability Manage food costs and labor budgets for both club operations and catered events. Analyze sales data and adjust menus and suppliers to maximize profit margins. Implement portion control, waste reduction, and prep efficiency practices. 🎯 Strategic Input Partner with General Manager and F&B Director to align culinary strategies with the club’s vision. Participate in business planning, marketing initiatives (e.g., featured chef nights), and member feedback sessions. Stay updated on F&B trends to bring innovative offerings to both club and catered menus. Qualifications Requirements: Proven experience as an Executive Chef or Head Chef in a fine-dining, banquet, or country club setting. Strong knowledge of culinary techniques, seasonal menu planning, and food safety standards. Demonstrated success in managing large-scale catering and à la carte operations simultaneously. Exceptional leadership, communication, and organizational skills. Proficiency in cost control, inventory management, and kitchen budgeting. Culinary degree or equivalent certification preferred. Company Description E-Wallet Services Job Description Driver at Neonism SAL Key Responsibilities: To execute all driving services requested by the company. Handle delivery and collection of cash amounts, confidential financial documents, checks, contracts, or parcels between banks, branches, partners, or clients. Assist with administrative trips, including submitting documents to government agencies, tax offices, and banks. Ensure confidentiality and security of all materials and passengers handled. Perform routine checks on the vehicle (oil, brakes, tire pressure, etc.) and schedule servicing. Qualifications: Valid professional driver’s license. Registered motorcycle. Minimum of 1 year of driving experience, preferably in a corporate or financial setting. Ability to handle confidential information with integrity. Excellent knowledge of local traffic rules and city routes. Strong time-management and organizational skills. Polite, professional, and customer-service oriented. Preferred Attributes: Familiarity with cash handling. Familiarity with banking procedures or financial document handling. Flexibility with work hours and availability on short notice. Full timer driver (from 9:00 am till 5:00 pm) will be operating in Sin El Fil at EVO Main Branch.
