Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with The Green Mill to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: The Green Mill Job Description We are looking for a motivated and skilled Hand-Stretched Pizza Maker who can prepare high-quality pizzas. The person needs to have the ability to skillfully stretch and shape the dough, which requires a level of precision and artistry. If you have a passion for pizza-making and ensuring that customers get the best quality pizzas, this job is for you. Job Purpose The purpose of the Hand-Stretched Pizza Maker is to create delicious, high-quality pizzas by skillfully stretching and shaping dough. They are responsible for the overall presentation and flavor of the pizzas. The individual needs to have a comprehensive understanding of cooking times and temperatures to ensure optimal flavor and texture. The role is integral in maintaining and elevating the standard of our pizza products. Job Duties and Responsibilities Prepare high-quality pizzas by skillfully stretching and shaping dough. Demonstrate proficiency in dough handling and knowledge of toppings and sauces. Maintain consistency in pizza quality. Understand cooking times and temperatures for optimal flavor and presentation. Exhibit attention to detail and a passion for pizza-making. Qualifications Required Qualifications Proficiency in dough handling. Knowledge of toppings and sauces. Ability to maintain consistency in pizza quality. Deep understanding of cooking times and temperatures. Attention to detail. Passion for pizza-making. Company Description We are looking for a dynamic Full time Graphic Designer to be responsible for designing and posting original content on online platforms working with us remotely. The responsibilities of a Graphic Designer include posting content on social media, designing graphic material and 2D animated posts, attracting consumers via social media, creating logos, guidelines, brochures, website and mobile apps designs. Job Description To be successful as a Graphic Designer, you should be highly motivated, creative, and possess solid knowledge of marketing competencies. Ultimately, a top-notch Designer should be computer literate, highly organized, and able to work with little direction. Qualifications Producing content for social media. Create logos, brochures and guidelines. Write compelling social media captions. Create Website and Mobile app designs. Increasing traffic and appealing to target audiences. Creating posts, pages, and applications to attract customers. Creating social media reports for key performance indicators. Additional Information Degree in Graphic Design. Good communication skills. Creativity and Graphic Design skills. Proficiency in Online Marketing disciplines. Must be self-motivated. Be able to produce original ideas. Company Description About Nucleus Ventures Nucleus Ventures is a leading entity in corporate innovation, venture building, and advisory services, with a track record of successful ventures, operational advisory missions, and startup incubators. Based in Beirut, Nucleus Ventures also operates in France, the UK, and Cyprus, serving the EMEA region. The company collaborates closely with clients, leveraging subject matter experts, startups, and entrepreneurs to drive growth and innovation through tailored strategies. Job Description We are seeking a dynamic Sales & Partnerships Lead to spearhead our business development and revenue-generation efforts across Lebanon and new markets. This individual will play a pivotal role in shaping the company’s growth strategy, cultivating high-value partnerships, and securing new funding streams from institutional donors, corporates, and ecosystem actors. Key Responsibilities Strategic Growth & Pipeline Development Shape and implement a long-term business growth and sales strategy aligned with the company’s mission and expansion plans. Proactively develop the pipeline of programmatic and consulting opportunities through strategic networking and positioning. Market Intelligence & Client Positioning Continuously track industry trends, funding cycles, and competitor activities. Map out clients, organizations, and product-market fit opportunities across multiple sectors and geographies. Identify client needs and co-create tailored solutions and program proposals with internal teams. Customer Engagement & Deal Closing Cultivate strong relationships with current and prospective clients, including bilateral donors, foundations, corporates, and ecosystem stakeholders. Lead commercial negotiations with professionalism, ensuring alignment between client needs and company offerings. Partnership Development Secure and maintain strategic partnerships with Tier 1–2 companies and institutional stakeholders in Lebanon and Syria. Represent the company in high-level meetings, donor forums, and industry events Qualifications 5–8 years of experience in sales, strategic partnerships, or donor relations in the consulting, development, or entrepreneurship sectors. BA in Business, Entrepreneurship, or a related field. Proven track record in fundraising, deal closure, and client engagement with major institutions. Deep understanding of the entrepreneurship, capacity-building, or consulting ecosystems. Excellent influencing, stakeholder management, and cross-functional collaboration skills. Strong negotiation acumen and ability to manage sensitive, high-stakes conversations with discretion. Strong written and verbal communication skills in English (Arabic and French are a plus). Job Description Role Overview: We are seeking an experienced Senior MEP Consultant to lead and coordinate the mechanical, electrical, and plumbing design and shop drawing development for various architectural and interior design projects. The consultant will work closely with our design team to ensure technical accuracy, code compliance, and timely delivery of MEP packages. Key Responsibilities: • Lead and manage MEP design development from concept through to IFC/shop drawings. • Coordinate with architects, interior designers, and other consultants to ensure MEP systems are integrated and clash-free. • Review and validate drawings, specifications, and technical submittals. • Ensure compliance with Saudi Building Codes, SEC, NWC, and other local regulations. • Provide input on material selection and sustainability strategies related to MEP systems. • Participate in project meetings, provide design guidance, and resolve technical issues. • Prepare detailed MEP reports, load calculations, and coordination layouts as needed. Qualifications Requirements: • Bachelor's Degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering. • 8–10 years of proven experience in MEP design, coordination, and shop drawings. • Strong portfolio of projects within the GCC, particularly in Saudi Arabia. • Deep understanding of local authority regulations, approval processes, and technical standards. • Proficient in AutoCAD, Revit (preferred), and relevant calculation software. • Excellent communication and problem-solving skills. • Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a remote consultancy setup. Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with ATA to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: ATA Job Description An opportunity has arisen for a hardworking and talented individual to join us as an Architect at Atef Tabet Architects. We are looking for someone who is invested in delivering the highest quality architectural designs, from the initial concept all the way through to construction documentation. Job Purpose The purpose of this position is to support our design development process. The Architect will be required to produce detailed architectural drawings and 3D models, working closely with our senior architects on a diverse range of projects. They will also play an active role in design discussions and conduct site visits regularly. Job Duties and Responsibilities Assist in the design development process from concept to construction documentation. Produce detailed architectural drawings and 3D models with precision and craftmanship. Collaborate closely with senior architects on a variety of projects, including residential, commercial, and cultural. Actively contribute to design discussions and participate in site visits. Maintain and display proficiency in Rhino, complemented by strong skills in drafting and 3D modeling. Qualifications Required Qualifications Significant experience in Architectural Design. Practical knowledge of 3D Modeling and Drafting. Proven ability to work as part of a collaborative team. Demonstrated ability to perform tasks related to Design Development and Site Visits. Proficiency in Rhino. Detail-oriented. Team player abilities. Aptitude for and history of Creative Contribution. Company Description Dolphin Group, established in 1992, stands as a testament to the power of vision, collaboration, and unwavering commitment. Our growth narrative is not just about numbers but about the relationships we’ve nurtured, the partnerships we’ve forged, and the milestones we’ve achieved. Job Description 1. Experience in premium/luxury branding, including brand storytelling and high-end positioning strategy. 3. Experience with digital marketing tools such as Google Ads, SEO, email marketing platforms, instagram and snapchat, etc. 4. Experience organizing and executing high-end events, trade shows, exhibitions, and client-facing activations. Company Description Consultancy Firm Job Description We are seeking a talented and innovative Mechanical Engineer with over 5 years of experience to join our dynamic team in Aoukar, Lebanon. As a key member of our engineering department, you will contribute to the design, development, and implementation of mechanical systems for various projects. Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering (required); Master's degree is a plus Minimum of 5 years of experience in mechanical engineering, with a focus on MEP systems Proficiency in BIM software, including Revit MEP and Navisworks Strong knowledge of HVAC, plumbing, fire protection, and pumping systems Experience in design, design review, and construction supervision of complex MEP systems Skilled in AutoCAD and other relevant CAD software for mechanical design Familiarity with international engineering codes and standards Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills Strong technical reporting and communication abilities Capability to manage multiple projects and meet tight deadlines Fluency in English and Arabic; knowledge of French is an advantage Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively in a team environment Strong attention to detail and commitment to producing high-quality work Innovative mindset and ability to propose creative solutions to engineering challenges Consultancy Firm Job Description We are seeking a talented and innovative Mechanical Engineer with over 5 years of experience to join our dynamic team in Aoukar, Lebanon. Company Description E-Wallet Services Job Description Accountant at Neonism SAL The Accountant position at Neonism SAL plays a crucial role in posting of daily company transactions, ensuring smooth and accurate handling of all financial transactions in compliance with company procedures. You will be ensuring the accuracy and reliability of our financial data and supporting the company accounting operations. You will play a key role in maintaining robust financial records, reconciling accounts, and assisting with critical financial processes. Key Responsibilities: Entering and recording daily financial transactions into the accounting system. Post receipts, invoices, payments, and other financial transactions. Ensure proper classification of entries based on the chart of accounts. Prepare and post journal vouchers for routine and non-routine transactions. Verify supporting documents before posting. Maintain a register and chronological filing of all journal vouchers. Reconcile bank statements with the general ledger on a monthly basis. Reconciling supplier, customer, and business activity accounts. Ministry of finance and social security declarations. Identify and resolve discrepancies . Ensure compliance with internal and external audit requirements for posting of transactions and document retention. Assist in monthly closing procedures and preparation of financial reports. Maintain organized up to date filing systems (physical and digital) for accounting records. Qualifications and Skills: A minimum of 3 years of experience in accounting field, preferably within a financial institution or fintech company. Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance. Proficiency in Accounting softwares and Microsoft Office suite, especially Excel. Strong analytical skills and attention to detail. Excellent organizational and time management skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. High level of integrity and professional behavior. Strong leadership, communication, and conflict resolution skills. Location and work schedule: Sin El-Fil Lebanon, Full-time Monday to Friday (from 9:00 am till 5:00 pm). Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Mobile Arts SAL (Offshore) to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Mobile Arts SAL (Offshore) Job Description A senior graphic designer is a critical role that initially focuses on developing visually attractive designs which effectively communicate a brand's message. This role is essential for amplifying a brand's identity across various platforms. Job Purpose The main purpose of a senior graphic designer is to apply advanced design skills, such as a deep understanding of typography, color theory, and layout principles, in order to develop compelling brand narratives. Furthermore, in this role, you will be collaborating with a diverse array of clients and team members to conceptualize and bring creative ideas to life. Job Duties and Responsibilities Create visually compelling designs that communicate a brand's message Enhance brand identity across various platforms Utilize advanced design software and principles effectively Collaborate with clients and team members to develop creative concepts Oversee multiple projects while mentoring junior designers and ensuring quality standards Qualifications Required Qualifications Ability to create visually compelling designs Expertise in enhancing brand identity Proficiency in advanced design software Understanding of typography, color theory, and layout principles Ability to collaborate effectively with clients and team members Experience in developing creative concepts Strong project management skills Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Mobile Arts SAL (Offshore) to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Job Title: Social Media and Visual Content Specialist
Description: Company Description Envetra is a leading distributor of animal health medicine, food, and accessories in Lebanon. We are passionate about delivering health and well-being to animals across the country, and we are looking for a creative graphic designer to help share this mission! Job Description As our Social Media & Digital Content Specialist , you will be the voice and visual storyteller of our brands online. You will handle end-to-end social media management and support visual branding across digital and print platforms. Your main responsibilities include: Social Media Management & Content Creation Plan, create, and schedule social media posts (static, animated, and video) across platforms (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.) in line with brand guidelines and visual identity. Write post captions, optimize hashtags, and ensure brand voice is consistent. Engage with followers, answer messages and comments in a timely, professional manner. Monitor, track performance, and analyze insights and metrics through Meta Business Suite. Suggest improvements based on performance analysis. Branding & Design Develop creative designs for marketing materials (brochures, catalogues, posters, flyers, etc...) Maintain brand consistency across all platforms. Design internal documents, presentations, and business proposals. Contribute to website UI/UX improvements. Content & Photography Assist in planning and directing campaign photoshoots. Edit and retouch product and campaign images. Collaborate with photographers and videographers. Collaboration & Innovation Collaborate closely within the marketing department to produce engaging and visually appealing content. Stay updated on social media trends, design innovations, and industry best practices. Propose fresh, creative ideas for campaigns, product launches, and seasonal events. Keep an organized content calendar and file management system. Qualifications Graphic Designer with 1 – 2 years of experience in content, and social media. Strong skills in Adobe Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign), Canva and Meta Business Suite. Creative mindset with attention to detail and strong organization skills. Envetra is a leading distributor of animal health medicine, food, and accessories in Lebanon. We are passionate about delivering health and well-being to animals across the country, and we are looking for a creative graphic designer to help share this mission! About Ogilvy Ogilvy was founded in 1948 by David Ogilvy. David created a culture that deeply respects and cares about its people and clients. Our mission is to inspire people and brands to make an impact and we are committed to attracting, growing, and retaining the best talent in the industry.   About the Role     We are seeking a passionate and enthusiastic Social Media Intern to join our dynamic team in Beirut. This internship offers a valuable opportunity to gain hands-on experience in social media management within a leading agency environment. You will support the social media team in developing and executing engaging strategies that drive brand awareness and engagement. This role is ideal for someone eager to learn about the social media landscape, develop communication skills, and contribute to real-world campaigns. What You’ll Do     Responsibilities: Assist the Social Media team in research and trend hunt exercises. Assist with audience research to identify key insights for content creation. Learn about client expectations and communication best practices. Help in developing engaging content calendars for various social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok). Monitor social media channels for brand mentions, comments, and messages. Assist in engaging with the online community in a timely and professional manner, under supervision. Help identify potential influencers and thought leaders. Assist in tracking and analyzing social media performance metrics (e.g., reach, engagement). Support the team in preparing performance reports by gathering data. Learn to utilize social listening tools to monitor brand sentiment. Stay up-to-date on the latest social media trends, best practices, and algorithm changes, sharing insights with the team. Collaborate with internal teams, including creative, to support integrated marketing campaigns. Actively participate in team meetings and contribute ideas.     What You’ll Need: Currently enrolled in or a recent graduate of a degree program in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, or a related field. Strong interest in social media and digital marketing. Basic understanding of various social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok, etc.). Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Eagerness to learn and a proactive attitude. Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment. Strong organizational skills and attention to detail. Basic analytical skills and a willingness to learn how to interpret data. Creative thinking and problem-solving aptitude. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Passion for social media and a desire to stay ahead of the curve. How We’ll Support You   Ogilvy celebrates its people. Fully. Enthusiastically. Unhesitatingly. We’ll empower you with the tools you’ll need to succeed. We’ll give you the autonomy to seek out new paths and better ways of doing things. We’ll support you with colleagues who are experts in their disciplines, drawn from across the Ogilvy network. And we’ll provide opportunities for you to do work of which you’ll be proud, with people you’ll be proud to call your teammates.    Ogilvy was founded in 1948 by David Ogilvy. David created a culture that deeply respects and cares about its people and clients. Our mission is to inspire people and brands to make an impact and we are committed to attracting, growing, and retaining the best talent in the industry.   Ogilvy was founded in 1948 by David Ogilvy. And we’ll provide opportunities for you to do work of which you’ll be proud, with people you’ll be proud to call your teammates.      We are seeking a passionate and enthusiastic Social Media Intern to join our dynamic team in Beirut. This internship offers a valuable opportunity to gain hands-on experience in social media management within a leading agency environment. You will support the social media team in developing and executing engaging strategies that drive brand awareness and engagement. This role is ideal for someone eager to learn about the social media landscape, develop communication skills, and contribute to real-world campaigns. What You’ll Do What You’ll Do     Responsibilities: Responsibilities: Assist the Social Media team in research and trend hunt exercises. Assist with audience research to identify key insights for content creation. Learn about client expectations and communication best practices. Help in developing engaging content calendars for various social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok). Monitor social media channels for brand mentions, comments, and messages. Assist in engaging with the online community in a timely and professional manner, under supervision. Help identify potential influencers and thought leaders. Assist in tracking and analyzing social media performance metrics (e.g., reach, engagement). Support the team in preparing performance reports by gathering data. Learn to utilize social listening tools to monitor brand sentiment. Stay up-to-date on the latest social media trends, best practices, and algorithm changes, sharing insights with the team. Collaborate with internal teams, including creative, to support integrated marketing campaigns. Actively participate in team meetings and contribute ideas. Regional Account Manager – Commercial Location - Lebanon Job Description In this key role, you will manage, direct and drive direct sales into Commercial Accounts in Lebanon. Create and implement strategic plans focused on attaining enterprise-wide deployments of Fortinet products and services. Develop executive relationships with key buyers and influencers in Commercial accounts and leverage these relationships. Coordinate with appropriate internal groups to generate and deliver winning Contract Bids, Proposals, RFI/RFP Responses, and Statements of Work. Negotiate terms of business with clients to achieve win/win results that provide the basis for strong ongoing relationships. Responsibilities: Develop account plans to achieve goals and exceed quota responsibility Maximize Fortinet opportunity while providing value added solutions to enterprise institutions Serves as lead contact responsible for the flow of information to/from executive management Works closely together with the account managers in order to maximize the primary business focus and serves as team leader responsible for the quality and success of activities in the territory Develops relationships with key decision makers, influencers and partners Manages effective working relationships with assigned region MAMs, Technical Sales Engineers, and Consulting Professionals Consistently builds and delivers on an accurate territory pipeline Travels within assigned territory is required Required Skills: 5+ years technology selling experience managing a team Proven ability to sell solutions to enterprise customers Experience in the network security industry A proven track record of significant over-quota achievement and demonstrated career stability Experience in closing large deals Selling experience must include one of the following : 1) Firewall/VPN, 2) AV 3) IDS/IDP Excellent presentation skills to executives & individual contributors Excellent written and verbal communication skills Goal oriented individual, with vast interpersonal managerial skills, strong business acumen and positive leadership abilities with proven results in mentoring, motivating and developing teams. Company Description Ever since our establishment back in 1958, we have made a commitment to satisfy the demands of even the most critical requirements of our customers. With continuous customer satisfaction and an excellent sales service, we have gained the trust of all woodworking, wholesalers, and customers all over Lebanon. Asmar Wood has always been a reliable supplier of superior quality lumber products manufactured all around the world. Job Description We are hiring! We’re currently looking for a carpenter to join our team. If you have a solid experience in carpentry and are eager to learn and grow, we’d love to hear from you! Contact us via WhatsApp to: +961 81 611 500 Qualifications Skilled with tools and machinery Can read technical drawings Detail-oriented and reliable Team player with good time management Additional Information All your- information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines. Company Description About Us: Atef Tabet Architects is a pioneering force in Lebanese architecture, known for a legacy of design excellence that blends contextual sensitivity with forward-thinking innovation. With decades of iconic contributions to the built environment, our studio continues to craft projects that embody precision, depth, and lasting value. Job Description We are currently seeking an Architect to join our team. This is a unique opportunity to work on highly detailed, design-intensive projects within a collaborative and dynamic studio environment. Key Responsibilities: Assist in the design development process, from concept to construction documentation Produce detailed architectural drawings and 3D models with a strong focus on craft and precision Collaborate closely with senior architects on a range of residential, commercial, and cultural projects Contribute creatively to design discussions and reviews Participate in site visits and coordination with consultants as needed Qualifications Requirements: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Architecture 1–2 years of professional experience in an architecture firm Proficiency in Rhino is required (knowledge of Grasshopper is a plus) Strong skills in drafting, 3D modeling, and architectural detailing A keen eye for design and materials, with a passion for refined architecture Ability to work both independently and within a team Familiarity with Adobe Creative Suite and AutoCAD; Revit is a bonus What We Offer: A rare opportunity to be mentored by a respected leader in Lebanese architecture Exposure to complex and detail-rich projects with a focus on excellence A collaborative studio culture that values creativity, rigor, and architectural integrity How to Apply: Please send your CV, portfolio (max 10 MB), and a brief cover letter to [email protected] . Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. Join us and contribute to a tradition of meaningful architecture shaped with vision and care. Company Description Ardi Ardak exists to provide agricultural solutions and services to all those interested in agriculture through land management services, climate-smart agricultural technologies, and educational activities. Every member of our team shares the values that Ardi Ardak has of education, community collaboration and circular economy, eco friendly agricultural practices, and supporting small and medium shareholder farmers and food producers. Job Description Job Title: Salesman – Food & Agricultural Products (Part-Time) Location: Beirut – willing to travel to other areas to attain clients. Job Description: We are looking for a motivated Salesman with at least 3 years of experience in selling food and agricultural products . The candidate should have strong product knowledge in agricultural and food items, excellent communication skills, and the ability to build and maintain client relationships. Salesman must also be well networked with suppliers of Agri food and hardware items and be able to conduct procurement procedures. Key Responsibilities: Identify and approach potential clients in the food and agriculture sectors Promote and sell agricultural and food products Promote and sell Ardi Ardak’s land management services Support in procurement procedures Conduct field visits and follow up with clients on sales Provide weekly reports on sales and new trends Support via customer satisfaction and retention efforts Requirements: Minimum 3 years of sales experience in food/agriculture Deep understanding of the local market and product range Able to conduct adequate procurement Has an agricultural background and experience. Strong communication and negotiation skills Ability to work independently and manage time effectively Must have own vehicle and valid driver’s license and willing to travel to various locations in Lebanon Qualifications Experience in the field of Sales and procurement in Agri Food Must have a vehicle and valid drivers license Ardi Ardak exists to provide agricultural solutions and services to all those interested in agriculture through land management services, climate-smart agricultural technologies, and educational activities. Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Smartsmellsystems to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Smartsmellsystems Job Description We are looking for a talented and passionate individual to join our team as an Actor. This role involves showcasing your ability to portray diverse characters convincingly through film, television, and theater mediums. The ideal candidate is expected to interpret scripts, embody different characters, and convey strong emotions to captivate and entertain our audiences. Job Purpose The purpose of the Actor's role is to translate scripts into convincing performances, bring diverse personas to life, and engage the audience through powerful emotional representation. The actor should also collaborate effectively with directors and fellow actors to contribute to a compelling storytelling experience. Strong skills in verbal and physical communication, improvisation, and emotional intelligence are crucial to fulfill these tasks. Job Duties and Responsibilities Portray characters convincingly in film, television, and theater. Interpret scripts and embody different personas. Convey emotions to engage and entertain audiences. Demonstrate strong verbal and physical communication skills. Collaborate effectively with directors and fellow actors. Qualifications Required Qualifications Experience and ability to portray characters convincingly. Strong skills to interpret scripts and embody different personas. Ability to convey emotions effectively. Strong verbal and physical communication skills. Experience in improvisation. Demonstrated emotional intelligence. Ability to collaborate with directors. Company Description Welcome to Health Care Pharmacy LLC, your trusted healthcare partner. Established in 2022 by Dolphin Group W.L.L, our pharmacy is a rapidly growing beacon of wellness located in the heart of Al Khor, Qatar. We are dedicated to enhancing and sustaining patient health in our community, and our growing reputation stands as a testament to our unwavering commitment to this mission. Our commitment extends beyond providing high-quality medical supplies and medicines; we aim to foster an environment that encourages health awareness, supports patient well-being, and cultivates lasting relationships with our customers. Our strong foundation, combined with our team’s dedication, comprehensive product portfolio, and our strategic business objectives, propels our journey towards becoming a leading player in the national healthcare industry. Job Description We are seeking an enthusiastic and goal-oriented Medical Sales Representative to join our dynamic team in Beirut, Lebanon. In this role, you will be responsible for promoting and selling our company's innovative medical products to healthcare professionals, hospitals, and clinics throughout Lebanon. Develop and maintain strong relationships with healthcare professionals, key decision-makers, and purchasing departments in hospitals and clinics throughout Beirut and surrounding areas Conduct engaging product presentations and demonstrations to showcase the benefits and features of our cutting-edge medical devices and pharmaceuticals Achieve and exceed sales targets by identifying new business opportunities and expanding existing accounts Provide comprehensive product training and support to customers, ensuring proper usage and maximum satisfaction Stay updated on industry trends, competitor activities, and market dynamics to develop effective sales strategies Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather valuable customer feedback and contribute to product development initiatives Maintain accurate records of sales activities, customer interactions, and market intelligence using CRM software Attend medical conferences, trade shows, and networking events to promote our products and expand our customer base Ensure compliance with all relevant healthcare regulations and company policies in sales practices Analyze market data and customer needs to identify potential growth areas and optimize sales strategies Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Life Sciences, Pharmacy, or a related field Proven track record of success in medical or pharmaceutical sales Strong understanding of medical terminology, healthcare industry trends, and regulations Excellent communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills Demonstrated ability to build and maintain long-term client relationships Proficiency in negotiation and persuasion techniques Strong time management and organizational skills Experience with CRM software and ability to leverage technology in sales processes In-depth knowledge of medical devices, pharmaceuticals, or biotechnology products Willingness to travel extensively within Lebanon Valid driver's license and clean driving record Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret market data and customer insights Detail-oriented approach to maintaining accurate records and following up on leads Customer-focused attitude with a commitment to providing exceptional service Familiarity with the Lebanese healthcare system and regulations Fluency in Arabic and English (both written and spoken) Additional Information All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines. Company Description Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Hala Al Dallah to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Name: Hala Al Dallah Job Description We are searching for a skilled and dedicated Dates, Sweets, and Chocolate Factory Manager to join our team. This role is instrumental in the manufacture of our delectable array of sweets, chocolates, and dates. The ideal candidate will be responsible for overseeing the complete production process, ensuring that each bite delivers the quality our customers have come to love and expect. Job Purpose The purpose of this role is to ensure efficient and smooth operations across the production process. From manufacturing to inventory management, the Factory Manager will embody the importance of producing high-quality confectionery products. By leading and training staff, the Manager will influence our factory's environment while staying updated with food safety regulations and pushing the envelope in product development to meet dynamic market demands. Job Duties and Responsibilities Oversee the production process to ensure high-quality confectionery products Manage manufacturing efficiency through strong production management Implement quality control measures to maintain superior product standards Monitor inventory to meet production needs Lead and train employees for optimal productivity Maintain compliance with food safety regulations Develop new product lines in response to market trends and demands Qualifications Required Qualifications Experience in production management Strong skills in quality control Experience in inventory management Proven ability to lead and train staff Knowledge of food safety regulations Background in product development Jobs for Humanity is partnering with Hala Al Dallah to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we prioritize individuals coming from all walks of life. Company Description We’re Hiring! A Cosmetics Public Relations Specialist is needed for a Cosmetics and Oral Hygiene Factory in Beirut; Lebanon (Gallery Semaan Area) experience specifically within the cosmetics, beauty, health, or oral hygiene industry will be considered. Job Description Responsibilities • Build and maintain a positive brand image for the factory across digital and traditional media channels • Develop PR strategies and campaigns tailored to the cosmetics and oral hygiene industry • Collaborate with influencers, beauty editors, and health professionals to increase brand visibility • Organize product launches, promotional events, and press conferences • Create compelling press releases, newsletters, and media content • Respond to media inquiries and manage crisis communications professionally • Monitor public perception, customer feedback, and market trends • Coordinate with marketing and sales teams to align messaging and branding • Support content creation for social media platforms, focusing on health, beauty, and hygiene awareness • Build partnerships with pharmacies, clinics, and beauty retailers to enhance brand exposure Qualifications Qualifications • Bachelor’s degree in Public Relations, Communications, Marketing, or a related field • Previous experience in PR within the cosmetics, health, hygiene, or beauty industry is a strong plus • Knowledge of the cosmetics and oral hygiene market trends and audience behavior • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in Arabic and English (French is a plus) • Creative thinking with the ability to craft effective public messaging • Strong organizational and multitasking skills • Ability to build media relationships and manage external communications • Applicants must reside in Beirut Additional Information Working hours: Mon-Fri (8:00am-4:00pm) Sat. for 12:00pm The salary will be determined during the interview. Interested candidates can send their CV to [email protected] Or by WhatsApp at 81 674 655 (Please mention the job title and company in the subject. ex: PR Applicant for Cosmetics factory) 🚫 Please note: Only candidates with proven PR experience specifically within the cosmetics, beauty, health, or oral hygiene industry will be considered. Careem is building the Everything App for the greater Middle East, making it easier than ever to move around, order food and groceries, manage payments, and more. Careem is led by a powerful purpose to simplify and improve the lives of people and build an awesome organisation that inspires. Since 2012, Careem has created earnings for over 2.5 million Captains, simplified the lives of over 70 million customers, and built a platform for the region’s best talent to thrive and for entrepreneurs to scale their businesses. Careem operates in over 70 cities across 10 countries, from Morocco to Pakistan. About the team The Careem Data Science team’s mission is to drive competitive value from data at scale through building AI models to optimize user experiences, decision making, operational efficiencies, and lead the region’s AI ecosystem. As one of the leaders in this team, you will be at the forefront of fulfilling this mission. You will be working with and leading the top data science talent of the region, leveraging AI to solve the region’s day-to-day problems, through state-of-the-art machine learning, optimization, deep learning, and RL models, that are deployed on top of our own in-house AI platform, serving users in real-time. What you'll do Build a long-term vision on how we can rethink our customer acquisition and engagement strategies, leveraging data in our decision making. Drive exploratory analysis to understand the ecosystem, user behavior, identify new levers to help move metrics, and build models of user behaviors for analysis and product enhancements. Shape and influence data/ML models and instrumentation to optimize the product experience and generate insights on new areas of opportunity and new products. Provide product leadership by sharing data-based recommendations to communicate state of business, root cause of change in metrics, and experimentation results influencing product and business decisions Implement scalable machine learning algorithms that will be used in production on big data. Embark on exploratory data analysis projects to achievea  better understanding of phenomena as well as to discover untapped areas of growth and optimization.  Answer complex analytic questions from big data sets to help Careem shape its products and services in a better way. Help define and track the appropriate key metrics for specific projects.  Design and run randomized controlled experiments, analyze the resulting data, and communicate results with other teams. You will always challenge the status quo and continually investigate new data processing technologies and seek to ensure that we follow the industry best practices. What you'll need Experience in data mining, predictive modeling, time series analysis, machine learning, Big Data methodologies, transformation and cleaning of both structured and unstructured data. Advanced degree in a quantitative discipline such as Physics, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering or Computer Science. Strong problem solving and coding skills. Solid knowledge of and experience with marketplace problems in ride hailing and delivery services.  Solid knowledge of AB testing, classic ML and DL Solid understanding of recommendations, learning to rank, uplift modeling and matching problems.  Fluency in English along with excellent oral and written communication skills. Proficiency and demonstrated experience in: Python, SQL, Spark, Hive. Demonstrated experience with database technologies (e.g. Hadoop, BigQuery, Amazon EMR, Hive, Oracle, SAP, DB2, Teradata, MS SQL Server, MySQL). Demonstrated experience with business intelligence and visualization tools (Tableau, MicroStrategy, ChartIO, Qlik) along with geospatial data processing skills is a plus. Careem is building the Everything App for the greater Middle East, making it easier than ever to move around, order food and groceries, manage payments, and more. Careem is led by a powerful purpose to simplify and improve the lives of people and build an awesome organisation that inspires. Since 2012, Careem has created earnings for over 2.5 million Captains, simplified the lives of over 70 million customers, and built a platform for the region’s best talent to thrive and for entrepreneurs to scale their businesses. Careem operates in over 70 cities across 10 countries, from Morocco to Pakistan. About the team The Careem Data Science team’s mission is to drive competitive value from data at scale through building AI models to optimize user experiences, decision making, operational efficiencies, and lead the region’s AI ecosystem. As one of the leaders in this team, you will be at the forefront of fulfilling this mission. You will be working with and leading the top data science talent of the region, leveraging AI to solve the region’s day-to-day problems, through state-of-the-art machine learning, optimization, deep learning, and RL models, that are deployed on top of our own in-house AI platform, serving users in real-time. What you'll do Build a long-term vision on how we can rethink our customer acquisition and engagement strategies, leveraging data in our decision making. Drive exploratory analysis to understand the ecosystem, user behavior, identify new levers to help move metrics, and build models of user behaviors for analysis and product enhancements. Shape and influence data/ML models and instrumentation to optimize the product experience and generate insights on new areas of opportunity and new products. Provide product leadership by sharing data-based recommendations to communicate state of business, root cause of change in metrics, and experimentation results influencing product and business decisions Implement scalable machine learning algorithms that will be used in production on big data. Embark on exploratory data analysis projects to achievea  better understanding of phenomena as well as to discover untapped areas of growth and optimization.  Answer complex analytic questions from big data sets to help Careem shape its products and services in a better way. Help define and track the appropriate key metrics for specific projects.  Design and run randomized controlled experiments, analyze the resulting data, and communicate results with other teams. You will always challenge the status quo and continually investigate new data processing technologies and seek to ensure that we follow the industry best practices. What you'll need Experience in data mining, predictive modeling, time series analysis, machine learning, Big Data methodologies, transformation and cleaning of both structured and unstructured data. Advanced degree in a quantitative discipline such as Physics, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering or Computer Science. Strong problem solving and coding skills. Solid knowledge of and experience with marketplace problems in ride hailing and delivery services.  Solid knowledge of AB testing, classic ML and DL Solid understanding of recommendations, learning to rank, uplift modeling and matching problems.  Fluency in English along with excellent oral and written communication skills. Proficiency and demonstrated experience in: Python, SQL, Spark, Hive. Demonstrated experience with database technologies (e.g. Hadoop, BigQuery, Amazon EMR, Hive, Oracle, SAP, DB2, Teradata, MS SQL Server, MySQL). Demonstrated experience with business intelligence and visualization tools (Tableau, MicroStrategy, ChartIO, Qlik) along with geospatial data processing skills is a plus. Knowledge of Agile methodologies. Job Title: Junior Social Media Insights & Reporting Coordinator
Description: Company Description We are Ethos, the fastest growing digital communication group in MENA. We think big and we make big ideas come to life. We are crazy about the digital world and we aim high. We are looking for talented and valued people with interesting and provocative ideas, along with bold and diverse perspectives. Our culture is all about the thriving young team of us in 3 offices around MENA, while we boldly help impact the success of leading brands like McDonald's, General Motors, and American Express. Job Description Data & Reporting Execution Routine Data Pulls: Daily/weekly metrics from Emplifi, Hootsuite, Talkwalker, influencer platforms. Slide Production: Build/edit reports in PowerPoint/Google Slides using pre-designed templates. Dashboard Maintenance: Update real-time social dashboards (e.g., Emplifi). Data Hygiene: Clean/organize raw social data for senior review. Support Tasks Track competitor social KPIs (follower growth, engagement rates). Compile social listening alerts (brand mentions, crisis flags). Format influencer campaign performance summaries. Qualifications Hard Skills Advanced PowerPoint/Google Slides (portfolio required) Basic social platform analytics (Meta, TikTok, LinkedIn) Excel/Sheets (pivot tables, VLOOKUPs) Tool familiarity (Emplifi/Hootsuite > Talkwalker) Soft Skills Extreme attention to detail Template adherence (brand consistency) Deadline-driven execution We are Ethos, the fastest growing digital communication group in MENA. About Anghami: Anghami Inc. operates two of MENA's leading digital entertainment platforms—Anghami and OSN+. Founded in 2012, Anghami is the region's top multimedia streaming platform with 120 million users and 2.5 million paid subscribers. As the first Arab tech company listed on NASDAQ (ANGH), we've partnered with OSN+ to create a comprehensive entertainment ecosystem. With headquarters in Abu Dhabi and offices across Dubai, Beirut, Cairo, and Riyadh, we're reshaping how MENA experiences digital entertainment. About The Role We're seeking a Backend Engineer (3-5 years experience) to join our Beirut office. You'll develop and maintain backend systems that serve millions of users, working in a high-talent-density environment where your contributions directly impact the product. Key Responsibilities: Design and maintain scalable backend systems with comprehensive monitoring and observability Build robust APIs for customer-facing features and internal tools Solve scale challenges: high-concurrency events, real-time processing, sub-second response times Implement distributed systems patterns for reliability and fault tolerance Write clean, well-tested code and conduct thorough code reviews Collaborate with frontend engineers and product teams Technical Challenges: Optimizing for traffic spikes during live events and content releases Building resilient microservices at scale Processing billions of user interactions in real-time Ensuring consistent performance across regions Required Qualifications: 3-5 years backend development experience Experience with popular backend languages and frameworks (Go, Java/Kotlin/Spring, Python/Flask, etc.) Experience with relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) Hands-on experience with cloud services (AWS, GCP, Azure) and Docker Understanding of microservices and distributed systems Solid testing practices and problem-solving skills Preferred Qualifications: Strong proficiency in Go Kubernetes experience at scale Background in streaming technologies System design and architecture expertise Experience with observability tools PHP knowledge (for legacy systems) Why Join Us: Impact millions of users across MENA Work with talented engineers who value technical excellence Freedom to experiment with new technologies Rapid growth through diverse technical challenges About Anghami: Anghami Inc. operates two of MENA's leading digital entertainment platforms—Anghami and OSN+. Position:Nurse Coordinator (Lebanon) – Travel Abroad Location: Travel abroad across Greater MENA and GCC countries, including UAE, KSA, Oman, Kuwait, and others. Visa transfer, licensing, and accommodation support will be facilitated by Axios. Position Purpose The Home Health Nurse provides comprehensive nursing care in the community setting that assists patients to achieve optimum health and quality of life in situations of chronic disease. The Home Care Nurse is responsible for the provision and management of effective nursing care to individuals and/or families in the community or in Patient Support Programs. Duties and Responsibilities Based on the agreed upon services and workflow, the Home Health Nurse provides skilled nursing services in accordance with the orders of a physician and under a plan of care. Duties include but not limited to: Telephonic follow up consultation Monitoring of vital signs during home care; blood pressure, heart rate, temperature and oximeter statistics Monitoring of blood glucose levels, and providing teaching and support for patient and family Preparing medications as per physician order Administrating medications and instruction on Medication such as Injections, IV’s, inhalation, oral, infusions and rectal Pain Management Medication monitoring and support for patients with acute or chronic health conditions Education and counselling, consistent with the type/nature of treatment and/or care management need Wound assessment and dressing changes Providing general nursing care Knowledge about Advanced Foot Care will be added value but not a must Monitoring pain control Cardiac Assessments Reporting Adverse Events and follow the country rules and regulation regarding AE reporting procedure, and reporting any concerns /changes in patient health to the program and/or treating physician Reporting any adverse events/product complaints as per client’s requirements and/or Axios SOPPs Familiarity with nursing equipment (like ECG machine, spirometry and monitors) and ability to provide nursing assessments to patients Organizational Responsibilities Reflecting and interpreting the Axios Vision, Mission and Core Values in his/her own work with enthusiasm and commitment Acting in accordance with relevant legislation and company Policies, Standards and Procedures Effectively assisting the Program Managers in managing the Patient Support Program(s) by liaising with hospitals, distributors, pharmacies, and patients Working closely with the Axios staff to implement the required service(s) for the enrolled patients in the program(s) Carrying out home visits for patient care as required Preparing timely monitoring reports (monthly) with patient numbers and logistics as well as quality assurance reports (quarterly) for internal This includes monitoring and tracking patient files in collaboration with Axios staff in “real time” as patients proceed through the program Educational Background and Experience A BS Degree in Nursing is required At least 2 years working experience in a healthcare setting Must provide evidence of local health authority license or eligibility letter Excellent command of English and Arabic Demonstrate clinical nursing knowledge and experience in providing direct patient care Job Circumstances The position is based in our Regional office ( in the country you will be travelling for) and it does entail frequent travel to Clients and partners which may be outside your designated region. Must have initiated the DataFlow process or be in process to obtain nursing licensure in the required country before joining . Flexibility in ability to travel as well as working hours is essential. Must be certified in CPR and/or First Aid course certificate He/she must provide Good Standing Certificate not older than 6 months. At Elanco (NYSE: ELAN) – it all starts with animals! As a global leader in animal health, we are dedicated to innovation and delivering products and services to prevent and treat disease in farm animals and pets. At Elanco, we are driven by our vision of Food and Companionship Enriching Life and our purpose – all to Go Beyond for Animals, Customers, Society and Our People. At Elanco, we pride ourselves on fostering a diverse and inclusive work environment. We believe that diversity is the driving force behind innovation, creativity, and overall business success. Here, you’ll be part of a company that values and champions new ways of thinking, work with dynamic individuals, and acquire new skills and experiences that will propel your career to new heights. Making animals’ lives better makes life better – join our team today! Function Overview: Work closely with TMEA Marketing Leader and Poultry Marketing Manager Turkey, commercial leadership and teams to provide input into large animals & Bioprotection / Bees marketing strategies for Elanco Animal Health in MENA GSE. This position will be involved in the development, adjustment and execution of strategies and marketing plans for relevant brands related to the above listed species to ensure alignment with global brands strategies and business objectives. The role interacts with key suppliers, including agencies and sit on multiple internal and external cross functional teams. Key focus of this role will be coordination and execution of business development of large animal, protection and bee portfolio. Responsibilities: Development and implementation of large animal, bioprotection and bee marketing plans and planning activities with respect to the respective brands promotion: Close collaboration with commercial and technical department in the development of the annual marketing plan, Implementation of marketing campaigns to meet sales targets in accordance with specific tasks stipulated in the annual marketing plan for this category, Managing the development of support programs and projects designed to fulfill marketing tasks and track the results and implementation of such programs, Building metrics to monitor the results of the planned promotional activities and timely use of measures aimed at identifying lags the projected targets. Coordination of the production and supply of all support/promotional material: Administration and coordination of supplies of promotional materials such as but not limited to; brochures, leaflets, posters, souvenirs in accordance with the global and regional platforms and requirements, Development and supply of promotional materials to local brands if required, Close cooperation with cross functions and external agencies, involved in production of promotional materials and final approval of their artworks and ensuring compliance of marketing materials with industry and internal regulations and local legislation, Responsible and accountable to fulfill the role in the creation, review and approval of Promotional Materials. Marketing opex responsibilities: Budget management: Brands are promoted at the expense of the budget allocated for advertising and promotion of brands and used in advertising campaigns and promotional activities. This position is responsible for managing such a budget and ensuring proper distribution of funds with a focus on SGIs, Creation with commercial, regulatory and technical departments to ensure sufficient stock of products necessary for the implementation of sales plan (targets) and maintaining the level of stocks, in line with right time of promotions. Focus on customers: Assessment of needs and requirements through interaction with customers, consumers and sales managers, designation of required market research to identify customer needs and determine competitive prices, Providing the necessary support to sales teams in the field, holding trainings, meetings with customers and consumers, ensuring feedback directly from the source, Deep understanding of customers and consumer’s needs, Management of pricing brands and products, monitoring of prices and the risk of potential losses in coordination with commercial and finances departments. Establishment of business relations with the key business partners: Building relationships with the relevant external companies, KOL, advertising agencies, key suppliers, distributors etc, Promotion of the Elanco brand at the internal and external levels to increase the involvement of all participants. Minimum Qualifications: Advanced education levels are a benefit, especially Veterinary medicine education. At least 5 years of professional experience in large animal business, practitioner or in pharmaceutical commercial department. Preferred Qualifications: Keen interest in marketing, Experience in teamwork, proactivity, focus on results and focus on customers, Excellent organizational and performance skills, Excellent written and oral communication skills, fluency in English language is essential, Personal responsibility and diligence in accomplishment of tasks, Ability to prioritize and manage multi tasks, Understanding and compliance with Elanco’s rules and procedures and requirements for approval of projects, Positive attitude to and compliance with the principles of Elanco’s corporate culture, Mobile and can work across different cultures, Personal accountability and strong drive for execution. Additional Information: Travel is required regularly within MENA GSE and occasionally globally, up to 30%. With 75 years of experience, our focus is on helping the most vulnerable children overcome poverty and experience fullness of life. We help children of all backgrounds, even in the most dangerous places, inspired by our Christian faith. Come join our 33,000+ staff working in nearly 100 countries and share the joy of transforming vulnerable children’s life stories! Key Responsibilities: The purpose of the position is to organize and coordinate the Bekaa office and warehouses administrative functions and to develop and maintain office administrative processes. To manage the house keepers and to handle the logistics of local meetings and conferences. Support and coordinate the Bekaa administrative related tasks Maintain & Monitor necessary utility files, and responsible for issuing due rent payments on time, in addition to following up on renewal of contracts for WV offices in Bekaa in coordination with the Area Manager and Administration Manager. Oversee the daily functioning of office facilities including repairs and minor renovations. Ensure office equipment and furniture are managed; and maintain an inventory register. keep updated data of all admin inventory at the area level Coordinate all local trainings, workshops and events as needed. Supervise the cleaning staff & services, follow-up on their daily schedule, monitor their leaves and complete Performance reviews with all of them. Handle the process of distributing incoming and outgoing mail / courier (DHL, Libanpost, & inter office mail with signature of employees Coordinate the conference rooms schedule Handle Office expenses and payments Monitor the daily administrative expenses, handle the Bekaa office petty cash and submit on monthly or bi-weekly basis the expenses to the finance department for replenishment. (frequency is normally month but can be on bi-weekly if needed) Follow up on the payments of the Casual Workers when needed (finance or admin casual workers if any) Follow up on the payments of the suppliers for the requests (utilities, supplies) received on ProVision. Coordinate Visits and Events Make hotel and transportation bookings for staff as well as for visitors, as needed Support in the logistics preparations of local events and meetings whenever needed. Attend events as needed. Ensure high level of hospitality to the Bekaa Office visitors at all times. Maintain the inventory of Supplies and stationary Ensure availability of admin required stationery and maintain proper stock controls systems. Ensure availability of office/kitchen supplies and maintain proper stock controls systems Place orders as the need arises via ProVision Perform Tasks related to Support Functions Handle P&C related basic tasks in the absence of the P&C Team in Bekaa (i.e. Collecting Bekaa staff signatures related to NSSF - Ministry of Labor - Conflict of Interest Disclosure - Exit Checklist/Clearance Paper, handover WV Assets, Distribute Insurance cards, attach Our Voice posters, ANN, delivery of flower arrangements to new borns’ parents…) Handle Procurement related basic tasks related to Bekaa Offices' services/requests (collecting submitted offers in enclosed envelopes) Support the ICT teams in miscellaneous activities when an all staff effort is needed for example the mass operating system update, support in the server room, solar electric system, etc. Perform other duties as required Participate in reflection events, monthly meetings, yearly planning and major events. Attend and participate in capacity building trainings locally and internationally. Responsible for own & staff security and actively contribute to a positive security culture. Abide by the security policies and procedures and report any incidents or breaches to line manager and / or security manager. Report CP incidents as per the safeguarding policy guidelines. Perform other duties as assigned by the Line Manager Minimum Requirements: Strong understanding of best practices and strategies in admin, logistics or management. A university degree or higher education in Business Management, or similar field At least 3 years of experience in a similar related job. Very Good written and spoken English and Arabic languages Office based job with local travel Position requires availability and willingness to work outside regular office hours occasionally. Position requires willingness and ability to continue to function during a crisis, including during a World Vision response to a manmade or natural disaster. Strong written and verbal communication skills, effective in representation and liaison with external parties. Good computer literacy in Microsoft Office package (incl. Excel) Strong Organizational Skills Good Communication and interpersonal skills Ability to work in and contribute to dynamic team operating in a fragile environment Applicant Types Accepted: Local Applicants Only With 75 years of experience, our focus is on helping the most vulnerable children overcome poverty and experience fullness of life. Company Description Inspectyo is a modern business services company helping entrepreneurs, investors, and professionals open their own companies in the U.S., U.K., and Saudi Arabia — 100% remotely and legally. We provide a full “done-for-you” setup , including: Company registration Business bank accounts Website creation Investment licensing (in Saudi Arabia) Visa assistance and real estate support We work with both direct clients and B2B partners (like law firms and consulting offices) across the Gulf and the Middle East. Our goal is to make launching a global business as simple as ordering online — and we’re growing fast. We operate with a small, professional team and serve clients from Lebanon, Saudi Arabia, the UAE, and beyond. Job Description Key Responsibilities: Respond to WhatsApp and Instagram leads within minutes Use Udoo CRM to: Track every lead, status, and follow-up Never lose a lead or forget a client Follow up with all leads 3–5 times over time (calls, texts, messages) Visit offices, clients, and partners for in-person meetings when needed Perform door-to-door sales visits if required Represent Inspectyo with confidence and professionalism Close sales for services like: Opening U.S./U.K./Saudi companies Business setup + banking + websites New premium offers Help improve our sales system and scripts to get better results ​​​​​​​ Qualifications Previous experience in sales or closing deals (any industry) Strong communication skills (in Arabic + basic English) Comfortable with CRM tools (Udoo or similar) Confident, proactive, and goal-driven Must be present full-time in the office if there is no client meetings Driver’s license preferred (for client visits) Additional Information 500$ base salary + high commission per sale Performance bonuses available for exceeding targets Growth opportunity into Senior Sales or Partner Manager roles Inspectyo is a modern business services company helping entrepreneurs, investors, and professionals open their own companies in the U.S., U.K., and Saudi Arabia — 100% remotely and legally. Job Purpose Responsible for planning and creating engaging content across digital platforms, managing social media execution, and supporting campaign performance through trend monitoring, visual creation, and reporting. Perform duties in accordance with Malia Group Policies and Procedures. Duties And Responsibilities On Content Creation & Execution Develop engaging, platform-specific content (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, etc.) that reflects Cosmaline’s identity and drives reach, engagement, and brand visibility Execute content through Canva, video shooting/editing, or by preparing clear briefs for the graphic design team Plan and implement content based on weekly/monthly calendars, seasonal campaigns, and product launches Set up and manage social media ads using Meta Ads Manager and TikTok Ads to support campaigns, boost performance, and increase conversions On Community Management & Engagement Monitor and manage daily interactions across all social platforms; respond to messages, comments, and mentions professionally and promptly Foster an active and loyal online community that aligns with Cosmaline’s values and aesthetics Launch and moderate user engagement activities such as hashtag campaigns, giveaways, and UGC initiatives On Trend Monitoring & Research Research competitor strategies, platform algorithm updates, and audience behavior to refine Cosmaline’s content direction Stay updated on digital content, beauty, lifestyle, and pop culture trends Regularly contribute trend-based creative ideas to support future campaigns On Reporting & Optimization Track key performance metrics (engagement, reach, click-through rate, etc.) across platforms and use insights to optimize future content planning and ad strategy Analyze content performance and prepare monthly reports highlighting results, learnings, and improvement areas Responsible for planning and creating engaging content across digital platforms, managing social media execution, and supporting campaign performance through trend monitoring, visual creation, and reporting. Job Purpose Responsible for strategizing and implementing online advocacy, building awareness on Cosmaline brand reputation, strengthening its credibility and promoting its messages to a defined audience of influencers, with a focus on all assigned markets. Perform duties in accordance with Malia Group policies and procedures Duties And Responsibilities On Influencer Marketing Set Cosmaline's influencer marketing strategy to expand brand reach on social media and increase awareness in all markets Identify, collaborate and maintain excellent relationship with social media influencers and key partners within assigned markets to ensure maximum brand reach and exposure (Consider the three Rs of influence (Relevance/Reach/Resonance) Create initiatives and content ideas to increase Cosmaline's visibility on influencers' platforms and be reactive to sales target needs Apply a continuous selection and recruitment process of new influencers to add to the portfolio Contribute with the team by providing content ideas/materials when needed On Reporting Continuously analyze, track & report the results/level of engagement following any collaboration and take needed corrective actions in case of poor results Track and analyze the performance of influencer metrics, including sales, engagement metrics, reach, and ROI. Careem is building the Everything App for the greater Middle East, making it easier than ever to move around, order food and groceries, manage payments, and more. Careem is led by a powerful purpose to simplify and improve the lives of people and build an awesome organisation that inspires. Since 2012, Careem has created earnings for over 2.5 million Captains, simplified the lives of over 70 million customers, and built a platform for the region’s best talent to thrive and for entrepreneurs to scale their businesses. Careem operates in over 70 cities across 10 countries, from Morocco to Pakistan. About the team The Careem Data Science team’s mission is to drive competitive value from data at scale through building AI models to optimize user experiences, decision making, operational efficiencies, and lead the region’s AI ecosystem. As one of the tech leaders in this team, you will be at the forefront of fulfilling this mission. You will be working with the top data science talent of the region, while innovating on our user experience using GenAI. What you'll do Be part of a 0-1 AI transformation for Careem app from personalization perspective. Build a long-term vision on how we can rethink our customer acquisition and engagement strategies leveraging data in our decision making. Drive exploratory analysis to understand the ecosystem, user behavior; identifying new levers to help move metrics and build models of user behaviors for analysis and product enhancements. Shape and influence data/ML models and instrumentation to optimize the product experience and generate insights on new areas of opportunity and new products. Provide product leadership by sharing data-based recommendation to communicate state of business, root cause of change in metrics and experimentation results influencing product and business decision Implement scalable machine learning algorithms that will be used in production on big data. Embark on exploratory data analysis projects to achieve better understanding of phenomena as well as to discover untapped areas of growth and optimization.  Answer complex analytic questions from big data sets to help Careem shape its products and services in a better way. Help define and track the appropriate key metrics for specific projects.  Design and run randomized controlled experiments, analyze the resulting data and communicate results with other teams. You will always challenge the status quo and continually investigate new data processing technologies and seek to ensure that we follow the industry best practices. Build and deploy retrieval augmented generation systems and other applications of large language models. What you'll need 5-6 years of experience in data mining, predictive modeling, time series analysis, machine learning, Big Data methodologies, transformation and cleaning of both structured and unstructured data. Advanced degree in a quantitative discipline such as Physics, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering or Computer Science. Solid experience with Deep Learning Techniques (e.g attention, retrieval models, etc) 1-2 years industrial experience in personalization, recommendation or search is a MUST. Preferably working in a product driven company. Strong problem solving and coding skills. Solid knowledge of AB testing, classic ML and DL Solid understanding of recommendations, ranking and retrieval.  Strong communication skills  Proficiency and demonstrated experience in: Python, SQL, Spark, Hive. Demonstrated experience with database technologies (e.g. Hadoop, BigQuery, Amazon EMR, Hive, Oracle, SAP, DB2, Teradata, MS SQL Server, MySQL). Demonstrated experience with business intelligence and visualization tools (Tableau, MicroStrategy, ChartIO, Qlik) along with geospatial data processing skills is a plus. Who We Are – AstroLabs, the Gulf’s Leading Business Expansion Platform At AstroLabs, we specialize in facilitating high-growth companies' entry into the Saudi and UAE markets. We offer comprehensive growth services including business setup, co-working spaces, and recruitment, alongside programs developed with government and leading private sector partners to strengthen key regional sectors. As the market leader (we’ve recently celebrated expanding 850+ companies to the UAE and 600+ companies to KSA), , we are on a journey of digitizing this industry - and we’d like you to be a part of making this happen by joining our team in Saudi Arabia! Our vibrant Riyadh office serves as the heart of our organization, hosting over half of our workforce. We’re launching a new Accounting & Tax service line to further support our growing portfolio of clients — and we’re looking for a rising finance talent to join us on this journey. Who You Are – A Detail-Oriented Team Player Who Is Eager to Learn We’re hiring a Junior Accounting & Tax Associate on a 6-month contract to support the launch of our new Accounting & Tax service line, with a strong chance of full-time employment based on performance. You’re an ambitious junior accounting professional with a solid grasp of accounting fundamentals and a hunger to grow in the KSA tax and regulatory landscape. You’re proactive, eager to learn, and thrive in fast-moving, collaborative environments. You’re looking for a role where you can learn by doing — and one that could turn into something bigger. What you’ll do - Key Responsibilities You’ll work closely with our Saudi-based white-label Accounting & Tax partner, shadowing bookkeepers and tax consultants across live engagements to absorb hands-on knowledge. Murex is a global fintech leader in trading, risk management and processing solutions for capital markets. Operating from our 19 offices, 3 000 Murexians from over 60 different nationalities ensure the development, implementation and support of our platform which is used by banks, asset managers, corporations and utilities, across the world. Join Murex and work on the challenges of an industry at the forefront of innovation and thrive in a people-centric environment. You’ll be part of one global team where you can learn fast and stay true to yourself. The team: You will become a part of the Finance Product Development Domain (PDD) which is at the heart of MX.3 software evolution, where you will integrate the PES Product Control team. The PES Product Control team is in charge of designing, validating, and delivering solutions to enable our clients to produce their daily “official P&L” which is used by internal stakeholders like traders, risk officers, financial control department and management, to assess the performance of the business. There are numerous controls exercised by this function, one of them is the decomposition of P&L into its underlying components and pricing drivers (P&L attribution), and another one is the P&L adjustment to consider regulations’ constraints (valuation adjustments, IPV) amongst others. What you’ll do: You will be working alongside developers, consultants, product experts from other domains – Trading, Risk Management – or clients worldwide, to act as a product specialist on P&L and, on a longer term, as a specialist on Product Control full scope: Product support Provide 3rd level support to existing projects (all asset classes concerned) Organize corrective maintenance with development teams Enhance the existing product documentation Product evolution : Study market practices Reading regulation driven recommendations and customers/prospects documentation Assisting in demo preparations or client driven proof of concepts if required Assisting client division projects testing and listen to client requirements Capitalize on existing projects or market practices by: Assisting in product specifications/design to address internal or client requirements (such as a focus on given product asset classes representative scope) and, Accompanying the evolution of our solution (build and validation) Participate to long- and short-term solution-as-a-package activities (config as code) as a contributor and code reviewer Who you are ​: Minimum 3 years of previous experience, ideally in Trading, Market Risk or Finance Basic to intermediary knowledge of all murex asset classes Knowledge of the datamart solution (functional and technical) and best practices Knowledge of MRB/MRA modules (at least for the taylorVar) is a plus You have strong analytical and problem-solving skills You are at ease working autonomously or as part of a team You are curious to learn about different products, discover new practices where new things are to be built, strengthened, and shared You can handle multiple projects in parallel and adapt to eventual urgencies Murex is a global fintech leader in trading, risk management and processing solutions for capital markets.
